I was angry so I went outside to grab my receipt and seen the guy walking out with the same exact bag and same exact food they accidentally gave me and they were gonna give it to the other guy! I told them hey I ate from that bag you guys should be giving that same food out. Anyways I grabbed my receipt and got a refund even before I received the food. The guy told the manager about needing different food for the other guy because it was in my possession and I ate from it but guess what, the manager told him to put it all in a new bag, disgusting! Bottom line I'm never going back to this one and it's sad because it's the closest one to me. Lost a loyal customer

They let two cars go ahead of me in the drive thru, didn't get back to me until the 3rd car ordered.  Me being a smart ass I said something not very flattering but I did order ONLY because my granddaughter was hungry and I didn't feel like cooking.  I waited in line for 15 minutes while my granddaughter (who's 4) was crying because she was trying not to piss herself.  I ended up having to unbuckle her from her car seat and have her  climb up to the front seat to piss in a cup.  Nasty but it worked.  I finally get up to the window and pay for her meal.  The dumb bitch read back my order and got it wrong and when I corrected her the attitude began.  I gave it right back to her and she didn't like it much.  I get up to the 2nd window to collect her meal and I said something about the attitude, the cars cutting in front of me and called her a stupid dumb ass.  The kid laughed and apologized saying they were down an employee for the drive thru window and I said maybe they should have someone more competent to run that drive-through because that's dumb bitch sure the fuck didn't know how.  He again apologized and laughed and said that he agreed with me.  And they want $15 an hour... Yeah, right.

So.. went there again this morning..I must be a glutton for punishment! Again.. they screwed up tthe sausage and egg mcmuffin.. so this time, my bf decided to walk in.. He stepped thru the door and slid all the way and into the "wet floor" sign...then went to the counter and told them they made a mistake on our order...told them also the eggs were still raw and no sausage patty on it... The entire time he was standing at the counter he could hear the 2 women in the back talking smack! Really??  after over 2 years of going to McDonalds everyday...the thousands we spend there, and they treated us like that?? I never want to go there again!! I'm also going to call corporate to file a complaint...I'm just done!

So dissatisfied! I went to the drive thru and ordered 2 Mcchicken and McDouble and the McDouble was missing and also ordered a medium fries with the meal and went back GAVE us a SMALL fries! He didn't believe us and So PISSED off!!

This McDonalds is what you would expect for the area. The side parking lot always is a hangout for the homeless. They do keep it very clean and the workers are nice but service is extremely slow. Basic things like the bathrooms you have to be buzzed into and the tap water isn't accessible - guessing this is from the amount of homeless who come through. Overall food quality and restaurant was good but unfortunately the location isn't the greatest.
Bad experience, the cashier was rude, gave me an apple juice instead of an orange juice than she blamed me. Last time I'm to this place.

Worst experience at a mcdonalds. The cashier was rude as hell, I didn't get a name but she has a diamond tattoo behind her ear, and when something was said about her attitude, the manager with the "s" tattoo on her finger just chuckled, ALL WHILE HAVING A STAFF MEETING. I should've let the people having the meeting know that these girls were completely rude. I won't be returning.

Horrible customer service, and very dirty...  I'm sorry to say that there is literally not one good thing about this McDonald's. Something definitely needs to be done about this place. What they really need is more employees

2 cheese burgers no meat come on you have one job. And forgot a mcdouble wost McDonald's i ever been to and will never go there again. Warning more homeless people inside than out side got asked for money by 3 differt people get it together

This place sucks. They always try to put your food into a meal and charge more. Today I ordered a cheese burger with fries and soda. I was over charged and given two burgers with fries and soda as a meal. So now I'm throwing the other burger I paid for away. Since I'm sick of arguing with these people every time I come here about what I want and how they ring in it so I'm sad to say I think I'll just stop coming here all together. I've had their employees tell me they are trained to put everything in a meal.... I didn't order a meal. This happens every time. Avoid the rip off!   They also let bums hang out in the lobby and parking lot. Eww gross!! Appetite. Lost.
Every now and then I crave those great fries, and sometimes the giant Big Mac. Too often, this location doesn't do justice to either.
I waited 10 minutes at the window for 1 diet coke. Get it together. You guys deserve 0 stars.

Quality of food is good but to be honest theyre very cheap. Asked for a large orange juice this morning and my cup was 3/4 of the way full. Ask for a couple packets of hot sauce and i got one. Its not just on one occasion its happened multiple times. But chipotle still amazing though, just go there instead.
Ordered togo and got home to a half filled fries and half cup of our sundae.  What the heck what happened?  Do I pay 1/2 the bill?

Just called to speak to the manager about some problems with the drive thru. I no longer wonder why this location is having so many issues after dealing with one of this McDonalds managers. I was rang up incorrectly and their menu prices did not match what I was rang up for. Called and was offered no help. Nothing but excuses. Argued with me.  Mcpick is 2 for 2.50. Menu price states Mcflurry was 2.09 look at my receipt is also posted to help. I was charged 1.59 each for one mcchicken and one mcdouble. And 2.99 for the Mcflurry. Total should have been 4.96 and I was charged 6.77     McDonalds basically stole 1.81 from me. Check your receipts before you leave. Management refuses to address issue.
Don't believe the crappy reviews about this McDonald's, it's just as normal as any McDonald's in the world and their daily doubles are actually really well made and tasty.
I just went through the drive through and waited 5 minutes with no one acknowledging me there. Great service.....

I'd like to say the place was very clean, and the food was good and hot.  However, the manager, Melissa, was yelling and demeaning her cooks in Spanish, in front of all patrons to hear!  I was in the ladies room and I could hear her yelling all the way from the front!!! I speak Spanish and she was angry that they were not fast enough and threatened to go back there and help.  News flash...maybe you should've!!! Note to McDonald's management...send her for re-training.

Staff in the drive thru were so pleasant today AND the other day!! They actually paid attention to me in our time together and we're kind. This is a wonderful thing to see happen in the world today, in my eyes! Thank you, McDonald's staff! It was noticed and so appreciated!!!!
My fault for eating here!! Bad and I mean BAD... Service and manager needs more training!!!!

Got really bad food poisoning from this place. Do NOT eat here. Would rather drive further to the one off Greenback and Auburn than ever go through the drive thru again. It took 8 minutes to get 2 cheeseburgers and there was NO LINE at all. The service is slow and horrible and the food is sickening.
They let two cars go ahead of me in the drive thru, didn't get back to me for 5 minutes. I backed out of the driveway will not return here.

Restaurant would not honor coupons on the app. First happened in December 2015 when they wouldn't honor the "Free Sandwich. No purchase necessary. I hadn't tried to use the app since. Last night I tried to use the Buy one quarter pounder buy get one free and the manager told me that I had already used it. Not the case. I then tried to use the BOGO on the buttermilk chicken sandwich and the manager told me I used that one too. As I tried to explain to her that there must be an error, I was told I can't use it more than once and walked away from me, leaving me at the front counter. I am not sure the manager could manage her way out of a paper bag let alone manage a restaurant. The app clearly states the restaurant is participating. Kind of like a bait and switch. We'll get you here but then not give you what we offered. Called corporate and they just refer it to the local owner. Maybe the owner is part of the problem,

I rarely eat out do when I "splurge" I get really excited. Needless to say my excitement was short lived.  My fries were super soggy and some were still raw tasting ... My chicken nuggets tasted like really strong fryer grease and my cheeseburger was the worst McDonald's burger I have ever had... Ended up throwing away over half my order. I am so disappointed and upset . I love mcdonalds but this was so bad it prompted me to write my first yelp review. Avoid this location and hit the one on auburn and greenback!

Looks like all McDonalds had a major make over except for the menu. LOL!  I must admit that I prefer the "Steak Burrito" than the usual "Sausage Burrito" that they offer.  Too bad they're not serving the "Steak Burrito" anymore.  I agree with Kae, it's hell during rush hour and yes, do check your orders before you drive away.

One of the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. I give every restaurant I go to 3 chances and this one failed all three times. 1) they can NEVER get my order right. 2) the food tastes as of it has been cooked, froze, and reheated. 3) the fries are not fresh, EVER and they are always half full! 4) I always have to clean my own table if dining inside.

It's a McDonald's. Nothing special. They did recently do a whole makeover on the building... looks better than it did before. Apparently they forgot to rebuild the kids playground area, but that's no biggie for me.  The drive thru is 2 lanes that merge together, I'm not sure if that actually makes it faster food or not, but it's usually quick enough for me. The "voice" at the drive thru can be rude and short at times, but staff there is friendly for the most part. They have gotten my order wrong many times. I always check the bag before I go.
Terrible McDonalds. The customer service was the worst ive ever had and the man that was working didn't understand a thing i was saying or trying to explain. Never going there again

Kids needed to use restroom so we stopped in. Bathroom was for guests only so we ended up picking up some food. The staff buzzed open the women's bathroom, but my toddler wouldn't go with mom to the bathroom because he's "not a girl". Happily the girl went back behind the counter to buzz open the mens restroom for us. She was very helpful and understanding, and genuinely cheerful. We decided to eat there. This McDonalds was remodeled, so even better. The restaurant itself was very clean. The girl who helped us had been sweeping the dining area before she stopped to help us. When we left, she opened the door for my son and took the time to say bye to him. She obviously takes pride in her job and takes the time to give every customer good service, no matter the age. Went in not expecting anything, came out impressed.

The food is always fresh but every time I actually go inside there are homeless people that are using the outlets or just sitting in a corner with a pile of their possessions. Wish I could give more but the homeless and panhandling have to go.
Good food for a mcdonalds. we have eaten there quite a few times and they only got our order wrong once. Often very slow service after 10pm and long lines... But still a better mcdonalds than most.

Teresa the manager here, was very rude. Her tone of voice, and the way she talks to fellow employees was incredibly unprofessional. When I tried to place an order, she looked uninterested and appeared to be very unfriendly. The rest of the employees were more upbeat. Sadly, I will not come back to this location because of her demeanor.

the worse customer service i have EVER received, called to complain to the manager and was hung up on. Not to mention the hamburger patty on  my chicken sandwich i ordered INSTEAD of the chicken. not one to complain. Ive workerd with food before i no you have crappy days but 3 out of the 3 i spoke to were just awful.

This has got to be the best Mc Donalds around, hands down. When I went I had a excellent experience. The gentle who took my order was Nick, I think he was new due to the fact he his name tag was blank. He made the whole experience amazing for me. He was helpful, knew product knowledge, and an all around nice guy with a nice smile. I will be going to this Mc Donalds from now on, mainly for the excellent service and respect i got from Nick. Please keep this guy on.
This guy name Pablo took my order at the drive thru he was extremely rude but the guy at the second window was really nice and he apologize for his co-workers attitude

Came here when my car at the shop was taking too long.  It's everything you expect out of a McDonald's so my standards aren't that high.  Service was pretty fast despite the mob of kids and people ordering here on a Saturday.

~Mc Cafe~  Ok, so who in there right mind needs to review food for a McDonalds? If you dont know the food at one, you obiously live in seculsion.   This review, on the other hand, is a review of McCafe, and by that I mean the new specialty coffees offered by McDonalds. Now I have my own espresso machine, and hold a high standard to what I call a good espresso drink. My default drink is an iced white mocha. If you know anything about a white mocha, the best ones are made with powdered white chocolate, not syrup. Dont worry though, McDonalds doesnt offer a white mocha. You can however get a regular mocha, latte, or even a vanilla, or carmel, version of these popular drinks.  They use a fully automated Bean-to-cup espresso machine, which I was dually impressed by! I'm not sure of the brand, but it looked top notch, and I figured this would make the drinks highly consistant.   I opted for an iced carmel latte for $2.79....   First one was made with waaaay too much syrup. Sent back asked for half the syrup. Still way too much. I couldnt taste the espresso or the milk. Oh well I gave them a shot...    Thinking the results from that spify machine should have been better, I decide to give them a second chance at this, so the next day I go in, but get more specific with my order....   Iced carmel latte, only two pumps carmel, and an extra shot of espresso... $4.79  Yea,,, $4.79? eh what?  Begin Dialog -  Me: after reading the reciept $1.99 for the extra shot of espresso, um excuse me, is this correct, you charge $1.99 for an extra shot of espresso?  Cashier: um let me check.... typing into cash register, yes thats correct $1.99 for an extra shot.   Me: um ok dokey... hope its delicious this time!  Conclusion... The machine looked promising, but dang its a NO GO Mickey D!   Theres a Starbucks two doors down.   Looks like I'll still be driving the the "Hot Java Cafe" on Greenback and Auburn for my iced white mochas!

I go to McDonald's all the time.  This specific location however always gets my orders wrong.  More than half the time I don't get what I ordered, or end up paying for someone else order when I go through the drive through.    Food is okay, service is poor.

The drive thru is fast. But the order you get may not be correct. Food is always just okay. Not hot but not old. Soda had little to no ice. And get some staff that can smile more. I don't ever seen a same face seems like staff is always new.

There are woefully few options for eating out in Antelope which is one reason this McDonald's is still open. Today my wife went through the drive through and ordered a double Mac and of course I ended up with a single Mac with Ketchup only on it. I hate ketchup. And I hate paying for more meat and getting less.  "Where's the Beef"  The problem is at least 50% of the time they screw up the order. What the Hell? Is this how fast food employees prove they are worth $15 an hour. The reality is I blame the owners and managers of this particular franchise.   I complained once before and received a phone call from the owner's son. He offered to send me some coupons for a free meal.  Upon getting them I noticed they had expired 3 months earlier. Talk about a custom service fail.   Anyway... I guess I am done with this location. I will drive a little further and get the order I ordered. For the record, I have been to In and Out Burgers and Chick fil A more then I go here and neither location has ever messed up an order of mine.  So at least I know it can be done.

Make sure you get here wayyyyy before they close because the lady inside was throwing a tantrum. Lobby hours are until ten pm.... I walk up at 9:57 and the doors are locked. I walk in when some people came out and she was complaining to another employee about locking the doors and people not shutting it behind them. What's the big deal??? Your drive thru is until 2 am and I'm sorry I have a huge work truck that can't fit thru your drive thru. It now 10:02 and I'm posting this because it's very ridiculous for this lady to be throwing a fit like she was. She could definitely use the cardio bagging another Togo order.

This McDonalds is always packed. So expect long wait times. Unfortunately, customer service is not the best except for a friendly guy taking orders at the first window. Oh yeah, can't forget, last week they left out the cheeseburgers in BOTH my kids happy meals. Imagine their surprise when we got home to eat and no burgers. Will not be back.

Everytime I receive my food, it's hot and tastes fresh and the employees are friendly enough but the only downside is the drive thru is always soooooo slow!! Been sitting here for 15 minutes. Yes I realize it's 12:30am and I'm normally a patient person as long as I have my phone but I'm HUNGRY and you guys are moving at a snail pace lol
Thank you for the many great late night meat snacks. Always fast service and well prepared meals. Rarely wrong on orders.

This place is filled with fucking retards. I get to the window after ordering a sausage McMuffin with cheese and a sausage McGriddle add cheese and all they have for my order is a sausage egg and cheese McGriddle. I corrected her and she told me my told. I get the the second window and get my food and get ALL THE WAY HOME TO FIND OUT I HAVE 2 SAUSAGE FUCKING MCGRIDDLES JUST ONE WITH EGG AND ONE WITHOUT ARE YOU FUCKING SERIOUS A FUCKING MCMUFFIN HAS A COMPLETE DIFFERENT OUTSIDE. This is why you work at McDonald's. Learn how to read

They forgot the fruit for my sick girlfriend's oatmeal. I walked back in and showed them the receipt and asked for fruit, the homeboy up front got me the fruit inside the oatmeal. He did not give me near enough as most people usually get. Before he gave me the oatmeal he began to question me on why the fruit mattered so much to me and why I cared. He was very rude and pressed me. I told him it was for my girlfriend and he hesitated to give me the oatmeal. I'm very upset with this interaction and I hope the man who pressed me has a fantastic day... because I won't...  -Grant

Can't believe how many problems I've had at this one location. The drive threw always takes forever and I never get my  sauce when I ask for some. I don't enjoy leaving reviews like this but the scales have been tipped. So going through the drive threw is always horrible here. I'd hate to see their wait times. But the main story. Got there, ordered my food and there was one person ahead of me. They had been sitting at the window to get there food before I even paid and even after I paid it took about 5 more minutes for them to get their food. When I get up to the window I'm handed my drinks which one was suppose to have no ice, but whatever it's ice. So still waiting a few minutes pass by and the lady asks me to pull around because my food isn't ready. My mistake was agreeing to that. I go and pull around and wait in their designated area......time passes about 5-6 minutes and I see 3 cars leave the dive threw and still no sign of anyone bringing me my food. I'm fed up as I need to get back to work, I only get a 30 minute break. So I go inside and tell them that I've been waiting for someone to bring me my food as it hasn't happened. I give them my receipt and they don't even have it started. Over hearing them talk about my order, they had given it to someone else......so I'm still waiting, watching about 5 other customers get their food...took about another 6 minutes for them to give me my food. They say sorry and give me a pie. I leave to give my boyfriend his portion of the meal that I bought. I only ordered 2 things a #3 and a #6. As I'm on my way back to work I get a text from my boyfriend. A picture of the burger that was completely raw on the inside. Really? I was livid at this point. Something needs to change either train your staff properly or get a better trainer. I've worked in the fast food industry it if not that difficult. I ended up calling the manager, got a refund, thank you. Never will I ever go to this location again. Sad because it's the closest fast food place to home.

This is possibly the worse and most disrespectful experience I have ever had as a customer at McDonald's! So I walk in with my son and was waiting to order and asked a cashier of the name (Tajauna) if I can have a second to review the menu she said fine.....so about 40 seconds passes by and she says "are you ready I don't have all day" I responded no and she rolled her eyes and said "Fuck" so I said excuse me after hearing that Im front of my son and she said "oh shit my bad" again in front of my son so at this first point I'm pretty angry so I ended up saying I will never come to This McDonalds again and she lastly responded saying "good looks like you don't need any anyways" I beeen coming to this McDonald's ever since I first moved into antelope and this by far is the worse customer experience I've ever experienced!

This McDonald's Has got to be the slowest service in Sacramento. They take the fast out of fast food.  This place serves slow food.  They must have a butcher in the back slaughtering cows to order. It takes 25 minutes to get your order.

One star for not messing things up bad in the past.  Minus four stars for the sad customer service I experienced yesterday, and the lack of management supervision ensuring the place is organized and customers issues are addressed the first time.  If after placing my order for a meal, and having to get back in line to ask for unsweetened tea.  I was dismissively told by the young man at the counter that it wold be it there soon.  Now after receiving my food,  I again stood in line and made the observation that the tea was still not available.  All the employees tried to say something, except the supervisor who did not say a word.  I had offers to get it from their side of the counter, now this would have been the appropriate response the first time I asked.  I left my cup with the ice as a matter of principal.  And I write a negative review in the same way.  Train your employees to handle a concern or question the first time they are asked, as this will have been the customers second interaction with your team members.  And who was in charge that left no unsweetened tea in the front during the dinner hour?  This is a poor reflection on a store that was getting better after so many years of getting only my order wrong in the bags.

I've visit this location many of times. Service has always been sub par at best. I didn't know I had to hurry up and eat.... along with a employee almost moping my feet while she decides to eat right near my feet. Which I thought was totally rude. They are very rude and have horrible customer service. I won't spend anymore money at this location. Please go elsewhere if you want McDonald's

This location was insane busy with only a few people running the entire operation, with eBay said they weren't rude or even showing signs of being upset. I admire how happy and up beat they stayed even despite the rudeness of some of the patrons.

Horrible customer service Manager was so rude I waited for 10 minutes for my food AFTER being parked I was parked for 10 minutes waiting on my food they said they were gonna take 2 minutes for hash browns so then they hand out my food to another car so that pissed me off then the manager told my boyfriend he can have a large fry for the wait but we waited too damn long for just a free fry so I asked for 2 pies the manager said they are out of apple so I asked for 2 cherry pies the dumb manager kept being rude some black lady with short curly hair

Come here all the time mostly through the drive thru. Workers are nice and polite every time. However, sometimes they do mess up on the orders. Make sure to check your bag before driving away. Seems to happen to me every once in a while.
Dylan has amazing customer service. Unlike most cashiers at fast food places this guy was great.

One of the worst.  The employees are nice ; but the manager must be an idiot because there is literally NO quality control on what goes out that drivethru window.  Once they even served me an sausage mcmuffin without the damn egg in it.  What gives?!

do not eat at this mcdonalds!!! my wife and both my daughters are very sick right now because they ate there last night. i chose not to eat there myself and i am perfectly fine. but now as the primary income that comes into this house, i have to take the day off and take care of all 3 of my babies. now we are missing work, money and missing school. learn how to prep and cook your food!!!! my house is upside down!!!! never eating there again!!!!

Never will I be coming back to this place. Vickie the manager, has the worst customer service ever, she's rude, brash and arrogant. I'm a long time patron of this place of business, but by drive-thru and since she never services that, she had no clue. I finally had enough of getting drinks that have the color but no flavor with my order, so I decided to go in, instead of complain via survey(I feel it accomplishes nothing but I still do it). Anyways, when I demanded to be comped for the meal and the fact I had to drive back(13min) to the restaurant which in no way is a convenience. Vickie told me too bad, we are a busy store and it happens, so if we want our drinks we can get new ones and that's it. Once we asked for her boss she said, we don't give out that info, so either you take your drinks or leave. This type of treatment of a customer and the constant remarks to her coworkers in a different language(Spanish) as they then chuckled at me at their expense is unprofessional. I'm terrified such a grossly negligent and loose-canon pushes her weight around to be so rude to the people keeping them in business. The owner needs to get a handle on this lady quick, again her name is Vickie and she needs some training on how to deal with customers without trying to play the victim that the store is too busy to do their job competently.  Wish I could rate her customer service, she would get a 0/5. Don't let her initially friendly demeanor trick you, she's good at putting up a front.

We have been here several times and the service is always quick and friendly. Today however, they made our day. My son was obsessed with the last happy meal promotion, MINIONS. Sadly, the promotion is over and as much as we tried, we were unable to collect all of the toys. My son asked the manager (Johnny) as he was ringing us up,  if he could have a Minion toy. Johnny, as expected told him that promotion has ended. After ringing us up, he told me he would look in the back to see if he had any Minion toys left. And he found three, two of which my son didn't have He let my son choose one and I offered to buy the other. He told me would could have Both! Talk about going above and beyond to make a customer happy!
We were just drunk and wanted nuggets at a late time and a guy was really negative about it. Other that that, best nuggets ever!

Always taste your drink before leaving and always look in your bag and go thru it before you leave theyve gotten almost every single one of my orders wrong the staff are nice enough but nothing erks me like a simple order being destroyed I ordered a Sausage egg and cheese mcmuffin tonight and they didn't put sausage on it...I also bought 3 breakfast burritos for my husband... I only received 2... Yet they charged me for all of it...

I went to the drive thru and ordered 2 sweet teas, one of the employees gave me my first tea then turned her back to the window then continued to talk to the employees so I kindly asked if she could hurry because I had work and she rolled her eyes then handed me my second tea. As I pulled off she yelled out the window go suck a dick and all the other employees at the registers looked through the window. I don't know why there was no manager was present but I've never experienced such unprofessionalism ?

I can't stand coming here but being that i have kids and this is the closest to me i continue to do so. Out of 10x ordering the same coffee drink only twice has it came out without issues. I've even asked if i was ordering my iced carmel mocha wrong.. I'll get it hot, I'll get an iceed coffee with carmel drizzle. Ill i get an iced mocha, ect. And the meals ALWAYS seem to be missing something if u order more than just 1.  I dont get it!!!! And it honestly seems to be the reputation for THEM ALL!! Like it's a requirement for them to not have their shit together in order to work there.. ugh. Rant done. Slow down and get the shit right so i dont have to turn alll the way around and come back or be sent to the front to wait.

I usually stop by this McDonalds only because it's closest to my home and I need a quick meal.   Food quality was always a hit or miss. Recently it seems consistently good. The burger meat comes out fresh as do the fries. Maybe it's under new management?   The employees in the past seem like they hate their job and have poor customer interaction skills. For example, I remember seeing a teenager put her skateboard on the table and an employee said in a very firm manner, "Take that skateboard off the table now." The teenager was in the wrong but she could've been corrected in a less demeaning manner. A please and thank you would have helped with that. The employees are always in a hurry to be done with you and get to the next customer before you can thank them. The customers don't seem to come first here. I've seen employees not hold doors open for customers who were right behind them.  Recently, however, I've noticed most of the employees have a great attitude and seem to be enjoying themselves. One example, I was rang up by a cashier named Don. Great posture and attitude, articulate with his words, and a genuine smile. I thought I was at Chic-Fil-A. If they continue to hire employees like him I know for sure the ratings for this store will go up.  I hope they keep going in this new direction with the food quality and employees like Don. Maybe I've just been on a lucky streak and the restaurant is still your typical McDonald's. If so, then set your standards low and you won't be disappointed.

9:30am Wednesday 2016 My boss bought me breakfast, 2 sausage egg mcmuffin meal and one of them was completely burned, and hard as a rock! My dogs didn't even want it... I was a shift manager at another McDonald's and I know you know the quality of the food you put out! Busy or not. Ew
Newly remodeled. Efficient. Service okay. Taste just like McDonald should be. Can't complain much.

Ehhh. I usually just go for my chocolate shake and if I'm realllyyyy hungry. This location really has the worst service. Everytime I pull up to the window I smile and say Hi because I work at a restaurant so I actually know how customer service. And they'll just repeat what I got and hand it to me. No smile. Nothing. EXCEPPPTTTT one middle age African American who's name j can not pin point. Earl maybe? He is amazing and always has a smile when I see him working even late nights. Every worker should take notes from him. Even the managers.

So we went through the drive through. Ordered a 20 piece nugget and a 10 piece nugget. I wanted szechuan sauce for both nuggets. The manager on duty always says one sauce per person... My fiance and i both ordeered so 2 meals=2 sauces, right? The rule thwyve gone by for me and every other customer so far. So now shes hella rude making a big deal about we're wrong and dont know what we're talking about amd need to get out of her drive thru. Wtf excuse me?? So i ask for our money back from one of the meals and she refuses!! You absolutely cannot refuse money back in exhange for product she literally just handed me. She has to give me my miney back and take back the food but she was hella rude and told us no. So now i dont even get my food i paid for or my money back. Not like im refusing to give the damn nuggets back!! So she told us to leave again, slammed the window in our face and left the window. Stupid bitch. Shes the"manager" too. At about 1:45 this morning before they closed.

My friend and I could not get over our experience here. The service from the cashier and the other staff were great. The place was clean and everything. However, the manager was screaming about nothing the entiiiiiiiiiiiiiiire time. She kept yelling at the staff, "Did you already get this? What's this? Who is doing this?" The staff looked like they had all their ducks in a row and the manager was just trying to draw attention to herself. She was louder than she needed to be and it was clear she was looking for attention from the patrons instead of actually trying to get things done. Someone please tell her to calm the F down.
McDonald's is McDonald's.  Anyone who expects a 5 star visit is retarded. And most the people that work here are kids. So give them a break! We all know those frys are worth the trouble!

Reviewing McDonald's seems rather pointless, but here we go anyway.   For me, all McDonald's start at three stars. They're not my favorite fast food, but if I absolutely have to eat here I'm going to survive. Besides, even if we hate to admit it the greasy deadly fries are actually delicious and the ice cream is on point too.   This particular McDonald's (amongst other things in the area) gets a point down just because of the times I've had bad experiences there. Years ago they would literally mess up our order every time we went through the drive through. They haven't messed up in years, but I've also only ordered a drink for these past few years. They could redeem themselves, but that would require me eating there - so we'll see it.
Average fast food place. Been going here for years. Every once in a while they will mess up the order but I've never found a hair in my food so I guess that's good...
We haven't been in MCDonalds for many years but my daughter really wanted to go. Looks like they did total remodeling.  For some reason it attracts wrong crowd... Otherwise I would enjoy it.
Horrible service, go elsewhere. Unsalted fries only filling half of the container, cold nuggets and they don't fill your drink cup.
Paid for a 10 piece chicken nugget meal. Got home and saw that they only put a 6 piece in my bag. The nuggets also taste very old and soggy. Definitely won't return to this location.
Drive-thru is SO slow!!! And it's not much better inside. One clerk and she was like duh....And they want $15 an hours?

I came here a few weeks ago for dinner with my family. It was busy. Which is to be expected at dinner time. We got our order in a decent amount of time.    We order our dinner and when my daughter got her chicken nuggets she ate half of one and asked me why it was cold. I looked at the nuggets to see they were RAW! I couldn't believe it. You don't "accidentally" put raw nuggets in a kids meal box. You can tell the difference between cooked and raw. I proceeded to let management know. The manager didn't want to deal with us. They did replace my daughters food. And refunded our dinner. I called customer service to let them know what happened. They passed my info along to the district manager. When she got ahold of me she didn't seem like she cared all that much. My daughter got sick from that raw nugget. She did say sorry and tell me the employee had been fired.    I will never go to another this Mc Doo Doo's let alone any other one. They suck. If I could give no stars I would.
Goooood food once in a while u be craving so ye its good but some times they mess up on the order late at night so make sure u check yo bag before u leave. But the foos is rly good

I think this gross resturant spits in the mayo. Everyone is really rude like they dont enjoy earning money. Like seriously why are these burgers so runny? Ill never eat at a mcdonlads again. Please i hope i didnt eat jizz.
Terrible customer service.. Always a long line at the drive-through. Very slow services. Fries are always cold, restrooms are disgusting. Don't even bother telling management, rude as hell..

In the past couple months I have visited this Mc Donald's location and have to say the service a the quality of food has greatly improved.  Today I was in and ordered a Big Mac Meal and its was served hot. Very hot and the fries were hot. And both tasted great.  It's been this way for a month or so, I'm not sure if the manager/owner have made the change but for whatever reason it has.  Thanks Mc Donald's and good job.

The food is usually good but last week I went inside and ordered, to go, one Big Mac meal, two Big Mac sandwiches, and one 10 Piece Chicken McNuggets.   They left out the McNuggets.  I caught the error and informed the young fellow who helped me.  I just left another review for a different place with the same problem. In this case, there is a list, a list that has all the items I ordered on it. How do you miss an item when you have a list to follow? It requires nothing more than a rudimentary ability to read words, not even sentences, and it doesn't even require comprehension.  The food is good, but check your order because after fifteen years of stopping there occasionally, they get the order wrong more often than they get it right.

Just general! Mcdonalds is no 5 star restaurant, but it's a good place to get a quick snack on the run.  Cleanliness: 4. It can get a little messy when teenagers come in.  Time: 4. It's really quick, drive thru and inside seating is about the same. The people never just talk to each other, they're efficiently doing their jobs.  Customer service: 3. I like most of them, but some people are extremely rude. The bad just outweighs the good. The drive thru people can get snarky, which isn't a good thing.  Food: 3. Obviously not going to be a 5 considering it's mcdonalds. It's bland but fills you up. I'd rather go some place else, but this is cheap and fills you up. This place sometimes ODs on sauce so yeah, not a fan.   Anyways, one of the better Mcdonalds I've been to, so not bad.
This place sucks I order breakfest and they messed my whole order up and I was running late for work and the line was so long to go back so I wasted 10 bucks and no food I threw it away

New look, same crappy service!  I'm so done with this mcDonald's. Every time I come in here there is an issue. Today it took me 15 minutes to get an $11 order. And this is at 6 PM how are you running out of food at dinner time?  I come through the drive-through not because I want good and speedy service because that's not prevalent here. I come through the drive-through because I am usually in my pajamas and don't want to come inside.  But of course they make you come inside because they've messed up your order and it is quicker than having to go through the drive-through again because the cars are backed up.    I contemplated going to the McDonald's on Elkhorn therefore bypassing the one that's closest to my house for better service.   Another sign I should give up fast food.

This McDonald's is ok. Good for a quick snack. Just not my thing for regular fast food. Sometimes the lines get pretty long in the drive thru and they make you park in the front somewhere. When this happens, they almost always forget the condiments that you had asked for and you have to get out and run inside to get them. This really makes me a bit upset since it just eliminates the fact that I went in the "drive thru".   This one made me really upset. My wife ordered me a couple mc chickens last week and had asked her to add tomatoes to them. $0.50 for tomatoes!!!!  Are you kidding me?  I can see charging for bacon and/or cheese but produce?  You've got to be kidding me.
Don't really eat fast food but was hungry only had 100 bill note on me was told they don't have change. Lol

Just had a Jalapeno  burger.. The  one they are showing on TV..  OMG.  False advertising.  Not even close to the one seen..   Couldn't see the meat till I pulled the bun apart..  Save your money..  Sloppy.. Went again 06/14/2018.  Ohhh worst than ever.  You can buy a complete meal other places for the price of one Quarter Pounder......

Worst McDonald ever! They always forget something eveytime i go there. Don't go there! They don't deserve any stars. Gave me warm fries instead of hot fresh fries. I asked for no salt but got them warm and salty. All these people need to be retrain how to do their jobs!

First they didn't have chicken strips then they dont have sauces like what do you guys have plus they gave me to hard fried chicken nuggets  i really hate them at this point.                                                                     ...............,. They have no customer service at all!!! They can't do math or give the proper change. Don't come here ever! I understand that sometimes you just have your bad days and what not, but this place is horrible.

Not professional at all I don't know if she is a manager but she has attitude issue. I really didn't appreciated how I was treated. Temperature of food was cold.  Inside is filthy including bathrooms.  Was told they don't accept McDonald coupons.  Will not spend anymore money here.  Just awful.

Very rude over the speaker to order. Such as saying yeah, what do you want. Or saying yep, what else. Plus why ask if you want dipping sauce & then when asked at the window if they remembered..they reply yup it's in there to get home and there isn't any sauce. Very rude & will not return again.
worst place ever!!!  these mfs are worthless. always out if something messing up orders. slowest customer service!!! fucc mds on norwood

By far the worst McDonald's ever. They always mess up my order. The line is always long/ slow service inside and drive thru. They are always out of something. Worst McDonald's ever hands down. Definitely 0 stars

I would give it zero stars if i could, i have never seen a fastfood place this disorganized it is crazy. Worst McDonald's ever they never get your order right you get in the drive-through with people backed up behind you and then they tell you that their ATM is down so now you have a bunch of people behind you so it isn't like you can just drive away you have to sit through the line and let everybody else get their food very big inconvenience. At the same time they ask that they're ready to take your order you give your order and then they ask you twice after that if you could repeat the order and they still get it wrong. I would give zero stars if possible. I went through the drive Thur get my food tell the girl she forgot my 20 piece nuggets while I'm still at the window she asked for my receipt and said we only charged you for a 10 piece.  So I tell her we'll I have 0 chicken nuggets in this bag she said she will make a 20 piece bring out if I park. 10 min later she brings me out a 10 piece so I go back in was like this is only a 10 piece. Tip: Don't go to this location! Ever!! The inside is dirty and the drive-thru takes WAY too long. Customer Service is horrible and the employees act like they don't care. Do yourself a favor and drive to the location on Northgate. It's much better.

Okay McDonald's, here we go.   First, the employees here have NO customer service. I mean NONE. They will not even acknowledge you if they're not working the register. It's not hard to say "someone will be right with you" even if you're not working the register. They choose to ignore you. The biggest problem with your store IS THE CUSTOMER SERVICE. The English barrier is not as big of an issue as how rude your staff is. You should reach your staff to acknowledge your customers and it will go a long way.

I only do reviews when I feel that I've had amazing customer service or the worst. THIS MC Donald's is the WORST!!  1. Drive-Thru expect to be there over 15 mins with two cars ahead of you!  2. Food is Cold AF or Burnt  3. They treat you as if they're doing YOU a favor. They roll their eyes at you. And get your order wrong  4. Soda is flat 8/10 times Ive went 5. Management is ghetto! cursing with another employee "come help, these people are f**** driving me crazy" not sure if she meant the employees or the customers   6. I've complained with corporate all they did was send me "apology" letters. I don't want a f*** apology I want a resolution to the multiple complaints!  Every time I go back hoping they've changed, NOPE! Same s*** different day!!   Save your time and avoid a headache.. Go to a different Mc Donald's!!

Not only is this the worst place to go but it's absolutely the slowest and you usually get the wrong order I definitely don't recommend it and there is no rating because it should be a big fat zero not even a one!
This is the most god-awful place to ever come two. That only are they slow as hell but 95% of the time you get the wrong order. And there is no rating for them because it's a zero a big fat one

This has to be the worst MacD's I've ever been to. First, it feels like no a/c is running. The place was filthy! Food on the floors along with other garbage. I am calling corporate office like everyone else should!  1-800-244-6227
They over charge compared to the Northgate location and they don't accept coupons from the McDonald app. Horrible place.

This is the filthiest McDonald's I've ever visited! It literally smells like feces and is full of flies. Before I knew how disgusting it was, I ordered an iced coffee in the drive-thru. Every time I go there at this McDonald's something is horribly wrong!  This morning I asked for the bacon to be extra crispy and look at my English muffin! LOL. This is just one example of their horrible, horrible service
The service here sucks. It's literally the worst. They always take the longest. French fries and nuggets were dry and old. And there was a black hair wrapped around my fries.
This place is horrible I understand you have to be kind but calling my husband babe and hun I don't agree you need to change that fucking name to sir

Worst McDonald ever.  First, there were no one in the store and none of the employee or manager say hi or take my order.  I stood by the register looking mad.  I order 2 sausage burritos (the meal) and without completing my order, the store manager already swipe the card.   It took them forever to make my meal and didn't not serve my coffee with the burrito. She did apologize about the water).    I would not eat there again!!!!

Worst McDonald's in Sacramento . I live a couple of minutes away from this place and would rather drive to the other McDonalds in Rio Linda which gives way better service. This McDonald's has HORRIBLE service , TERRIBLE/Bitchy store manager and it took them 10 minutes just to give me 2 sandwiches!

Asked for the order to dine in and they bagged it up to go, soda machines didn't work until I asked the lady at the counter to turn them on, had to go back and ask for my kids' yogurt that was supposed to be in their happy meals. They only had one left. "Patrons" of this McDonalds ranged from quiet homeless guy digging for pennies for an ice cream to a group of full-on hostile young kids with a loud-mouthed adult yelling and verbally abusing the staff. I got my kids the hell out of there and we won't be back.

I wondered if writing a Yelp review for McDonald's even matters...  Then I searched for this location and found that it really does! We should have read these reviews before making a stop here on our road trip. Everyone is right about the drive-thru, so don't bother trying it unless you actually enjoy waiting and waiting and waiting for "fast food".  Poor guys inside look so young, though. I can't help but give a couple stars for their effort to choose work over video games.
After ordering my friends and I heard one employee say to another employee, "I'll give you twenty bucks to lick this ice cream cone before I give it to (the customer) through the window."

This is one of the worst McDonalds I have ever been to and I live within walking distance. They have plenty of staff and still can not keep up with the orders both inside and out. The store is not kept clean and today I walked into the store and was confronted with homeless (inside the store!) begging for a shake. There was at least three empty cups sitting on his table and was still asking individuals as they came in. In a few minutes in comes a lady and starts asking for money. I tried to talk with the person behind the counter and she walked off.  Bad bad bad, no more for me.  Patty T.

Ok so yesterday it's been about 4 months since I've been here last. I tried it again and this was my experience at the drive through...  Mc: IUGTWOcanBIUGiTEIOhelpUFGTyouWILO? Me: I'm sorry I couldn't understand you. Mc: Can I help you? Me: Yes I want a large size #1 with no sauce on the burger and an unsweetened ice tea. Mc: OK that will be $7 at the second window.   There is a line 5 cars deep because they only have the front window open serving the food and taking the money. As I slowly move forward I end up next to the first (closed) window. A kid inside walks past and then comes back to the window and opens it up and says:  Mc: You need to pull up to the second window. Me: Yeah duh, there's like 3 cars still in front of me. I can't go anywhere! Mc: They take the money up there.  Me: Duhhhhhhh I get that.  When I get to the front window...  Mc: OK you got a #1 with no salt... Me: No wait a minute, I said that I did not want "sauce" on the burger. No "sauce"! Mc: Well you got no salt! Me: Too bad - have them redo it. Mc: Are you sure? Me: YES I'M SURE!!!  After a few minutes I finally get the meal and the drink. As I drive off I pop the straw into the ice tea and it's mutherf*&$&^#% SWEAT ICE TEA!
Waited 20 minutes in the drive thru for a stale breakfast sandwich and a hash brown that tasted like it had been soaked in grease.

I don't think this drive-thru could be any slower. One person working both windows, it took 15 minutes to get coffees, they messed one up by making it a frap instead of hot, and had no drink holders. Wouldn't recommend this location at all.

The people at this location work hard. My order has always been accurate. Flies happen, not the store's fault. Today going through the drive thru a couple of the workers were cleaning the pavement in the drive thru line taking advantage of the free water from the sky. Tell me how many reviewers would step up and get out in the rain like this to take care of their place of work. I call this dedication and thanked both ladies for their commitment to their work ethic. Please see the photo I added.

This Mc.Donald's needs to be shut down. After my experience and reading the reviews about this place is like "OMG!"   I went today to sit in a 20 minutes drive thru line (take in mind there were only 3 cars in front of me) After the last 20-30 hour long waits in drive-thru I should have learned my lesson but yet, here I go 30 minutes before work to sit in a 21 minute line (while the cars behind me are honking!) and when I get to my work my order was WRONG!!!   I asked the drive-thru guy (who was wearing regular street clothes) for a receipt, said I would get it at the next window, ask the girl in the next window for my receipt and she says oh you need to get off and get it. What the hell?!? Whatever give me my food! Get to work and my order IS COMPLETELY WRONG!   NEVER AGAIN! this place is such a joke.

This place is disgusting to say the least. Flies are everywhere and sometimes you could even spot a cockroach... Most of them half ass their jobs, some of them are ok. Food is alright though. Overall, it's pretty bad
Worst McDonald's I've ever been to French frys I've ever had cold as hell drive thru was the worst so slowwwwwww they should just shut that one down.

This is the worst McDonalds by far! They're always getting orders wrong and they're always running out of things. From the drive-thru wait time, and employee asking what we would like 2-3 times and still getting the order wrong to running out of soda, cups, and lids.  The only great thing about this McDonalds would be how close and convenient it is to me. Better luck with Jack In the Box across the street.

I went in here to this facility two days ago and bought food for my family and friends we ate and I got food poisoning from there store, I called them and talked to one of the managers and she said she would give me a refund. So I came in and asked to speak to a manager and they ignored me I stood for about twenty mins before Rachel the manager came to speak to me.  I told her about what was going on very calmly and nice and she reacted with a shitty attitude and was very rude decided to talk poorly about me to her employees and tried to give me the wrong number for  corporate ! I will never eat here again I've worked in a customer service field for about six to seven years now and that is not how you treat or speak to a customer I don't think they even deserve a rating!  Also the regular employees were also very rude with her and talked poorly to and about me as well while they gave me dirty looks so unless you would like food poisoning and poor customer service I would recommend not to eat there anymore. I hope there facility gets shut down!!

The worst McDonald's ever!  Closest to my house so I deal with it sometimes but 90% of the time something is wrong here. Runs out of everything. Worst customer service gets your order wrong all the time. Where did they find their employees cuz everywhere else McDonald's has the best employees! Get it together!!!!!

About a third of the time, the order is wrong. And if it's wrong, half of that time they don't understand what you mean or how you were overcharged, and give the good old "well what do you want me to do about it?" In lesser words: I would recommend not going to this location as it may just ruin McDonald's for you as it has for me.

Why do I even try to do anything in this area of Sac?? Sitting in line at their double drive thru. Ten minutes to even get to the speaker. Only to find out they don't serve hash browns on their all day breakfast menu. So I'm sitting in the drive thru line wasting twenty minutes of my life for no hash browns. Do yourself a favor and go to the next McD's. Or don't go at all because their food really is garbage.
THEY DONT ACCEPT COUPONS! Makes sense considering how little money they are already making by how shitty their service/food is. Go to Northgate, worth the drive I can promise you that.

Always have bad experience here dont recommended if your are in a hurry or short time. Employees there are slow! They always forget something in your order. Today they forgot my hash brown. I suggest the owner of this location to train your employees better for faster service!

Yelper Russ S is spot on with his review. This particular McDonalds' drive thru is terrible.  Some of the workers are nice and know what they are doing, but some are just incompetent and so slow.  First off, if you drive up to one of the two drive up speakers first, it doesn't guarantee that your order will be taken first.  Once they take your order, they may or may not have what you want (i.e. they may not be able to make an Egg McMuffin because they are out of eggs... the coffee machine is broken so they are only serving cold drinks...).  Once you get to the window, they usually ask you what you have ordered and then will scramble to just then start making your coffee drink.  If you order something with specific requests like an Egg McMuffin without ham, you may end up with an Egg McMuffin with ham and no cheese.  So... yeah... this McDonalds is not good.  While it is on the way to my daughter's school and is a more convenient location, after so many inconsistencies, I will go out of my way to go to the McDonalds on Northgate because their drive thru is soooo much better.

Stopped by here to grab something to eat. It was packed around 4:45pm on a Friday. I originally ordered the Artisan Grilled Chicken, and the cashier talked me into bumping it up into a meal to save me money. I gave in even though I really didn't want a bigger size fries other than a small, nor did I want a drink. My total came to $10.26. I sat down to wait for my number to be called and thought how ridiculous the amount was for 2 things I technically didn't want and a damn chicken sandwich. I'm ballin' on a budget and trying to lose weight, so more fries PLUS a soda just wasn't necessary. Now, I hate being difficult at a restaurant because I know how it feels on the receiving end but I just couldn't justify spending well over $6 on a meal at McDonald's. Needless to say; I went up to the counter and stopped Latesha to cancel my order ASAP so as not to have the food made and potentially wasted. It was swamped in there and I could see how fast everyone was moving and I could feel the chaotic energy. But Latesha remained calm and polite, and got it done. I didn't have to stand in line again. She ran back to cancel the meal, came and asked if I would like something else. I gave her my new, smaller and obviously cheaper order, and she came back with the exact amount of change and a smile. A few minutes later, she had my meal ready and I was on my way home. I told her to have her boss check these reviews so he/she would know that she handled business, and remained cool amidst the craziness and my inconvenient ordeal. I placed a second order for another hamburger for my friend and the cashier, who was new, short changed me by a nickel. But I let it go when I realized after the drawer closed just because I didn't want to be more difficult. Maybe her drawer might be short tonight and my 5 cents made all the difference. Also; prior to this, the moment I walked in - said cashier and Latesha were dealing with an angry customer - and neither of them let it affect their positive attitudes.

I wish I could give this McDonald's a zero but yelp won't allow that! We were in the drive thru for about 10 minutes just ordering then when we get to the window she asked us to repeat the whole order because there was a mix up. OK so we did...then again she asked what we had ordered. So annoying already. She then forgot what drinks we had and then she asked what color lids we wanted? I didn't know we had an option? The whole time all the employees were complaining about how bad the mix up was and continuously saying the word "hella". So unprofessional. So we finally get our food after a total of 30 minutes in the drive thru. I get home to a nice juicy DEAD FLY in my burger!!! Produce was old and brown. I called to speak to a manager and she was so nice and offered me another burger? Really? I just found a dead fly in my burger and you want me to go back for another one? The health department will be knocking on there door pretty soon. Like tomorrow. Do not go here its terrible!!
This place needs a makeover.  And health inspection.
So apparently when you have a coupon for a free french fry and medium drink with the purchase of a  10pc nugget, they run out of nuggets??? WTF

I have been to many McDonald's and I always ask for my coffee the same way at all locations however this location seems get it right. It is not in the best of neighborhoods and it is out of my way but I have learned lesson not to buy coffee  anywhere else as I always end up throwing it away. I also like that they have two drive thru aisles definitely speeds things up when ordering. I have only been at this location in a.m. as that is the only time I go to McDonald's.

This location is ran by incompetent teenagers and their boss can barely muster up a half-*** apology when her entire crew is sarcastic. Every few months I'll drive by, hoping their crew has changed, and every time, I regret it. The crew does change, but for the worst. Customer service is not difficult, but it is never used at this location. The only regular staff member they have is a 'manager,' who barely speaks English and therefore, lets the children they call employees get away with rudeness. Drive to another location or just go to Jack In The Box across the street. Soda is always flat and fries are either cold or not even in the bag. Not worth it. Rated 0.

This McDonald's is just horrible. I went today with a friend, they completely messed up our orders. So then, we had to wait for it to be fixed so they asked us to go wait in the front.  Which we did, we asked for some sauces...finally they brought our "correct" order. I semi checked and everything seemed right, so we left and come to realize they only gave us one fries and no sauces....yes, it was my fault for not checking more carefully but after having so much time to fix it, I had assumed they would have gotten two burgers and fries correct...we tried calling but no one answered.

Rude rude stale rude. Horrible experience every visit. Loud low life's infested this area, its even dangerous. Because the employees are so rude the customers are hostile.  Not the busiest place so food served has gone hard and dry.
Disgusting food disgusting employees. Rolled the dice with hopes of better breakfast service boy was I wrong.

From time to time I order McDonalds when we are on a long drive to the bay and the kids need some replenishing.  This place is usually on the way when we are coming from some kid sporting event so that's why I come here rather than the one on Truxel.  Anyway, there was one morning that I came here since I was coming into work early or needed some food after an early morning doctor's appointment and grabbed some breakfast.  I was shocked when I received my order of the not-so-healthy kind and received a bigger orange juice than other McDonalds near my house (that are of the kid's size rather than the "small" size).  I was happy to see my "small" orange juice and quickly went on my way to my next destination.  The people at the drive thru are really nice and it was a plus that I received a bigger orange juice than normal.  So, yes, when I feel like, I'll come back.

This has to be the worst McDonald's restaurant. I have waited up to 13 minutes and yet I'm the 3rd car waiting in line. This is not just a one time thing this occurs frequently and honestly do not go to this location. I have made several complaints to the headquarters about them not accepting some coupons even though it states its acceptable throughout Sacramento. This location is close to my house but seriously takes a lot longer than the ones I have been through now it has been 20 minutes and I'm waiting for the cashier to get my money. Do not come here!!!

Many of these reviewers have experienced exactly what I experienced, bad customer service. At the drive thru, I practically repeated my self 5 times. I told the lady we wanted a club chicken sandwich meal with no cheese ( #11). We also ordered a #3 meal and 1 apple pie.   Right after we had paid, the lady told me to park my car and wait outside in the front. " Park your car and wait in the front." I asked what do you mean? Do you want me to get out of the drive though? She looked at me with contempt and said "yea".   So I pull out of the drive though, and waited. It looked like they where kind of busy so I could understand why they told me to do this, however getting out of the drive though was a first for me. In addition, her rudeness was unnecessary.   After about 5 minutes another lady pops out with a bag of food, I waved to her and she came. She looked angry  for some reason. I asked her if this was #3 meal and #11 with 1 apple pie. She said " its what ever you ordered, your orders in this bag". After handing it to me, she went inside, no apology for the wait.  We received the following - Club chicken sandwich, 1 medium fries ( we ordered large) and the 1 soda we original got after paying in the drive though. There was a #3 sandwich, no soda and no fries. NO APPLE PIE.   So I get out of my car, go inside and explain to them what I got. They scrambled around asking each other if they had put an apple pie in the bag. After another 2 minutes of waiting, It turns out no one knew if an apple pie went in the bag. She gives me the apple pie but then explains that since I only paid for a sandwich I would only get a sandwich. No apology was given, excess time was wasted and they where beyond rude.  I understand they might have been tired, and busy. But why are you taking your anger out on me, especially when it was your fault to begin with.   So I get home to eat my #11 and find out there's cheese on it. I'm allergic to cheese and had to toss the sandwich out.   Never again will I go to this McDonald's. I will also file a complaint with corporate.

I don't like this place at all! Ones your ordering thru drive thru they ask what would I like to order I tell them and 3 minutes later they comback again and I have to basically repeat myself and the few times I been there 80percent of the time I got the wrong order... they never give napkins we have to ask for ketchup or we will see no ketchup I just hate it...
This location has $1 vanilla cones, boo!  The location on Watt Ave. in North Highlands are only .49 cents!

This Mc donalds i dont even know where to begin...I hate this mcdonalds!!This is the( in my opinion) the worst mc donalds! they are so freaking incompetent there , unorganized the workers they dont care it seems, and they ALWAYS it never fails everytime i go there that they screw my order up!!!! its either missing something or its wrong period, i try to avoid this location as much as possible even though i  live right behind it, if i do go there im always hoping for better service, and i never get it smh. so i wouldnt recommend this location at all

If I could give 0 stars, I would. Just came in yesterday w/ my bf & a very hungry & impatient 3 year old. We waited in line inside for at least 20-25 mins. We were behind a woman w/ a toddler & baby who waited for almost 10 mins for someone to take her order. She kept asking for help but the cashier said she'll be right there. I could tell she was getting frustrated (as I was), so she got tired & left. Then it was our turn, we waited maybe 5-8 mins when the cashier came back. When she read back the order, she thought my bf said number 2 when he said "sweet chili chicken mcwrap" .... Where in the world did you get number 2? Then she was talking in a low soft voice to where you can barely hear her, close to a whisper!  After our order was taken, she went back in the kitchen to help a bit because they were sooo understaffed. You got 2 cooking, 2 in the drive thru, 1 cashier, & 1 sweeping the floor..The line was getting longer, especially since school just got out. 2 ladies were waiting & were also getting frustrated (along w/ everyone in line). After 2 mins, about 6 people left. After that, we waited for almost another 15-20 mins for our food & there was only 1 person ahead if us... What in the world??? Never again!!!!
It's norwood. enough said. Slow service. But my fries were freshly cooked! Lol.

1st time..Worst Service ever! I had a coupon they said they don't take it and I asked why they didn't have any signs that stated that. The supervisor didn't have an answer. Just a waste of time, the supervisor stated to go to another McDonald 10 minutes away. Really, defeats the purpose of having a coupon with gas prices.  2nd time drive thru -they ran out of NUGGETS! I'VE NEVER HEARD OF ANY FAST FOOD RUNNING OUT OF ANYTHING...NUGGETS...ESPECIALLY MCDONALDS...WOWSER..REALLY...  WASTE OF TIME!   :(

Went into Mcdonalds today feeling kinda down. The woman who helped me had a big grin on her face and was nothing but positive. Her great mood was contagious, and I left with a huge smile on my face. I'm giving it 4 stars not for anything else but the fact that a good mood and big smile made such a positive impact on my day, and I really appreciated it!!

Oh gosh i hate norwood micky ds!!! they are sooo dirty! I will never ever go there again! I ordered a big mac the other day before i had class...so i had to go through the drive through...i opened my burger to find dried out meat...cold buns...unmelted cheeeese...and to top it off there was no thousand island on my burger...dry ass burger!!! and my fries were so salty i couldnt even eat them...theyre lucky i had class...or else i would went back and made them refund my money!

It's an average McDonalds, which is to say you'll get 100% what you expect.  There is a children's play area and  one unusual thing is that there is a glass enclosed dining area within the restaurant I'm not sure why.  Maybe if there is a noisy group who wants to use it,  like it would be good for a kid's birthday party.  And then there is a wood paneled dining area that's cool.  Parking is good, bathrooms clean, and easy location on and off  I80 north of downtown by about 2.5 miles
My kids love going to Mcdonalds just for the Toys! I always get 3 same toys, they will like to received different toy everytime we got and we will like to have more variety for kids to choose from.
Nice, quite, and clean location. Waiting time is less than 15 minutes, with good customer service. The food is fast food anyways so I don't have much to talk about it.

Significantly improved since the last time. The hours seem to be more consistent in terms of when they close. Just recently, after a long time, they've gotten their Wi-Fi going again. And they seem to process people better during busy times. Very much better than before. Also, for a long time they have had a homeless problem were homeless folks basically camped out in the lobby for hours and hours. Several of them stayed 24/7 with their cars in the parking lot. This McDonald's clearly has done some stuff to address this issue In the last few months including limiting access to  electrical outlets in the restaurant which were magnets to folks coming simply to charge their phones. Way more enjoyable and pleasant place now.

These people need to learn how to work a drive thru faster. All I wanted was some sweet tea but it took 25 minutes with 4 cars in front of me?! Not only that, I get up to the drive thru window and people just refilling the cups and talking to eachother while I'm waiting for my sweet tea which btw is disgusting. I can't even drink it. It just tastes like bitter watered down tea. How do you screw up sweet tea?..   Slow service.  My sweet tea tasted like garbage.  Slow everything.

This McDonald's is so rude and DISGUSTING! For one, drive thru is SO SLOW. I ordered 3 sausage McMuffins this morning and there was a long piece of hair in the food! My sprite tasted like a club soda sprite! Nasty! There's a worker named chu and Candice , they are so rude. I tell them about my food and sprite and they literally tell me that the only way I can get a new one is if I pay for it and than go and talk shit about me behind the counter as I can still hear them! I don't recommend coming here! Take your money elsewhere! If I could rate it 0 I would. Even 1 star is too good for them! I've also heard that there was a few roaches seen in the bathroom just crawling around! That could be in your guys food so watch out!
Less than 1, food is cold and tastes like poo. Literally food is older than my grandma and she passed away when I was 14.... I'm 27 now

My 950th review!  You know, I've actually remember going to McDonald's when I was a little kid back in the 1990s, and I was felt in loved with their Happy Meals every time of every month by giving a complimentary kid's toys and goodies especially for their burger and fries too. 26 years later as of 3/20/2017, I came back to revisit, and it's my first timer by coming to this East Sacramento's location! What does McDonald's do? It's easy because they serve the customers to taste and enjoy their well known fast food goodies from Egg McMuffin, the Big Mac (their signature favorite), delicious French fries, McCafe's coffee and smoothies and many more! The atmosphere and the concept remain the same as most McDonald's has across the world, and as for this location, it is very well spaced, cleanly and neatly without any debris behind.  The employees here are doing a great job for making the customers like me a fine service! Very friendly and approachable! No cons!  Now onto something interestingly good here! I ordered one of their limited time seasonal drink of Shamrock Chocolate Chip Shake in a small sized cup. It contains the remaining amounts of Shamrock ingredients filled with blended chocolate mint pieces and milk. It concludes with a top of whipped cream with colorful green sparkles. As I drank it, that smoothie was sensational! I can feel the flavors of both Shamrock and Chocolate Chip combined into a fantastical, drinkable dessert! Blended perfectly without the remaining chunks of ice cubes. Delightful!  There's a good amount of parking spaces available, so you can park anywhere you want near or far. Also, you can enter thru the drive thru area, so you can order your meals in few minutes. Finally, you can ride a bike, walk or public transportation too without the hassles and gimmicks.  All in all, McDonald's at Folsom Blvd in the East Sacramento neighborhood is the finest and the simplest worldwide franchise fast food restaurant that I've ever experienced. Perfect for all ages from young to old. "I'm lovin' it!" My rating: 4 solid stars.
I went to the Drive-Thru at around 11 a week ago and nobody answered. I went to the next speaker and still nobody answered. This was just awful service in general.

Male Geriatric Daycare 11am to 3pm - DINING AREA - FREE  I was here at 1:30PM on Tuesday afternoon.  Customer service is not the worst I've experienced, but it's pretty close.  No greeting at the counter.  Grumpy workers.  The dining area is dirty and looks like it hasn't been cleaned in several hours.  The worst part for me specifically, are the loud patrons in the back-corner of the lobby.  Every time I've been here around this time, there are 4 to 6 white men (approximately in their 60's & 70's) who sit in the back corner of the lobby.  They are not rude and do not bother me personally, but they are extremely loud and annoying.  I'm on the opposite side of the lobby from them right now and I can hear there entire conversation like they're sitting right next to me.  I'm assuming the Mcdonalds let's them hang out here cause at some point in time perhaps they ordered a food item? I don't know, but literally they are here every time come in.  I always regret coming here every time but I never learn my lesson.  Perhaps this time will finally be my last.

Now that they make the quarter pounder w real beef it takes forever to get through the drive through. The guy in front of me just jumped the curb to get out of line. Also I hate how the fries are so bland now. Back in the day they were good when they used beef tallow.

This is the worst McDonald's ever been to in my life.  I forgot that this was that bad of a McDonald's, and it is the second time I've come here. Fool me once, shame on you, fool me twice shame on me. I give myself one star for coming back here.

McDonald's, I can't quit you.   Lord knows I've tried. Your highly-processed, additive-laced, corporate-laboratory-created, environmentally and ethically appalling "food" has been a staple of my diet ever since I had the spare change and independence to eat on my own. I'm the first to admit my hypocrisy - shaming your mammoth empire and the drug you push while continually coming back for more. In my own warped mind, it only makes sense to review the local store I visit the most as some sort of compromise.   What's refreshing about this McDonald's is the human element. You may be ordering a carbon copy of the same assembly line "food" you could get anywhere else, but it's refreshing when the human being serving it expresses kindness and a personality. Those manning the drive-thru have always been quite friendly, even when lines of hangry borderline diabetics impatiently honk and rev their engines as they await their next fix.   This is also one of the cleaner McDonald's. I've been to other locations (namely the one off Alhambra) whose "dining areas" look like they were abandoned or turned into a makeshift homeless shelter. Here, the employees seem to at least take some pride in keeping everything clean.   It's enough to keep me coming back, health and personal values be damned.

I don't know about this place it looks just like every other remodeled McDonald's but the stuff here is amazing their service is  amazing. They did my order so fast that I when I poured my soda and was about to be seated, they called my number. I was amazed my their speed. Their workers do understand what is the teamwork

Terrible service. Almost very order was wrong, the poor girl at the register had no help. The line was out the door, and when she asked for help they tolf er the til was elpty. The girl in the grill area was in an argument with the drivethru runner.  Took us over 15 mins to get to the register to order. And another 20min to get our food. We ordered 3 hamberger happy meals and 4 mc doubles...  We had to walk back up to ask where out order was.. when we got out order it was wrong!  what was so difficult about our order to take so long.     Terrible terrible service

Easily one of the worst drive thrus. Horrible service, you'd think the manager would be better, nope. Waited in line 25 minutes only for them to say their mobile service wasn't working and then had the audacity to get mad once we asked to order since we had waited so long already. Then took about 30 minutes to get our food to us. Save yourself the trip and go to the next McDonald's.

If you are going to spend the money to remodel then keep it clean. Really dirty. Soda machines have slimey stuff on them. Tables, chairs not wiped down. Slow service. Out of buttermilk nuggets at 12:15 pm. Orders wrong. Won't come back to this one.

They were super rude. I asked for fresh everything, and normally Mc Donald's would put it on the screen but this one didn't and when I asked if my food was fresh, the response was "we always make it fresh" with an attitude and little did you know when they hand me my food NOTHING WAS FRESH. Fries were super soggy and overly salty. Disappointed. I normally don't Yelp but Jesus Christ that was a horrible experience.
