I come here on Fridays after class to grab breakfast before going home. As a poor college student, I often eat at McDonald's for their inexpensive and, for the most part, consistent food. But every time I have gone to this location they have managed to mess up my order. For example, I wanted an egg white delight without the Canadian bacon; what I received was a McMuffin with only Canadian bacon on it?? The next time I ordered an iced caramel macchiato and got a cup of milk with caramel sauce. I'm not sure if it's poorly trained staff or what, but it's one of the worst McDonald's I've been visited.

Horrible services. Went in the drive through last night and waiting close to 20 min in line and finally had to back out of line as did everyone else. HORRIBLE SERVICES and always dirty inside and lots of homeless there. STAY AWAY and go elsewhere.....
Got one of those new Signature Crafted Sandwiches and the grilled chicken was dry AF.  Also the fries were a little too salty.

I don't write reviews for fast food chains because I already expect shitty service but I'm usually in and out of there.  I wasn't even going to waste my time writing this despite what just happened there but, when I got home and I didn't see the egg and cheese (first world probs) after using a coupon that I can't get back, I had to. I pulled up at 6:10am there card reader wasn't working (that's out of their control, I'm a reasonable person) so I went to the bank across the street and came back. I specifically ordered a sausage, egg and cheese mcgriddle and 2 mcmufins. My order came out to be $7 and some change. I gave her $20 and she gave me $6.98 back. As soon as I pulled up to the food window, I realized and notified her co worker. She takes awhile and comes back saying the girl at the register gave me the right change. Meaning, the girl handling money truly believed  $20-$7 = $6. I worked at KFC in high school and they had minimal requirements; know common sense and take/give exact change. If it were a couple cents or even a dollar I probably wouldn't have noticed or really cared to be honest. I'm not rich by any means(I used a coupon) but it isn't worth the drive back and hassling with people who hate their job to begin with. But you're going to short me $6 and have the audacity to say your calculations are correct? So, on the drive home I thought, "they better have put fucking egg and cheese on those overpriced $4 mcgriddles". Take a guess.  **edit**  After writing this review, I went to go eat my food and they forgot to put the egg on both the mcmufins as well. Bravo, I wasn't even being a dick to y'all but it's ok. You work at McDonald's and can't even do that right.

I ordered a big breakfast and i received a super small portion of egg. Our friend ordered the same breakfast and received 3x the amount of egg. They dont seem to have a portion control standard on some of their meals. I will go to a better Mcdonalds.
Worst mcdonds I have ever been too..My entire order was cold and drink was wrong.. I will not be back here.

Ok not the most glamorous spot to grab lunch, but ya know what? They have a huge parking lot, the interior is clean (including the restroom!), the service was polite, and my McNuggets were some of the best I've ever had, fried up fresh and hot! Nice job!

I was super disappointed after ordering a hazelnut latte. Usually, I get an iced one. Forgot to specify today. I figured it didn't matter much since it's getting colder out. Sadly, my latte was 2" from the brim! And even then cappuccino levels of foam. I could have gone to Starbucks and spent 50 cents more for a REAL latte. Having said all that, they DO always get my order right and the food has met my expectations with the food... it's fast. Lol so they get a 3* anyway.

came here they close in an hour & they won't take me order. i even drove up to the window and there she was sitting there not looking at me when i tried to get here attention. extremely rude!! will be calling corporate!

Not sure what happened here! This location has gone downhill. It is in need of a makeover fast! New staff, warm food & correct orders are a must! Went to the  drive thru,  ordered. The cashier repeated my order. I paid n got to the next window n was given something else! While waiting another staff member came to give me food that was still not my order! I had to pull to the side for like ten minutes. One would think my food would be hot.. no where near! Another visit about a month later was in the area  to get my car washed close by so walked over to sit inside and have some fries. Heard another customer in line asking how much longer? Was waiting for her McDouble for over fifteen minutes.. yikes! My order didn't take quite as long but was a lengthy wait! Again cold food.. fries are never to be served cold! I asked for different ones n was obliged with some eye rolls, huffs n puffs. I ended up waiting another ten minutes to get them! Ended up giving it to the homeless man outside..I'll know better to splurge on a different treat not here!

I went here to get a drink in the drive through. I asked for a Large drink, half lemonade half sweet tea. Sounds simple enough right? Apparently not. "Our machine is automatic so that's actually not possible."  To which I responded, "Can I order this drink if I come inside?" "Yes."  Anyone see the stupidity here? Not possible? More like you're being lazy and incompetent.

They never seem to keep their posted hours. Ive had the drive thru lights turn off 20 minutes before they were supposed to close as I sat at the menu board. their customer service is better than the drive thru on Howe  ave though.

This is the mcdonalds close to my house. But im giving them only 2 stars because they are always closing earlier then the time they should. We have to drive to the one downtown. They are supposed to close at midnight on fridays. We were there at 11:30pm n they were already closed.

We have been to this McDonald's a few times. Today and the last time we went through the drive through. Both times we have gone my husband has ordered a double cheese burger and both times he has got a reg cheeseburger in a double cheese burger box. Our food has been cold and just sloped together. No longer we will be going to This location.   I

This McDonald's seems more upscale than the other McDonald's I go to. I like it! McDonald's trying to modernize their establishment and trying to change their image. However, in my mind McDonalds is still gonna be McDonalds. Every time I come here, I receive fast and friendly service.   I usually get mcdouble with Big Mac sauce and for breakfast.the big breakfast platter. Everytime I go to McDonalds,  it also seems like they are raising the prices of the value menu (not dollar menu anymore) cents by cents. Oh wells, I'll come here when I'm craving some McDonalds.
Bought an oatmeal and large orange juice. The oatmeal was extremely watery and the orange juice was warm.
I like the Southwest Salad, it's so good and even healthy.  That's all I get.  This McDonalds is really nice and the employees are always friendly.  I would highly recommend this McDonalds.

I'm here at the McDonald's at 11:55 p.m. it says they close at midnight. The lights are on. I sit in the drive thru and nobody answers. I sat there for three minutes went up to the front window lights are still on nobody in sight. Two cars in the parking lot so somebody's actually there. Workers obviously don't want to serve somebody 5 minutes before closing but I'm curious how the owner of this McDonald's feels that he's missing out on income during operating hours. Looks like I'm not going to this McDonald's again.

After about the 5th time these guys have gotten my order wrong, I feel compelled to review. I don't expect much from mcdonalds, and I'm pretty forgiving when they get my order wrong on occasion. But I can safely say that every time I've ordered a double quarter pounder-no bun- my order comes out as a single patty.  Today I checked my order quickly and it looked right, but when I got back to work and actually took a good look, it was of course, a single patty. And not on shredded lettuce as I requested. It was too late to turn around and fix my order.  Sigh. My office is between the Folsom mcdonalds and the one on Alhambra, so the latter will be getting my lunchtime business from now on.

The worst, slowest, most unorganized McDonalds I have ever been at! Seriously, every time they make something wrong and I'm only asking for things like, no onions. They are always goofing off inside. The fries are always way too cold. They either don't salt the fries enough or, they are covered in salt. They are only consistent in their inaccuracy and inconsistency. Corporate seriously needs to throw out every employee and start over. It's a mess!

No joke, there's a guy named Ronald that works here. Real cool little dude with superb customer service and a great attitude! I went through the drive thru and they happened to forget three filet-o-fishes (my fault for not checking at the window)... so I pulled up front, and before I could get outta my car that dude Ronald was all up in front of me with the missing three filet o fishes and with two large fries! Hooked it up and was real apologetic and cool about it. That's whats up
This place fails, the manager is a douche. I asked for some mustard this guy hands me one packet then turns his back and walks off. I don't know how he became a manager but they need to switch.

We come here every few nights to get out of the house and get some work done on our laptops. The area is Ok and the staff is friendly. We have used the drive through on several occasions and they forget things sometimes. But they always seem to fix it if we are go in and ask them too. The place is clean except for when a bum wonders in and decides to take a bath in the sink at the bathrooms. There are allot of shady people around the area, probably because of the location that they are in.it will do in a pinch.

Went to get breakfast order time 1013 received order 1040. Line of customers complaining. Then I get almost home no orange juice.  I gave two stars due to the young ladies working the drive through and front register were really trying to help.
Love this McDonald's... good customer service
No play area for kids, but the service was good.  I felt the staff was friendly and professional unlike many other McD's I've been to.  Perhaps because its in a nice neighborhood?

Went in the other day and manager was so rude and short with me. Accused me of stealing beverages and took my cups. Really? Your gonna be that cheap and rude? I will not be returning and will be telling friends to go to the mcdonalds down the road ;)
I'll stop at any McD's for a Diet Coke, love the $1 for a large soda.
Just stopped by real quick before heading back home to Chico and got excellent drive thru service! Super genuinely friendly staff!

My friend and I received the most friendly service we have ever had at any McDonald's. We were in the drive thru and the gentleman working the cash register/taking our order was the one of the nicest employees! He has a really cool radio voice, we didn't catch his name but we will returning! There should be more people like him working in customer service!

I think I am done going to this location. Their drive thru is a joke. I don't know how many times they messed my order up. It's not like I'm asking for anything special. Either the wrong meal is given to me, the wrong drink, Don't know their own advertised specials, etc. Today I ordered a drink, large Sweet Tea. I get to work and drink it, it's regular tea. This is not the first time. I will kit be coming here anymore. It's a shame because I work down the street. The last rant are their prices. They are more expensive than the location on Alhambra.
Went to drive thru.. They forgot to give us our sundae cone.. Had to honk and wave them down.. They could have better service

Sac State students, show your One Card with every meal purchase and you get a free soft serve ice cream cone or small fries. Make sure you show it before you pay because person at the register can be pretty dull. On my last visit, my friend showed them the card after making the purchase and the cashier said that we had to do it before paying which made no sense seeing as its free food... Other than that doofus, its a good deal.
One of the worst mcdonalds I've ever been too. The place smells like toilet water and the customer service here sucks! Avoid having Ashley help you she's terrible!

Cheap food, not the cheapest prices. Sometimes when I go in the store is clean and kept up, sometimes it's messy and needs attention. The workers are usually friendly. I only go once in a great while when I forget to bring a packed lunch for work.
Lazy ass workers. Guy didn't even know how to give the correct change. He didn't do crap but stay on his phone smh. So rude ! When we weren't ready he screamed at our faces .Zero stars

Multiple times this location has closed before the listed times. On 2 different occasions at 2 different times 1am being the latest and 12:30am being the earliest, they were closed. The listed time says they close at 2am. So...? And when they are open the workers are snotty, rude, and unprofessional. One time I ordered a 20 piece nugget and right when she handed me the bag I looked inside (the worker was standing right there) and told her she forgot the sauce on the side that I paid for (Big Mac sauce) and she went off accusing me that I took it out the bag and I was lying. Seriously? I wanted to just throw all my change at her so she would shut up. If you want a McDonald's just drive up to Calvine.

I stopped into the McDonald's at this location, McDonald's #11296, to grab a quick bite and use the restroom. The entire experience was very good.  The bathrooms are locked but the owner pressed a key fob and it unlocked the door. What a great tool for counter staff: less interruption, looking for and reaching for keys. The bathrooms were clean, probably the cleanest of any public place I've been to.  I ordered from one of electronic kiosks near the counter. I've never seen or used one. What a great tool to order and pay for food and drinks especially when one is in a rush. I don't know if it speeds things up for orders or cooking but it's simple to use. One can pay with credit or debit card or pay cash when they go to counter, simply taking the printed receipt to cashier.   The employees were professional, friendly and seemed to be working in sync with each other and the various processes. They were in updated uniforms (or maybe plain personal attire, I couldn't tell). The owner, I cannot recall his name, was a stellar example of customer service and represented McDonald's well! He had a can-do how can i help you attitude. I verbally provided my feedback to him. In addition to Yelp, I completed the online survey.  Outside there were parking spots for text/app ordering and meal pickup. He dining room was very clean. The soda fountain and condiments area was immaculate.  I don't eat at McDonald's often, usually it's when I'm go go go with my mobile dog walking biz. I will keep this place in mind when I'm back in the area and in need of a quick bite.
The workers here are very rude! They never smile and always have an attitude. Customer service should be number 1 and they lack that severely. Please get better management and workers

So my boyfriend ordered a McGriddle triple stack at McDonald's off Gerder and when we opened the wrapper and all it had was 3 buns !!! Like wtf really !!!!! Really disappointed ! I couldn't go back to get a new one because I was already on the road so I had to buy a whole other new one !!! Shame !

I understand why this location only has 1 and 1/2 stars. Their customer service is TERRIBLE. I got completely ignored at the 2nd order window, then the little sh*t that was taking money at the window had nerve to give me attitude when I tried to ask her if it was broken. Never going to this location ever again.

This is the 2nd time ive had my orders messed up at this location. Apparently they leave out and "forget" your main things that come with your meal. Would not ever come here again and i live 3 minutes away.

Drive thru sucks. They do not know how to use the 2 lane system, meaning if you go in the second lane you WILL get skipped and ignored if you say something. After this last time we left without ordering. Will NOT be returning to this location.

So I went to the drive thru window tonight at 9:30 9/23/18 and I pulled up to the second window where there was this heavy Asian guy who I simply asked for ranch and ketchup and he looked at me stupid and said " a what? " with the nastiest attitude while I was being polite and repeated myself but he rolled his eyes shook his head and went angry to get it. Whoever manages that place, I highly recommend you see who was working that shift because he obviously didn't wanna be there and needs to be more polite especially if a customer is being nice. I come here since it's close to home and had never had any rude employee run ins at this mcds until this guy.
The coffee we ordered was watered down. I think it's a regional thing because the other location we went to did the same thing. Not until we left the Sacramento region did we get nice brewed coffee.

Worst mc Donald's.  You have to tell them your order 4 times for them to still get it wrong.  It kinda embarrassing how bad it is.   Check all of your food before you leave each time, otherwise your order will be wrong.  I don't think it's the food prep guy or girl it's the person taking the order.

Too bad 0 stars isn't an option, because that is definitely what this place would get. I'm writing this review for today in the drive-thru -- which brings me to my first question: Why have 2 drive thrus if you're just going to SKIP all the people waiting in one line while you're only helping people in another? It took me 35 minutes to leave the crappy line. No surprise there.  So after being ignored for 10 minutes at the drive-thru box, my order was finally taken by an unapologetic and insincere employee who literally just barked my total at me and then shut off her mic. Also, they had a hand-written sign taped to their order box that said they ran out of soda at 2 in the afternoon.  Sad to say you should probably drive the extra 5 to 10 minutes JUST to avoid this terrible place.

Tried to give 0 stars it looks nice but the restaurant is nasty homeless walking in and out like nothing you try to eat and u look over and you see a dude swinging snot from his nose for 15minutes straight nasty do not come here will not be coming here in the future even tried to tell an employee and she look at me mean mugged me and walked away with out a word so do not come here
The manger is always rude . Like what example are you setting ? Then I asked for a fresh apple Pie the shit was burnt crisp .

Last week, I used McDonald's drive-thru to get a special request large drink made. My drink was suppose to be 1/2 unsweetened tea and 1/2 Powerade. The McDonald's order taker mentioned to me as soon as I pulled up, " My manager told me that we don't mix drinks".  The sad part was that a young single mother almost hit me in drive thru and their toddler was in the back seat of the car. The toddler was walking back and forth in the car. It was horrifying to watch. All I could do was back up the car since no car was behind me and let this young mother have the right away.  I use to work in McDonald's. It's not hard to do what I requested. All they had to do was take the child's size cup/small cup/water cup to mix both and then give me no ice.  Many times I look at the cooking and preparation floors when I'm in drive thru. It's a nightmare!  My mind set is if the floor is nasty then I know the servers that prepare the food it's questionable if they uphold a basic  standard of hygiene or follow common sense protocol.  It's sad to see that McDonald's/Burger King/Wendy's/ etc is a fast food franchise that has no accountability to it's customers, has horrible customer service and lacks taste in 90% of their featured items and they expect for us to pay for it. The actual PR looks more inviting than the actual food or service. McDonald's/ Burger King/Wendy's greed and arrogance is so common place! This is why many customers like me are ignoring the fast food places like McDonald's, Burger King etc.  We prefer to buy a consistent delicious meal from places like In and Out, the Habit or Chick-Fil-A!
Waiting time sucks for dine in and drive thru. They never puts napkins in the bag. Food is usually hot tho.
I went to this location two days in a row and there's no connection to the app.  I cancelled my order twice and went to the Mack Rd location where the app works.    Too bad no stars is not an option.

My ice coffee was spoiled wtf mc donalds. You would think these chains had to be up to some levle of food safeness before they serve anything. This pissed me off royaly for the entire day. You messed with my coffee in the morning. Are you people seriously that incompetent that you can't check expiration.  to top off the rancid coffee, the woman who handed me my food sounded under the weather.

I usually give pretty generous star rating for my reviews but I can't for this specific review.  If I can give 0 star, I would.    This is the worst McDonald's I have been to.  Customer service is horrible!  I got there and there was no one in line.  I was waiting to be helped but no one acknowledged me.  They did see me but didn't do anything.  Even the store manager ignored me.  When one of the staff finally "saw" me, she didn't even apologize.  I don't really care much if they apologized or not but at least provide a good service.    The girl that helped me must be new because when I was trying to use a coupon, she needed help from the manager.  The manager came over and didn't seem like she wanted to be there.  I was confused on how they charged my order so I questioned it.  The manager was very rude and gave me an attitude.  At the end, I got ripped off.  I will no longer be coming to this specific location.  Save the hassle and go elsewhere.
I ordered a plain hamburger happy meal for my daughter that doesn't eat cheese. Came home n found a triple cheeseburger in her bag omfg for reals???

i went here with my family to get dessert. I ordered an Oreo McFlurry. All they did was fill the cup with ice cream and sprinkle Oreo crumbs on top. Highly disappointing when you were expecting an actual McFlurry.
I see why it's only a 1.5 star rating! How the hell are you out of chicken nuggets?! One of the top things bought at this restaurant except for this location I guess. Won't make this mistake again

Every f*cking time I order something with an Artisan Bun via the McDonalds BOGO app, they keep F*CKING burning the buns. If it's not COMPLETELY burnt to sh*t, it's always AT LEAST partially burnt. This happened twice already (out of the 3-4 times I've been there) but I was courteous enough to brush it off even though it literally wasn't busy... AT ALL. Seriously though, how... just HOW? Here's a good idea.. why don't cooks remove the buns from the grill BEFORE it turns burnt/black as sh*t. I'm gonna check the buns from now on because the cooks at this specific store location are completely incompetent and deserve to be fired. I should've taken pictures of the other two times also to add to this but I didn't think it'd happen AGAIN and gave them the benefit of the doubt. For anyone reading this, just CHECK your burger buns before leaving the store, especially if its an Artisan Bun *facepalm*  (Burger was cut into pieces for my little cousins)

Literally the worst McDonald's I have ever been too.  They close an hour before there store time says and on this particular visit today I as stuck in line for the drive thru for a whopping 17 minutes before getting my order taken. If it weren't for me being stuck Between cars I would have went home. This mcdonalds needs new management cause after 5pm it's horrible service.
I live close to this McDonald and it sucks last time I went was just to get a salad and it took a whole hour or 2 and then someone else was just waiting for two cheeseburgers it was ridiculous.

Don't eat here! Had the worst service here! Slow, messed up in my orders, gave me cold fries, and gave my kid expired milk in her happy meal. This McDonalds is a disgrace! And though one young gentleman was apologetic about the long wait, the lady at the pick up window did not have any customer service skills whatsoever. Told her the fries were cold and tasted old, and she retorted that they tasted fine. I called the complaint number on the bottom of the receipt but is still awaiting all call from somebody. Won't EVER be coming back here!

Came here a few days ago it was good I got the #1 Big Mac meal it was ok the fries were really good & the guy at the drive thru was really friendly I didn't get his name but he gave us extra Ketchup n wasn't a a**hole about it he was really friendly & FYI Big Macs taste so much better with a tomato in it!!!   Only thing is the lines were long n the parking lot needed to be swept!! Other then that it was great!!

I rarely go to this location because every time I do, my order is always wrong. I've also never bothered to write a review because I didn't think it mattered, but today was just another confirmation on why I don't go here. Their ATM/credit card machine apparently works and doesn't work to it's own timing. So today, I was unable to pay for my food because I didn't have cash. Also, I don't know if their ice cream machine is just permanently broken or just so happens to always be down when I come through.  Drive the short extra distance to the location on Calvine and Power Inn, Lowe's shopping center.

I arrived at 10:54am there were only 3 customers ahead of me. All I wanted was a large coffee.. we did not see a cashier for more than 10 minutes.  When she Finally APPEARED THE First customer just wanted an egg biscuit, if I had any doubt about how long the people ahead of me had waited I knew when the 2nd customer in line stepped up to the cashier and said "I will pay for his order just get on with it!" None of us (the first four in line) had large orders: 2 ordered breakfast sandwiches and coffee the other 2 just ordered coffee.  Besides the 4 waiting to order there were 3 waiting for their orders they did not get their orders for more than 10 minutes either. This McDonalds takes the Fast out of Fast Food. I have had substandard service here before but it is the closest McDonalds to where I live and I figured if all I am getting is coffee or iced tea how bad can they screw up right?  Today they reached a new alltime low

The service here is the WORST ! Drive thru takes forever!! And they always forget something from my order (sauce, a straw, SOMETHING) and I just sat in the drive thru for over 20 minutes for one mcchicken. If you are waiting on something PARK THE CAR HOLDING UP THE DRIVE THRU. The lady in front of me is waiting on a fudge Sundae. COME ON!

The lady who delivered the coffee to my car was rude when i told her she got my order wrong she grabbed only one coffee and said omg ill fix it. First of all dont give me attitude when you messed up my order. I did not ask for whip cream and how she fixed it was to scoop out the whipped cream and hand them back to us. So i had to ask for the manager and she ran in the back to hide. I could be allergic to whip cream and all you do is scoop it out! How disgusted i am by your behavior and attitude towards your customers. Get management together and fix your workers because the way i was treated today is unacceptable. On top of it how is three coffees $25 from mcdonalds thats crazy i went accross the street to starbucks and was treated with respect and only paid $18 for three coffees. Zero stars should be awarded here cuz im annoyed by how they handled tge situation

On 10/24 I placed my order and the time on my receipt said 3:10 pm. There were 2  customers sitting in the dining area with their drinks. I waited and waited. They appeared to be moving the drive thru orders along. Or so I thought. An angry customer came in to complain that she waited in the drive thru for 20 minutes and they didn't put enough sugar in her coffee.  I was standing at the counter and was watching the employee that was assembling the sandwiches. Paint dries faster than she moved. I turned my phone on and started capturing the slowest crew I have ever seen in a fast food restaurant. There wasn't any supervisors in the area until 3:29. As they filed out of a room in the back the crew began to speed up. My #3 meal was handed to me at 3:34 pm.  I will return to this location because they are close to the place I do my laundry. And one can only hope the crew has moved on to new opportunities

I've been in the food and beverage service industry for well over 5 years, I know good customer service from beyond wonderful and on the rarest occasion that I visit this location, I had no such experience. I normally don't even bother taking the time to even say anything but today was just horrible.  I went through the drive thru and the girl taking my order kept repeating my order incorrectly as if she wasn't listening clearly to begin with. Mind you, I'm ordering a few meals for my family. After I pay at the first window, I go to the second window to pick up my food. She hands me my tray of drinks and the window shuts and I continue to wait.  Now, the customers behind me are honking and yelling at me to move... I WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN VERBALLY ABUSED IF I WAS INFORMED THAT MY ORDER WAS A BIT LARGER THAN OTHER CUSTOMERS ORDERS AND THAT IT WAS GOING TO TAKE A BIT LONGER AND THAT I NEEDED TO BE PARKED AND HAVE MY ORDER WALKED OUT TO ME.  I was told AFTER THE FACT.  I literally live down the street from this location and I refuse to return. The staff is horrible. The food is below sub par if not terrible. My fries taste old! They don't deserve a higher minimum wage.

This place deserves no stars. I went in for the all day breakfast at like 10:30 in the morning. As I was telling the man that took my order about me wanting to get breakfast,  he said "we're not serving that anymore" and I'm like "but it says all-day breakfasts right on the board" and he replies back a little frustrated and says "ok what do you want to order " I told him what I wanted but at the end when I had to pay he made someone switch off with him and a girl finished my order.   I waited about 20 minutes for 4 breakfast sandwiches and it was for "here" and I was planning to eat inside. At first I was a bit upset about how they put it in a bag then on a tray like it should've been. When I opened my bag and my sandwiches,  it turns out.. once again they messed up my order.. but this time I wasn't going to just let it go.   I told my boyfriend to go up and tell the manager that the order was incorrect and I wanted an egg and sausage sandwich but instead I got ham and egg.. the lady rudely replied back to my boyfriend and said "no that was what you ordered " and he came back to me. So I decided to go up there and tell her that I want my ordered fixed, potitely. Then she goes rudely of course "okay well I'm just going to take the ham out and put sausage on it"  This McDonalds has messed on a couple of my orders and I've brushed it off for awhile because mistakes happen. But this time was just not okay. I'm never coming here again.

I'm always surprised when I get an order right. When coming to this location, I always find myself double checking to see if they placed everything in my bag, or if I was rung up correctly. This morning I got rung up for four sausage burritos and only received 2. I wasn't handed the receipt, so I couldn't ask the guy at the last window. Quiet honestly, I wasn't surprised. That's what I get for coming to this location. I have extremely low standards for service at a fast food joint, but the minimal I  except is to be rung up correctly and having ALL my food in my bag. Since that is never the case at this location, 1 star and 0 if I could.

I don't recommend  this place is NASTY....better off going to Calvine..... Fries are brown and nasty... And they never ever have anything right..... They should hire new staff owner sucks.....Elk Grove is better. They don't even deserve one star
Slowest McDonalds I have been to by far better off going to fruitridge Rd and power inn rd
Dont dine in...service is slow..they only had ice  in 1 of the soda machines and that one was over flowed with water..u have to ask for ketchup napkins and straws because they dnt keep them out...

This mcdonalds have the worst customers services!! Not once, but every time I order from here. Food is always cold, french fries are old and hard and seems like they used old oil because the fries never taste fresh!!! It's time I call their cooperate office!   FYI- I'm only rating this 1 star so It'll let me post, otherwise they don't even deserve a single star.

Wouldn't rate it a 2 stars.. Came to this McDs 6 hours ago before heading to school... went in the lobby and the line was not that long, but it was taking FOREVER to order (btw, it did not look busy at all to me). It took me about 20 - 30 minutes to wait and finally order what I wanted, which was an Oreo Mcflurry for my little nephew.   So I was waiting in line, one of the shift managers told a crew member to bring the sweet tea (I guess to brew more?) inside and she walked in front of me and didn't even say "Excuse me". That was kinda rude which kinda made me mad a bit because at least say something if you're gonna walk past by me and need some space with that tea bucket thing you're holding.   Also, they never follow what you ordered. One time, I ordered an orange juice with ICE in the drive thru. Came up to the second window, there was no ice in the juice -.- I know it's just ice, but hello! that's what I ordered, shouldn't I be getting it with ice?   Service = POOR. My mom yelled at me and asking me why it took so long. Never again with this McDonalds.

I wanted Mac sauce instead of mustard and ketchup. I was told it would cost me 40 cents for that change. The crew chief said they couldn't "Substitute" a condiment but had to "Add" it as a supplement which required additional money. Reluctantly, he agreed to do it after I explained it was a regular order I place at all McDonalds restaurants including this one.   I pulled up the corporate web sight to ask if there was a standard policy on condiment substitutions. After all, it's seems to be an even trade monetarily. It's just a condiment; not a vegetable or piece of meat! I only received "Auto replies" from the corporate sight but was told the local restaurant owner would contact me by way of email or phone call. A week later I received a survey asking if I was contacted by the owner. I responded "Not yet" Another week has gone by and still no contact.  The survey also asked what I would do if there was no web sight available to voice my concerns. I responded "Voice concern on another site or social media" Well, here it is! By the way, the initial service provider was cordial but became stressed after being put in the middle of an ordeal that wasn't necessary. I apologized to her and the customers behind me. Shouldn't that have been the crew chief doing the apologies?

What the HELL!!!! Why do I keep giving place second chances...I go into the drive thru from Hell...order a 10 piece nugget and a filet o fish....and I get cold hard nuggets and a filet o fish that has the hardest bun ever!!!!  WHY!!!!!  Does this place even use their food timers!?!?! I'm done with this McDonald's.....and I used to work here too....seven years ago...

first of all, they had no customer service skills at all, looks like they just wanted to get rid of the customers. My fries were filled like halfway, I asked for southwest dressing and they gave me ranch, and they handed my food to me so rudely. I've never written a review on yelp before but felt this needed to be done.

i didnt get my reciept for my order. but i was just here in between 7 & 7:30pm 9/16/2015 i ordered a big mac & one order of medium fries. Fries were not fresh, they were stale. It was disgusting. I dont get mcdonalds often at all, but i got them for my dad and this is very disappointing. I know you guys are fast food workers and everything and not making as much as you want cus you settled to work at a fast foods. but until you get your life together and get a better job you need to treat customers with respect and dont give us food thats been sitting there all day. Not acceptable.

This place seems to have trouble getting  orders right. You can tell them at the speaker, and they seem to not be able to hear correctly. You can ask them to correct the order at the window. But, they'll still can't get it right.  I gave them my money, looked at my receipt and saw they still got it wrong.  At that point, I figured it was easiest to just take what they were giving me.  The food tasted okay, it just wasn't what I wanted.

What freaking Mickey 's charge for freaking ketchup?  I went to the drive through this midnight and the cashier was rude. So I shrugged it off. Second window comes I waited dam near 10 minutes to get my food, isn't it supposed to fast food. So I waited patiently for my food then after 10 minutes or so I received it. Then I asked the lady for some ketchup and she says "can you look at the sign we charge for extra sauce". Really lady it's just ketchup. Worst Mickey d's in Sacramento.

The worst service ever chau the manager was so rude when I was asking him since ur drink machine is broken why do I have to pay extra for a water or orange juice and I come every morning and order the same thing. He Ridley explained to me he doesn't care if I come every morning or not I need to pay extra or leave. Well there it is they will never get my hard earned money again

I unfortunately have a weak spot for Mcdonald's...the food just tastes so good, even though i'm sure it's the worst thing you could put in your body. This location is close to my house so I go here whenever I get a craving and the line for the drive through is always soooo long and takes FOREVER to get through. The people that work during the day are great, but the night shift needs a LOT of improving!!!

The only reason I didn't rate ONE star: It's recently been remodeled and really nice on the inside. You'd think that an entire remodel would shape up their work ethic too... not so much.  This place sucks and it's too bad it's the closest one to my house. I do not go to Mcdonald's for food for the most part, I go mainly for their McCafe drinks, soda, smoothies etc.   After sun down, good luck getting a warm McCafe drink. I don't know how many times I've heard, "I'm sorry, our machines are actually being cleaned right now..." Literally have heard this at least 5 times. Drove right through the drive-thru because that's the only thing I came for.  Honestly, I think they're too lazy to keep the drinks open so they close it down for the whole night... just to have one less thing to clean at the end of the night.   Simple orders will have you in the drive-thru FOREVER. Get comfortable. A few times, I just put my car in park. I've seen someone TURN OFF their car because the wait was so long.  Just drive a little extra for a different location!

This place never gets orders correct. There's is nothing more irritating then getting home and your order is wrong. McDonalds fries are usually one of the best. But these always taste like they where cooked in old grease and are so hard.

Came here after school to enjoy a good meal but when I paid for my meal, the cashier claimed my money to be fake. She then went to tell the manager/supervisor about the situation.  Without even looking at the 5 dollar bill, he comes out the room and up to the window to tell me my money is fake. He wouldn't even show me proof and kept my money. I still ended up paying for the meal and the food and wasn't even good. The fries were cold and soggy!

Recently they rebuilt this McDonald's and supposedly upgrade the inside. However, their customer service is terrible, they lack beating their timer to get people out of drive-thru. Foodwise? Terrible, soggy, not even fresh even after I had made it super clear I wanted to get fresh fries and such. To be honest, from before they renovated their service sucked, and even after with a new squad, they still suck.. Never coming back to this McDonald's... I don't even know why I gave them a second chance.

Honestly the worst mcdonalds ever.  I was trying to order a meal, the person taking the order asked " coke soda? " , like no I'm here to buy drugs.  -.- seriously.  I also asked for a grill chicken sandwich, and somehow it ends up with a hamburger patty . This happened to me 5 times... Lol. One time i went home with no patty, thats right ...i specified i didn't want any bacon, instead I got lettuce, tomato, bacon in two buns.  Worst thing about this all is their customer service sucks. Always so rude.

They are one of the worst McDonald's in the Sacramento area everytime I go here there always either getting my order wrong or the food is old or stale they really need to practice better.customer service and better food preparation it's horrible
I've been to this location several times and I wouldn't recommend it. Service sucks. My French fries were soggy :(

If I could give zero stars I would.  I went in today at 1:05 pm today.  The cashier went to make a phone call while I stood in front of the cash register waiting.  There was a line forming behind me.  No one came to serve us.  I left.  I will never ever return.

We went through the drive thru last late..they had us wait a good 10minutes while they chatting it up and laughing..we could see them clowning around enjoying fries and sodas..when the lady finally brought us our food she had major attitude..she blows up when I decide to check my food before I move from the window..but of course our order was wrong. The fries were stale and drink was flat..just a worst experience.

Went here about ten min ago and was rushed thru the drive thru don't know if she was new but forgot both my sodas twice when I got home less than a mile away my fries were cold and stale than I asked for no onions on my quarter pounder and I got two different types slivered and chopped I called in and inky thing they offered was for me to come back I have two kids can't just load them up and go again so I asked if they could replace the food in the am the manager states that I need to bring all the food in the am to have them replace it and for the inconvenience she will give me a small fry this place is a joke they need a new staff and management team

sent my in there today for a happy meal how the f%=k do you piece of shits keep f/#! king up our orders just shut the fu^k down already and you guys want $15 an hour you don't even deserve $5 an hour garbage ass mcdonalds
Please change back to the old mix of your soft drink. your coke taste like crap. It is watered down. Start charging regular price and put back the syrup

Recently moved to this area from Elk Grove. Mc Donald's is one of the closest fast food places near us. I have been many times regardless of poor customer service and horrible food, due to convenience. The managerial staff are rude to their employees and take no pride in serving the public. If I did not live near by I would never patronize this restaurant. Basic fast food is turned into slop at this location. Also make sure you check your order because they always literally mess something up on your order!!

Don't even waste your time coming here! They will never get your order right! I rarely come here because the service is so bad, and when I decide to go here my order is wrong and something is missing.

The food quality is terrible every time. I live nearby and I always choose to drive to the Elk Grove Florin McDonalds instead. I came by once for the first time in a decade and received the most pathetic excuse for chicken nuggets. Crusty and dark brown

McDonald's food is usually good. But this location... Food tasted a little old. Still eatable but not the greatest. The service was decent but the worst thing was the environment. It's strange that the store itself looks new and clean, yet, there were a couple of homeless people hanging out there filling their drinks with non McDonald cups. Maybe this McDonald's is trying to support the homeless. Great. But it's just uncomfortable and smell wise unpleasant for a customer. No offense.

Normally, I don't go to McDonald's.  But a while ago my friend Jed and I had a die hard craving for soft serve.  Since this McDonald's is only a 5 minute drive from my house, we decided to make a trip.    I'm not sure if the cashier thought we were total weirdos for only ordering fries and a couple of soft serve cones, but who cares.  We got our soft serve fix and it was delicious as always and totally hit the spot.  McDonald's has great soft serve!    Just for the record, this McDonald's is really fancy inside.  It has a fireplace!  P.S. - Just for those who were wondering, we got the fries with the soft serve so that we could dip them in the soft serve.  It sounds unappetizing, but it's a tasty treat.

So the other day my sister went to the drive thru to get me some Spicy McChicken, and she ordered 2. But they only put 1 on the receipt, so she only received 1. Then just now, my siblings and I went there and odered our food. All the burgers and everything were listed on the receipt. But once we got our food and arrived home, we realized that they forgot to give us 1 of our McChicken! So we had to drive back to get it. We also asked if they had any apple pies, and they said no. Then my sister's bf told us that they can make it, they just don't want to. So instead of giving us the option to wait 15 minutes for the apple pies, they just told us there were no more. We finally asked if they can make any and they said yes. The customer service are not the greatest. They just seem tired, not in the mood, and just don't care. The only reason why I come to this McDonalds is because it's super near and some of my friends work there. But other than that, it's just sad.. The only reason why I even gave this place a star is because the sweet tea there is on point. My favorite.

Ok- every year and year the drive thru wait gets longer & longer! This time October 2011 I have had it! I don't know what's going on inside but the McD slaves need to speed it up.... The only pro thing about this place is the Big Mac meal for 3.99 + tax= 4.30 cheapest no. 1 in the city. But drive thru wait especially at night needs to be fixed!
I've hit this McDonald's location (drive-thru only) a couple times now and have no complaints.

This is the fanciest McDonald's in Sac lol they have dimmed lighting and flowers on the table ha first time i watched in i was like woooah this is different. They have higher prices then other McDonalds in the area and the drive thru is so slow.

My child & I went to get some food. We order our food and sweet tea. We had to take back the tea because it was nusweeten and they ask if they could give us a soda because they didn't want to make more sweet tea... Just made me...bad service... Facebook.com/thetruerevi…

If I could give this location one star I would. The McDonald's app was having a glitch and there was food on the menu that was being advertised for free and my coworker and I placed orders for the breakfast items and cookies, and later in the day placed orders for more of the cookies. The manager came out of the lobby yelling at the both of us that we were committing fraud. That she was taking down our license plate and reporting us. We tried to explain that it was no fault of our own and the app was showing $0.00 for certain items on the menu. She continued to yell at us and refused to listen to what we had to say. She told us that we were stealing from her and she was going to report us.   My coworker went back inside to get the refund for the order she refused to give us and she continued to yell at her in front of her team members and customers. I DO NOT recommend this location to anyone. The customer service from the manager was terrible. The team members were embarrassed that their manager was acting in the way she was. It was completely unprofessional and inappropriate.  She could have very easily came out and explained to us that there was an error in the system and she would not be able to honor the glitch. Instead she came to come out guns blazing and yelling at us that we were stealing. Pictures are posted to show proof the items were free (at the time of purchase)

I love McDonald's, but this one needs help. I was not able to check it inside, but the drive-though needs remodeling FOR SURE. the drive way is very uneven and is really dirty with cars spills. There are two microphones where you are able to order food, but it is depressing to come here and see this disaster.  Their staff are really nice and polite, the service is fast as well. But the place is due for maintenance.

So I decided to get Ubereats for convenience not only did it take a hour to get to me and I live 5 minutes away (which I get is out of McDonald's control if there's no driver) however it is in their control to make sure all food is sealed when delivered!! I called McDonald's and they said they swear they sealed my food, but they didn't and the fact the a general Manager didn't catch this is bad. I had ordered breakfast for my children and it's so unsettling to have food delivered to you that should be sealed not sealed. It looks like this guy went through the drive through for me.

I went through the drive thru, i was asked" what can i get for you" I answered "number 10 large cambo with a coke" The guy didnt hear me or something, so i repeated myself. There was a long pause then asked again what i wanted. So for the 3rd time i said it agian. I pulled up to the window to pay he didnt say anything to me, so i paid. I was never given a receipt. I pull up to the window to get my food then I noticed I had a medium drink I looked into the bag and there was medium fries. I told the lady who gave me my food that I ordered a large drink with a large fries. I was given the large drink and was told to park until they got me my large fries.  So I waited about 10 minutes they came out with my food. yet again a person didn't say anything to me and walked away. Looking into the bag I had a smaller order of french fries. I was very upset and I walked inside talk to the manager she told me that this is what I ordered. I get a 30 min lunch for work by now i already burned 20 min, so i walked out. I will never go back to this mcdonald i will rather take my money and go to the carls jr across the street
What the fuck is up with being stingy with the katchup?? Seriously 2 pack of K atchup for 3 order of full meals? I don't understand. 1 star!

I would not recommend this place! Late at night they only accept cash but don't tell you until you get to the box to order. By then you're trapped with multiple other cars behind you. You're stuck sitting there for 20-30 minutes. It's ridiculous! They could at least post a sign at the front of the drive thru before you drive in to let you know in advance they're registers are down for updating or whatever the case is (Note: McDonalds if you're reading this I hope to take this advice). If you're ever considering going here for a late night snack or work late and need to grab a bite to eat on the way home don't come here. It's the worst!

Caution: This McDonald's does not honor the buy one get one coupons from the feedback surveys that appear on the receipt.  I waited in line for 10 minutes trying to renew my coupon only to be told they don't honor them.  When I pointed out that on the receipt it specifically states "valid at any McDonald's location" they stated it wasn't honored at this location.   Very misleading, McDonald's! It's a shame and because of this experience I will not be returning to this location.  I was a long time, frequent customer.  No longer. Best of luck.

Super duper nice workers at the drive-thru--always polite professional and friendly. I've never had a wrong order in the years that I've gone here. The fries, breakfast items and nuggets have been consistently good.  I usually go late at night or early am so the parking lot clientele can be questionable. I figure the attitude that people experience is a result of themselves, not because of the workers.
Service at this McDonald's is awful.  They routinely mess up orders or send you to wait unnecessarily.  The process to place orders.  I suggest choosing one of the other McDonald's.

Third time coming here and I can honestly say this mcdonalds is one of the best mcdonalds in my area. 1) Food always tastes great 2) Pretty fast service. I've ate inside & drive thru- Although drive thru sometimes is packed & they can be slow  3) friendly customer service 4) If you eat inside they take your food to your table, a pretty unique mcdonalds.  5) They always get my order right! :)

So today we went to McDonald's and ordered 2 sausage mc muffins a bacon egg McGriddle and order of hot cakes we  payed $12.11 once we got our food we checked our bag before leaving and we only see 2 sandwiches? Idk why if we ordered 3 and the girl was super rude and had us pay for the third when they should've gave it to us for free since it was their mistake like how rude I pay taxes.dont ever come here to this location
Drive thru can take forever sometimes. They have a mixed flavored coke machine but don't offer flavored drinks at the drive thru. Not an issue at other McDonalds I've been to, so kinda irritating.
Great service, ice cream machine works, and happy environment by the employees made my experience nice

Recently has been terrible. Used to come all of the time and will no longer. I seriously considered making a corporate complaint at my last visit, as there was more the 5 pieces of a hard, broken plastic that was in my DRINK I took home through the drive through. this was one of my first time coming in the morning, usually the later shifts don't have problems, but as well the last few orders have had at least one thing wrong.  You need to cycle in some better workers!
Love it or hate it...if you go it is the fact that you can count on it being the same as last time...it is what it is...not fine dining...but hot, fast, and McDonald's style...

The manager tonight was very rude and unprofessional. They mess up your order and forget thing. When you call them it's like you're lying for something you paid for. I used to visit here a lot but after tonight I will drive out of my way before returning there.

I haven't been to a McDonald's in a while, but this is one of the nicest McDonald's I've ever been to. There were employees everywhere cleaning, mopping floors, etc. The owners were behind the counter greeting customers and helping with orders. Service was fast and friendly. My faith in McDonald's is renewed! French fries forever!!

This is the most rudest mcdonalds I have ever been to. We waited 20 minutes for our food and keep in mind it wasn't busy at all there was barely anyone in there. Then as we are in the playroom letting our daughter play while she eats her happy meal we are told to get out it's now closed. The only nice woman in there is Rita. She tried to go above and beyond to make things right however the manager while playing on her phone refused to let her do anything. Thank you Rita for bring my daughter a free ice cream anyways. You my dear should be manager as you are wonderful.

$7 for food the size of a kid's meal. Burger alone was $4.49...when it really should be on the dollar menu. When I first walked into this location, it reeked of homeless people and had a few loitering outside. I only came because I had a gift card, but I won't be back. Better off going to Carl's Jr across the street.

Hands down the best McDonalds I've ever been in my life. Being new to the area, I've been kinda avoiding the Northgate area.. But when the kids are off early from school and hungry I needed a playplace. So the closest McDonalds it was! Walked in, and was totally amazed by its cleanliness, spacious eating Area, and separated play place for families.  Love love love this McDonalds. Sacramento, you seriously surprise me.   +Multiple Eating Areas +Clean +Large Play place +New** (Or renovated/McDonalds) +Friendly Customer Service  +Rvcd my Order in less than 2 mins
I like da food it was alright. The mcchicken wer fresh. I love this place im definitely coming back.

I didn't eat here as I don't eat McDonald's but I did stop to buy iced tea and use the restroom - the parking lot is absolutely disgusting - my shoes are legitimately sticky after walking across the parking lot.   I get it. There is a drought but my god a power wash once in a while wouldn't kill the planet...

Went through drive thru late and the lady taking my order was joking around on her headset. I repeated my order to her several times and she was not interested and more interested in joking around and laughing. I could hear her talking to someone else about something that was not job related. I continued to repeat my order which took her  even more time for her to get right. Very unprofessional place.

They have to close at 2pm, it's been many times we got kicked out the play room. I usually drive more than 15 miles here afternoon because I like the fact that this place looks safe for my 23 months old. For some reason I always end up here at the same time, I buy food and usually plan to say about an hour to let my child play and run around before going back to work. It's a good thing they try to keep this place clean but why at this time which there are so many kids running around. Some parents decide to come to this place because there is a play room, if not then there are so many McDonald's out there, I see some parents get here with their kids and have to leave or locked out the play room. Then why driving so many miles here???

This particular McDonald's is fairly busy most of the time. Some of the ladies there have little to no personality to speak of, but I can always count on Charlie in the drive thru to be friendly and efficient. Going inside for service can be a nightmare, as they worry more about the drive thru. My food is usually fresh, just wish some of the ladies knew how to smile. Could be the fault of management since I have seen one manager scold employees in front of customers. More like Charlie please!! She is a pleasure!!

There were about 3 different people working the drive through today and I would say they were not the friendliest people. One guy sounded pretty New which is fine but to still come off rude is no excuse. The girl who I gave my card to said absolutely not one word. This service just added on with the fries ... the fries are usually not that bad but today was like all grease no salt . I was very unsatisfied at a McDonald's level .

I have always loved McDonald's ever since I was a kid but I wish I had not went here at all and went somewhere else to buy a cool drink today. I don`t know whats wrong with this McDonald's they have issues. I went to the drive-thru and was the only car there and had to wait a year and a decade for someone to take my order... now why is that? After a long wait someone finally took my order. I ordered a medium strawberry banana smoothie and thats it no food. I pull up to the second window after paying for the drink at the first window and I was told to please pull over. Now can someone ask me why did they make me pull over for a drink?! Seriously.. like seriously?!! I had to wait and wait just for one drink while other people who came after me at the drive-thru were given their orders while I had to seat and wait for one stupid drink.  And get this they did not even make the drink yet when I pulled up to the second window the first time. How retarded is that! I almost started to say to them can I just get my money back and I`ll go somewhere else. I will not be returning to this McDonald's location ever again. This location is a hot mess! I say go somewhere else.

People, it's McDonald's. I only the food is hot, fries are hot and i have a clean place to sit to devour that which is bound to make me fat. Much to the chagrin of my fiance who is an RD. But it is a guilty pleasure and these guys do it as well as any of the Fast Food places. The only reason it did not get 5 stars, the parking lot is a mess. But it is a high traffic parking lot. But it reflects poorly on this location. So enjoy the food, cleanliness, and the decor is not half bad. You want more then spend more.
Started serving breakfast at 3:50.. what kind of crap is that. Top if off they forgot my hot cakes. Why do I even keep going to this place the service sucks.
Field mice love this place. They like to give you ice coffee with coffee grounds at the bottom as if they don't care either way.

Horrible service. I know they don't care because this place is cheap & everyone will always come to buy. There's simply no "thank you." No "have a good day!" No nothing. As I receive my order from the lady, she looked at me because I was still waiting and asks if I needed something else. I told her I didn't get my 2nd drink. It was sitting just right in front of her. & All she does is read the order just to hand it out so like how in the world does she forget my drink? Or she probably couldn't read our small order. But to be honest, Ya'll need help. If not from work, or school. At least at home.

They have there play place  still. Which is one reason we still come here, the kids get to unwind a little.  They due offer birthday parties here also. Food ordering is sometimes good, depending on who is at register, new person, or lack of knowledge,  or speaking. .. but not to bad otherwise for a mcds. .

I absolutely hate this McDonald's. And it sucks because this is the closest one to me. This McDonald's has the absolute worst customer service I have ever had. They are incredibly rude,when you order inside or in the drive thru. You always get a rude tone when ordering and then they act like they can't understand English. And when you order ice cream you always get the same lame excuse the machine is broken. Especially in the Summer. It's like it's been broken for years. Their bathroom is disgusting they never clean it. The tables are never clean. It's just a very dirty McDonald's. DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION!!
Just ordered 2 medium fries after waiting for almost 20 minutes in the drive thru and both boxes are barely half full. Next time check before you leave. Worthless.

I just ordered a McChicken sandwich. There was so much mayonnaise on my sandwich that it looked like they spilled half the jar on the bun. It is absolutely disgusting. I posted a picture of it one here somewhere. It is so bad I won't even give it to my dog. This is unacceptable
This Comment only covers the Coffee. youtube.com/watch?v=MumU… A rare 4 star from me:) A very good cup of  coffee on this day, from a very happy staff.
The place- specially the PLAY area for kid smell like dirty socks. Made me so dizzy . Trash was everywhere. They really need to have someone clean this place  I love Mc Donald's but not this one

It's McDonalds.  The food is the same as any McDonalds.  The reason I am even bothering to write this review is because this is the nicest McDonalds I've ever been to in my life.  I come here everytime I am in Sacramento either to grab and Ice Tea, to grab a snack or to let the kids have a potty break and stretch the legs.  The inside is nice and clean with dark wood fixtures and flowers on the tables.  The staff is always nice, the bathrooms are clean and it's in a good neighborhood.  Sacramento is full of scary and iff-y places so I felt the need to let other travelers know this McDonalds is the best one and a safe, clean place to stop.

Mental feebleness at it's finest!  Oh yeah, and they are a franchise, rather than a corporate Mcdonalds...so their prices are higher than other nearby locations.  As if McDonalds (corporate sites) weren't overpriced enough...

I have been going to this place since I was 4 and in the last 1 1/2 years this place has fallen off its charts, I am unsure if it's management but clearly I can say it's the staff for sure. I am a store manager and the business will only be as good as it's staff. This locations seems like they hire anyone that walks in the door looking for a job they don't take the time to hire friendly professional employees. The drive through cashiers are the worst, mostly all night time shift cashiers they talk to you very "ghetto" don't even say the "hi" or "welcome to McDonald's" they mest up your orders and when you get to the window they are even more of a worst impression then when you order your food on the speaker. Management needs to hire more different races it seems lately they are hiring all the same race. They sell bad apple pies with stickers saying eat by 3pm yet it's 10pm and that's what they are putting in my bag is old tasting apple pies not even warm. The frys are old and clearly you can taste it. The waiting period is out of control at this location, drive through experience needs a lot of improvement. I would like to see better customer service and more professional employees. There is this African American guy that works the mornings on drive through giving the food and he is amazing! He's so cheerful and always says "Good morning welcome to mcdonalds! What can I get for you on this sunny day". He is very motivated and even though I don't know his name, he is a example of how employees should act. To the hiring manager from another hiring manager, you should take your time to recruit talent rather then hire anyone because turnover rates are high. Your business will improve.... till then I'll be going to the mcdonalds at Truxel.
Bad bad service. The cashier told us the all sauce cost even ketchup . U sure aint getting my business or my friends and family. Fellow peers please avoid this location.

Never thought I would have to write a review about a McDonald's before but after what I just experienced is beyond unacceptable behavior of any employee. Even after I had repeated my order multiple times, the McDonald's employee had made mistakes on my order. The same location has made multiple inaccurate orders in the past, I still end up having to stop the drive -thru line because once again this store has failed to completely my order efficiently. I wouldn't return to this store if it wasn't for the friendliness of the few nice staff members. The lady that took my order tonight was rude and did not care about my order whatsoever because when I proceeded to receive my food they had no clue of what I really ordered. Honestly if this is how McDonald's is letting their employees run their stores then my personal opinion about the company have dropped tremendously.

TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE. I work in fast food and am fairly lenient and understanding when it comes to a lot, but this restaurant is disgusting. Half the employees don't wear hats and every single one of them have hair flying all over the place, I rarely see gloves on any of their hands, and they are only just plain rude. TWICE now in the past few month have we found HAIR in our food. The last time we said we wouldn't eat there again but out of desperation I gave them a chance and it seems like i wasted my money once again  hair found in a food again. i wouldn't go here if you want to eat clean food.

There tea tastes like rotten potatoes they probably have strange creatures in it and leave it out and for ever and ever and ever. They have the worst service on planet earth. Terrible I am never drinking there tea ever again. They don't even have water!

So a normal McDonald's iced tea isn't that bad but they just leave there tea out forever so it tastes terrible. these are the people if you got food poisoning they wouldn't do a thing. There tea probably has its own eco system with little organisms swimming around in it.  Worst service ever!
This place is absolutely wonderful. The service is amazing and if they do get your order wrong they will give you your correct order. The people are incredibly kind and love their jobs.

Just pass this McDonald's up in the really early morning hours. This McDonald's has pretty bad customer service . I just happen to be working late one night and went in there to get a bite to eat through the drive-thru it appeared to me that something shady was going on. While waiting to get my order taken. I noticed there was one person before me that didn't have any problems ordering. I pulled up to the speaker and the customers order was still in plain view on the order screen. I was acknowledged immediately and they asked if I could hold for a moment. Mind you there is only one person ahead of me and it's not like there's a long line. Another vehicle pulls right on through the drive thru and didn't even stop to order and pulls up right behind the other vehicle that just ordered. I sat there for almost a good 10 minutes and didn't receive any reply back. I got tired of waiting for them to answer back. I pulled to see if I could pull ford to exit but I couldn't. The two vehicles were still in the drive thru. So in order to leave I had to back out of the drive thru. At this point I just felt like me  leaving and taking my business elsewhere would be a  better. I would give this McDonald's a -10 star if it was available. Pass this McDonald's ip

The gal at the window steals money on every cash order.  When I pay with a ten dollar bill, she shorts me a dollar on change, then says the bill is a dollar more than the receipt says (when I check the receipt after driving away.)  The next time I gave the exact amount in cash and she said I owed another dollar.  When I say I gave her the exact amount, she says no, you gave me one dollar less.  I believe she pockets $1.00 per order as a co-worker told me the same thing happened to her on the same lunch hour.

If I can I will give -5 I'm waiting in line 30 minutes to get mine 2 burgers the employees are really rude the last three times I went here I tried to give them a chance to fix it but every time I go it's worse and worse so they lost my service looks like Carlos Jr is way better
Its McDonald's!! Who doesn't love McDonalds?   This perticular one has greatttt customer service see!!!

I'm not generally a proponent of fast food but this mcDonalds is pretty decent. I come here once a week with my grandson who is 18 months old as time of this review and he loves the indoor playground. Keep in mind however if this is why you're coming here but you must treat it as a public park there is no age restriction as the children who can play there and if you're having a problem with the activities of the children best to deal with them directly because management has nothing to do with it unless they are being hazardous to themselves or the equipment. So it does get rowdy especially after school or when its raining. As far as food 8 out of 10 times they get my order right. They usually do substitutions like apple slices instead of french fries for any meals. The cashiers at the front are not the brightest but the drive thru ladies are much more bitchy here, I recommend save your gas and go inside. The restaurant itself is always clean there's always tables to be had the decor is like a cafe so it doesn't really feel like you're inside of a fast food restaurant when you're eating inside and they have a separate glassed out section for family use attached to the playground. Ironically though they do not have baby changing stations inside the bathroom. This is a corporate McDonalds so they are supposed to honor all Coupons.
They never get the order right! This place makes me scared for our future. I cannot believe how dumb these employees are!

This manager by the name of Nathan, harassed me 2x telling me I had to buy something to sit inside. I told him it was 0 problems for me. So when I purchased my salad, less than half an hour later he pressured me to buy another item. As he left that morning , he was staring extremely hard at me making me very uncomfortable eating my food. Then on his next work day, he came up to me again patronizing me to buy something or I have to leave, when I already knew that. This manager discriminated against me. Everytime I am present at this location , Nathan goes on to harass, and stalk me around the mcds. It 's  Very strange as I do Not personally know this man. Which leaves me wondering why   Nathan continues to single me out . There was again another incident earlier this week of January 18, where It was me , and 3 other men in the lobby, and when it reached 1am he specifically came out in the lobby to oNly look straight at me , ignoring the other 3 men Just to tell me I had to leave. All these incidents leads me to believe this manager by the Name of Nathan has, and continues to discriminate against me. I have even seen this racist loser on the streets, and he tries to mean-mug me, yet I do not pay attention to his Cowardice.

Funny I just wrote a review about the McDonalds earlier on Norwood and today later my daughter wanted and ice cream so came to the one on Northgate + 100% better than the one on Norwood the customer service the service altogether cleanliness and the young ladies and the young gentleman in the drive thru were very attentive very customer service oriented 10 stars for that crew the attitudes alone deserve a raise

Good for a McDonalds.  Got the best they have to offer, burgers, fries, nuggets. Everything was good. One weird thing was that all the toppings on the Big Mac was under the middle bun, leaving a bun on top with nothing under it. The decor in the main part of the restaurant had a sort-of fancy look to it, which was interesting.

Absolutely no complaints here. It's McDonald's so you already know that the food isn't going to knock your socks off. It is fast food after all. The service is what I like here. I don't come too often but, when I have, the food has been nice and hot and the customer service has always been great. They making grabbing a quick bite a real breeze.

Just leaving a review because I liked the play area - I have a 2 year old and a 1 year old and the set up is very friendly for those ages and probably up to 5 or so.  I didn't eat anything here, but hell it's McDonald's, is there anything really different between the ones in the US? Oh yeah, the inside was hot as hell in the main eating area, but the play area was nice and cool... and one of the play things that is supposed to make sounds is broke, but the kids didn't seem to care about that crap so I don't either.

Worst place ever!!! I'm in the drive thru and at this time it was the buy 2 for $5 deal. I didn't know that there were only some specific items that was apart of the deal. I asked the lady and she goes "uh.. Idk it's whatever that's on the screen" at that point I was like ok? Wtf. So I told her my order and on the screen she charged me two Big Mac which I did not ask for and I asked her "how come on the screen shows you charging me twice?" She goes "oh snaaap, my bad you about to get me in trouble" at this point I was irritated, I'm on my lunch break and I don't have time to deal with little kids. I drove up to the window and she snatches my card out of my hand and doesn't say thank you or whatsoever. They have so many dumb employees here. Smh!
Fast service and always get my order right! My granddaughter loves the play area. I am a frequent mcdonalds customer and this facility is my favorite in the area.

I came to this McDonald's through the drive thru. I had 4 cars in front of me, none behind me. It was not very busy, and I can understand why after this experience. The girl taking the order told me to order, I did, then silence. Then a minute later she finally comes back and she says "what did you want again?". I repeated my order, #4 large with Dr pepper and no onion. She is silent again then finally says "I'll have your total at the first window". I get up there she is standing with another employee, I thought talking to each other... wrong! The other employee Shalawny is holding her phone up for a video discussion with someone else and the girl taking my money is saying "you got your hair did it looks very cute!" I couldn't believe it. She says nothing to me and just hands my card and receipt and I pull forward. I get to the 2nd window and the girl Alexis hands me a bag and drink. I ask if it has no onions, she asks "Did you just ask them for that at the first window?" I reply no and she takes my bag back and walks away while I'm still talking. She comes back a couple minutes later and hands me a bag and then walks away. No words no sorry have a good day, nothing. I know customer service and this isn't it. They are rude, incompetent, and not attentive or helpful. They can't even recite the order back to verify, they can't talk to their customer with respect, they just act entitled. If these people get $15 an hour, I will not be happy. I wouldn't even allow them to work for free for me. Besides their customer service the fries were over salted (and I love salt), the burger was dry and old, and the condiments were sparsely applied to the bun. I bet the owner here allows them to do this and doesn't care as long as they make money. I know corporate McDonald's would have gotten rid of them with corporate complaints happening. I just made a corporate complaint on them myself, hope they enjoy it. By the way my cashier, had no name tag on either! It's not difficult to come to work in your uniform there! No slip shoes, check, shirt, check, pants, check, name tag showing I can only work fast food because I'm not smart enough to do anything else, check. Enjoy Shalanwy, Alexis, and your cashier friend, this is going to be your career, so you should at least attempt to be good at it!

I was here a few days ago and started not to write a review but I just can't hold it no more! Service sucked big time and they were not that busy. I usually go through the drive thru but this particular time I went in. Wanted a fish filet combo... No fish! Wanted the cheap dollar menu pies... No pies! Wanted 2 peach cream pies and 2 strawberry pies..... No peach pies!! So I ended up ordering a few combos and 3 strawberry cream pies, there's only 1 strawberry pie will have to wait 15-20 minutes. Nope I want my money back.. she refunds me for 2 cheap apple pies but gave the refund with my change. No tea, was told there was sweet tea! Got my meal and the fries were cold, brown and staled. Counted my change a dollar almost 2 dollars short looked through the bag no pies just food! Goes right back in there and they tried to give me back 50 something cents and swore me up and down I wanted the refund for the apple pies and they put all 3 strawberry pies in the bag, ummm excuse me it hasn't even been 15-20 minutes now so how did you put the pies?? Then they were getting mad and griping at Promise who was a new worker taking my order, it was not her fault you guys had nothing and had terrible service because her customer service skills deserved 10 stars!! Needless to say, I will never eat at this McDonalds again!!
Good service & quality food. The lines get pretty crazy at lunch but  I think it has to do with the location.
