You can easily see this McDonalds from the road as the complex (I think called Sheldon Centre) is brand new so the lights are bright and noticeable.
Very disappointed in their pricing more expensive sandwiches then other McDonalds. Looks nice, ambience nice. But our regular breakfast was around $1.00 more than other local McDonaldd.

First time going there and have a horrible experience. So slooooooooooooooow at the drive thru. Waited a minute for someone to acknowledge me at the speaker/order com. Literally sat and waited 15 minutes just to get to the first window to pay. See workers walking back and forth by the window and then finally someone open the window so I can pay them.   Waited another 5 more min to get to the second window. Got to the second window and lady try to confirm my order and it was wrong. She looked confused and ask if in paying with cash? Wth? Told her I already paid. Told her what my order was and finally she gave me my food and fries she forgot the first time. Got a driver behind me honking and growing impatient. Maybe I went at the worst time but it was a horrible experience.
I hate when they don't get your order correct!!! 1 cheeseburger no pickles no mustard! Couldn't even get it right and we were the only ones here!! The fries were fresh though
There are plastic wrappers in my sausage McMuffin with egg. N since when they only give one sauce for 10 pieces McNugget? 2nd sauce for 22 cents??

A McDonald's connected to a gas station which is connected to a frozen yogurt place and a subway. Which is also right in front of a car and dog wash.  Lol why not?    Joking aside this location is actually very clean. They also have tons of solar panels so they're probably also environmentally clean.    The only McDonald's I know of with a coke freestyle fountain soda machine.   Food is as expected for McDonald's.  Consistent.

We tend to visit this location because it's close to home. We had coupon to use that states it expires 11/6. Today is 11/6. Went to use the coupon and the Manager Mathew stated it already expired. As my husband and I work in costumer service typically when a coupon states it expires on a particular date you have until midnight of that date to use it. Well Mathew said it already expired. I asked 'so it expired 11/5 not 11/6 then' his response was "yeah". Very rude and not very informative. We've never experienced this at a McDonald's even at this location. Upset we cancelled our order due to the rude and very unfriendly customer service. I called corporate and Lewis explained to me that franchises determine whether or not the coupon expires the day stated or the day before. See all Mathew had to do was explain this but instead he gave us a very blank look and short answers that made us feel like we were clueless. As a manager I would think you'd want to explain things better and make your customers happy.  I wasn't looking for any handouts just an explanation. Someone needs a little customer service 101!!!!

Nearest cleanest fanciest McDonald's I've ever been to but I have to say the staffing needs a lot of work I can't even get the attention of five staff members to get a straw ended up getting it myself behind the counter.
Learn how to read your tags. If you can't simply read what changes are made on the burger go clean the bathroom instead.
Just got home from the drive thru with milk 5 days past it's expiration.  Serious lack of quality control.

There always seems to be plenty of people when we go inside, but then they are sooooo slow.  Like no other Mc Donald's it seems like it takes forever for the food to be prepared. Once it's up, it's quick.  I went through the drive through today and I was on the right side and 3 cars on the left went be I ordered. It probably would have been more if I wasn't saying, "Hello"?.... , then the 1st window don't have a sign saying "go to the next window" so every person sat there until they realized the 2nd window was paying.  Absolutely no organization. I get to the window and she says 2 different meals and I had to explain to her that 3 cars went before I could order. Then I get a "ok,what did you have?".  Never an apology for the wait and the kicker... not a thank you either. This was the manager... she had a different shirt on.  PEOPLE SKILLS CAN SOFTEN THE BLOW OF HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Get some.  Geez

This is the only McDonald's in the city of Elk Grove that seems to have an issue of ordering a simple biscuit with scramble egg.  McDonald's on Elk Grove Florin, Power Inn Calvine and Laguna don't have a issue for ordering the simple order.  I was told by the manger in the morning the owner of this McDonald's informed her that they don't allow customers to order those two items like that.  I guess I can honestly say that I'm not loving it.

There is always a line in the drive through or inside. Some of my food has come back less than warm. Today they just turned me down for the 2 for 5 deal. Not sure how long the promo lasts but they told me "no more" despite having sinage up for the same deal.

I ordered oatmeal just about every morning. I stopped here because I was in town and just got my tire replaced.   Not only do they charge 50 cent more for their oatmeal as compared to Elk Grove but they give you expired apples. I'm done and I'm really particular with eating old apples I can taste it being bad. Gross  The people were nice but the management had to suck I'm sure.

This is the worst McDonald's in Sacramento. I lived in Sacramento for 20 years I'm a big guy and I've been to everyone. This is by far the worst.  I've seen this McDonald's go through so many people within the last 5 years it's ridiculous. Today I went inside and ordered,  the guy at the rege took out his phone to do math to give my correct change. There was a line of 8 ppl behind me. The ice machine was broken. The place was filthy.   At 1 point I seen the manager come out and shake her head and went in the back.  This is my local neighborhood McDonald's I feel badd for it that there's nothing I can do to help them out but the only thing I can do is possibly leave this message and hopefully they will get the hint in what to do to fix things.  Stop hiring fly-by-night people that you can easily  be replace which your eyes closed.  And by the way the guy forgot my coffee
Ate there yesterday afternoon and got food poisoning. Be careful. Had a quarter pounder meal. Another friend of mine at there with me and guess what... she has it too.

I'm really disappointed with the customer service, I was on my lunch break and still in a great mood, I ALSO work in customer service. I came up to the counter with a smile and good attitude, I already knew what I wanted, I was just trying to be nice and make it easier for the cashier as I could tell she was in a bad mood. I over heard her communications with previous customers and the only word to describe her is RUDE! It was then my turn and she gave me the longest glare without saying anything. I get that customer service is hard, working at McDonald's is stressful and not all customers are nice, but her attitude towards literally everyone in the store was disappointing to me, not everyone is going to give her a hard time and she acted as if anyone even bothered to ask for some sauce or something that she might just blow up at someone, very intimidating and NOT FRIENDLY! When I went up she didn't not greet me, didn't say a word, just stared at me. So I said "hello, I'd like etc" (I had an easy order, only got a burrito) and she said "we don't have that" and I ordered one this morning. So I kinda paused for a second and asked as nicely as I could "I think it's the sausage burrito breakfast thing" she said "oh" and rolled her eyes. Then said nothing and pointed at the pin pad. It wasn't a horrible communication but she was sooooooo rude to the previous customer saying "what do you want", "sauce!?", "pay". Only words she'd said to that customer all while being very monotone and FULL of attitude. I'm not sure what caused her to be so sour today, hope she has a better day tomorrow and learns not to let one customer affect her service to EVERYONE. I personally was very disappointed and will not return to this McDonald, especially after today AND reading all of these other horrible reviews. I hope ya'll get your shit together.
Bought three meals and the cashier ask me if I needed ketchup. Simply I said yes  For three meals I received three packets. And she closed the window on me.   Like seriously three?

I went there during lunch and literally sat in the drive thru for almost 20 minutes before I got to the first window. When I got there , there was just an employee on his phone, he didn't even notice I was there. I spent almost my whole lunch just in the line. Wouldn't recommend this McDonald's to anyone.

Horrible. We ordered 40 pieces of McNuggets and they only gave us 2 Ranch? Like How on earth are we going to eat 40 pieces of McNuggets with only 2 small packets of Ranch? So stingy! Never coming back here again.

This place needs to shut down. About 80 percent of the time I go to this McDonalds (I rarely eat at McDonalds) there's usually an issue. Some of those include: missing orders, orders given to someone else and then handed back to me, wrong orders, unavailable product, sanitation, really bad quality food and the list goes on. Shut it down so we can have an In N Out or something. Anything is better than this dump. I will NEVER go to this McDonalds again. This is a warning to everyone.

This location has hours posted on both windows in the drive thru and on all the doors stating that they are open until 2AM and yet at 1:35, they "weren't open" and their automated message was playing. And this isn't the first time that this has happened. But we hoped that maybe for once they would be open until their posted time. All we wanted was an order of large fries, but I guess we're going to have to go somewhere else.

I get that it's fast food but I've been to this location multiple times all employees are disrespectful and rude at least all the employees that I have come in contact with management is horrible go ahead and get the fast out of your mind with this location because you're definitely in store for a long wait time the drive-through service is horrible I ordered something and then they said it was no longer in the menu, ok cool no big deal right? WRONG I had already paid for my order and they gave me a random hamburger and charged me for what they stopped serving on there menu. They charged me for what I wanted and just put a different meal inside of my bag. Then when I brought it back and explain to them pay you charge me for this they told me oh we don't serve that anymore then I asked why did you give me this and they got an attitude with me about it. I would give no stars of possible this location needs to be shut down.

This is the slowest  Mcds in the history of Mcds!! Not to mention the rudest!! Don't even think all of your order will ever be correct!  20 minutes for a sausage biscuit and drink... ask for jelly and got none, didn't get a straw for my drink either...  -5 stars

This place is by far the slowest fast food I've ever gone to. Literally waiting for 30 mins maybe longer at 9:30PM on a Sunday with 3 cars ahead of me. Had to repeat my order 5 times, the fries were also cold and they want $15/hr? Buahahha

Went here to get coffee and orange juice and lady at window passed me the cup holder and as soon as I get it in the car coffee and orange juice spilled everywhere, now my perfectly clean seats are stained and dirty.....is this how staff is trained there?? Very unprofessional

Came in for dinner, very nice looking restaurant. Ordered the new signatured crafted sweet bbq chicken sandwich. It was very good. Only 4 stars because of some of the customers, cussing up a storm. But the customer service is 5 star, our cashier was Caleb, outstanding customer service.

I will never again come to this mcdonalds. Ordered 8 cheeseburgers well done and when I got them they were cold.  Manager touched them and agreed so he had the crew make us fresh ones.  I got those cheeseburgers and those were luke warm.  If i'm paying for my food it better be cooked right.  And the flies in that restaurant is unacceptable!! DO NOT eat at this McDonalds unless your desperate.  SO DISAPPOINTED

This place is wack! You got some promethazine out jerk taking you drive thru order. Asked how many nuggets and I said six he has the audacity to say ten. Lol how the f does six sound like ten? You buffoon!  Anyway, this is a hood McDowell's lol and it takes hella days to get your order. The batches at the windows are rude. They will NOT greet you. They will just take your money, roll their eyes and slam the window on you. As far as the pick up window, check your items before leaving. They will f your order up and will NOT give you a refund but gladly fix your f'd up order. Never, ever returning to this ghetto, nasty, hot garbage smelling, no having ice cream in the damn summer, McDonald's. Y'all Suck!
Staff was very rude.  Staff need to know how to talk to customer!!! She needs to go to customer service training. They were also ignoring us.

This is the worst McDonald's experience I have had. Granted it's McDonald's but it took 30 minutes to get my order then got the wrong order. Took another 15 to get the right order. My coworker had to go ask for his food because they forgot to place it.  The staff is lousy and rude. Had hoodies on over their heads while serving. McDonald's should be embarrassed by the service of this location.   The fries were good though.

This place needs faster service. "Fast food" my ass. I work nearby and I came here right when I got on break. My break is only 30 mins. 30 mins later and I'm still waiting for my food. Got back to work late and I didn't even get to eat. ALL I WANTED WAS TWO MCCHICKENS.  The funny thing is, I only made a yelp to make this review, AND I MADE THIS ACCOUNT WHILE IN LINE WAITING FOR MY FREAKIN MCCHICKENS
SLOOOOOOOOOWEST mcdonalds EVER!!! Plus drive thru has 2 lanes but yet 1 is always closed too!!

I come here occasionally to grab a quick bite to eat. Today when I came in not sure if it matters but it was an all female crew working today and none of them seem to want to be there! There was a supervisor attempting to give direction to one of her employees telling her to assist a trainee that was standing around doing absolutely nothing. The employee responded back to her supervisor saying no! As in no I'm not going to train or assist the trainee. I've never been to any business and saw this type of behavior. It literally made me nervous about ordering food there so I just left without having lunch. Completely wasted my lunch time. Not to mention it is almost 100° outside and for some reason McDonald's ran out of ice cream cones but for some reason all the staff wanted to yell back-and-forth to each other to get an ice cream cone for one customer knowing that there wasn't any. It was all very confusing and very frustrating. I've never been to a business I was so on organized.! I probably will never return to this McDonald's even though it would take me 8 minutes to walk to it.

Ghetto and slow. They take forever to serve you. Even if there are only 4 other customers in the store.   They get orders wrong constantly.   Ordered a smoothie that came out like basically chocolate milk. Ya know, like when you go shopping and leave your drink in the car, only to come back and it's all melted? Yeah.  That happened. I returned it and they gave me another OF THE EXACT SAME THING.   don't bother coming to this spot

If I could give a zero I would believe me eeww this place gave me the creeps ... i went in the evening like around 7 it was pretty busy and super slow any who I really don't mind that but what me were the HUGE rats so gross like literally me and my husband counted  more than a dozen i bet an easy 20 rats were there in the grass area on the other side of the drive thru they were everywhere so freaking discussing I told the lady at the cashier and she said " yeah we know" r kidding eeeeww HEALTH INSPECTION IS well needed h
Sat at the drive through for 20 minutes to be yelled At by whatever lowlife was behind the register. Use a little more gas to go somewhere better where they don't treat their customers badly.

My sister drove through the drive through and while she was ready to order she screamed out "Oh my God there's a rat!" The employee calmly says "yes girl, be careful".. the rats were outside of mc donalds just running around and swore one of the rats stopped and stared at her for a quick second! I wouldn't be surprised if they were inside the building too. Plus you got hobos outside the place with their pants down scratching their crotches and wiping their asses on the walls. We regret ordering our food from there.. It wasnt even fresh and the nuggets tasted bland. Lets never go here again.... beware of RATS & Hobos

This is such a filthy McDonald's!! Homeless hanging out in front of the doors, by the grass near the drive thru and on the grass adjacent to the parking lot. Bathrooms always dirty, lobby has unpleasant people picking their nose. Not to mention, orders are never correct!!
My one complaint is that they have a big rat problem outside circling the building. I mean...there's a lot! Besides that, no different than any other McDonald's franchise.

This McDonalds is right here behind Wal Mart and it is Always busy! It is not the cleaness one I've ever come into. There are always homeless people hanging out in front of the store, or should I say on the side of the building. So I decided to go through the drive thru today and boy was the line long. I don't know what it is, but it seems like every time I choose to do drive thru I get stuck. Never fails!   So while waiting in the drive thru a homeless person walks up to my window and tapped on it an scared me to death asking for some change. I wanted to jump out that car and {....}. So after being spooked an waiting in the drive thru for about 20 minutes now and I get to the pick up window and the young lady asked me what my order was, so I told her and she turned to look for my food and no chicken nuggets on deck. Why I'm not surprised.   So they have about three other orders up and ready to go, but I have to wait another 5 minutes or so before my order is ready. And the girl working the window says nothing too me regarding my food not being ready. She just walks away from the window. Where do they get theses people from? Now I know the other people waiting in line are wondering what's taking so long. Its not me! It's  just hard to find good help nowadays.   I just stopped here because I was right here at Wal Mart and figure {....}. And maybe that's the problem. I wish I would have waited.  It takes longer to go through the drive thru than to just walk inside,  just didn't want to try to find parking, not a lot of options at this McDonalds. Very limited parking space here.

One of the worse McDonald's that I had ever been. I ordered food in the drive thru and when I got home there wasn't complete my order and when I came back to complain, the employees gave me an attitude . They make me wait for 15 minutes for my food and when I got home the food was cold and taste old.

For all that is Holy...  Cold food EVERYTIME! Except the shakes; they are drinkable with a sippy cup if you so desire.  I've passed through at this place when in a hurry, which has always been a bad idea. I didn't know a McDonald's could have a wrapped drive-thru at 2:00 pm on a Tuesday.   I would also like to add that texting on your cell is fine, speaking into your phone while you forgot to take your finger off the speaker while waiting on customers so they can hear about your displeasure with your bf hitting on your bff? Not so much.

I always dread coming to this McDonald's............ i don't come here unless I'm desperate ! The drive they takes foreverrrrr...& for what? Diet coke! I'm even helping you, NO ICE, 1 less step. (Just saying).  I do feel bad for SOME of the workers because I've seen inside what they gave to deal with [[RUDENESS]].  When I have gone inside the soda machine is just plain gross, customers can be pigs, but CMON mcds designate someone to watch that section & keep it clean.  This location also has 2 drive thrus, & normally has 2 people taking orders the times I've been here. & yet still takes forever.   This is the first location where I've seen the cashier shut off the soda machine on customers. & On that note Smh I won't even say how I feel about that...........  I will give them this, if there's an issue with a order, they've handled it quite well---- thank you rashieda (sp?)
Zero stars.  Just too ghetto.  I strongly think from the hate-stares and super-slow service that they spit in the white people's food -- or worse.  Enter at your own risk.

We just happened to be in the area on the way home to Elk Grove after looking for bar stools for our new kitchen island to come up next year sometime.  The traffic down Stockton Boulevard seems to be nonstop!  We stopped bc of my ice cream cone bad habit!  It only cost a 1.08 for us and we did go through the drive through or else my HB would have not stopped.  I guess next time it will be a different McD's!

This is definitely not a McDonald's that we come too often, but we were over this way today and had my granddaughter and as I have shared time and time again, she loves these dang chicken nuggets. Lol  So we are sitting in McDonald's and I look around and there's not 1 or 2, but 3 dogs in here. Did I miss something? Don't get me wrong I love dogs too, but I don't want to eat in a food establishment with them!   When I had my poodles, they weren't even allowed in my kitchen! No matter where we lived. The dogs were sitting on the benches at the tables. I'm sorry did I miss something? And for the record I'm not referring to service dogs either. This just was the craziest thing I've seen in a long time. Outside was no better, there was a lady with a lil small dog and he was so hot and thirsty, his tongue was hanging out And no one even thought about him.   Okay Please forgive me, I'm not one to ignore people/pets or whatevers got some life in them to suffer if I can help it. Lawd help me! I asked her could she get that dog some water too! Poor dog don't stand a chance.... that just hurts me to my soul when I see suffering, if you know what I mean? Yea I think I'm cool with this 'Mickey D's'....#RealCool.

I can't believe this place is brave enough to have a place for reviews.  Look, the bottom line is that if you don't value your health, life or bowels, eat here. I once saw a roach in a McDonald's,  but I left it alone, because it was trying to escape that hell hole, too. Shoot. I held the door for it.
Rude employees always a tone of customers never enough staff always mess up on order never even apologize just horrible all around I just go once in a while cause it's 1 minute from my house

This by far has been the worst experience that me and my boyfriend has ever had. The cashier was taking forever counting our money then people after we came in getting their food first. Employees in the back goofing off instead of working.

Average McDonald's. My only gripe is that apparently, some of the workers at the drive-thru can't count up to six. I don't think six sugars and seven creams is too hard to remember when pumping their respective buttons into the liquid. I would cringe if these same folks got paid $15 an hour to botch a simple coffee order. The other workers are fine.

-CORPORATE PLEASE STEP IN.- Hearing complaints of employees and managers. I've been referred to the human resources already which i am talking to them next week. (Manager should really be sweatin now)  Manager talks down to the workers. A bunch of people has quit. He takes the phones of employees and locks it away (BIG NO NO) and refuses to give them back until the end of the day. These are personal belongings.   They lost a lot of managers and has this barely capable asian girl to do the schedules which whom by the way schdules herself off on the weekends and has the crew blindly covering shifts for one another.   ITS TIME FOR A NEW STORE MANAGER. Please help this mcdonalds out.

This would be ZERO stars, if possible.   I had just visited the farmer's market in the nearby parking lot with my toddler in tow. I had a dentist appointment coming up and realized I didn't have time to go home and make breakfast. I spotted the McDonald's which had literally not a single car in the drive-thru, so I decided I'd grab breakfast for us there. I pulled up, made my order, went to the first window to pay, had a short chat about how not busy they were, drove to the second window, and was immediately told that I would need to pull to the front of the building because I had asked for the muffin toasted well. I looked behind me to see not a single car and asked, "Even if I'm the only one in line?" He turned to a short woman behind him, who nodded her head, so he turned back to me and said, "Yes." So I pulled out to the front where 3 other cars were already waiting for the same kind of reason. Ridiculous! Not a single car in the drive-thru, but you've got, now 4 cars waiting out front on the red curb or blocking other cars because there's no designated wait area. I maneuver myself around and find a spot that I can be found by whomever comes out to bring me my food. I paid at 8:07am. I waited as I watched all three cars get their food and drive off. I waited as I saw people park, go inside, and come back out with their food in hand. I waited and waited, not wanting to pull my toddler out of the car just to run inside real quick - the whole reason why I picked the drive thru anyway.   Then, some homeless guy comes and starts walking around the area. He kept stopping and banging his fists on the ground as he yelled. I locked my doors, rolled up the windows, and moved a bit further up. At this point, I started watching the clock. At 8:15, I tried calling the store because I didn't want to leave my car (especially with my child in tow) with that man in front of the doors. It rang and rang and rang and then went to a message system. I waited some more. At 8:19, I had had enough waiting. I parked the car, pulled out my toddler, ran past the angry man, and inside. I asked if my drive thru order was ready yet. Everyone looked at me like they were confused and said, "What did you have?" SERIOUSLY?!?!?!? So I told them what it was and the little lady asks the "kitchen" workers if they had that order done. The girl back there goes, "Oh yeah, I'm working on that." As I see her grab cheese and JUST NOW start putting the sandwiches together (I had ordered 3 sausage muffins (no egg) with extra cheese & bun well toasted). So I say, "Are you kidding me? I've been waiting out there for over 10 minutes and you haven't even started my order? There wasn't even anyone in the drive thru! This is ridiculous." So the poor guy that was told he had to have me wait in front asked what happened quietly, so I told him and I asked who the manager was and he pointed to the little lady who kept her back to me this whoooooole time. RUDE!   So I wait for my food inside now and with attitude she turns, hands me my bag, won't make eye contact, and goes, "I threw in a hashbrown, sorry for the wait." She says that without any eye contact, with a monotone voice, and it was very clear it was being said begrudgingly. I was LIVID, so I just walked out. I'm now running late, so I start driving and at the stop lights, I start opening the food. Do you know what I find? COMPLETELY SOFT, BARELY WARM BUNS. THEY WERE NOT WELL DONE IN THE SLIGHTEST BIT - IN FACT, THEY SEEMED UNDERTOASTED. If I would've had the time, I would've marched back in there, demanded it to be fixed, and quite possibly a refund for that insane amount of shenanigans. And do you know what? They cleared my order before having made it, so it LOOKS like they do great with their drive thru times. Not when you have FOUR cars waiting out front and not a single one in the drive thru. I AM SO PISSED AT THIS EXPERIENCE, MAINLY BECAUSE OF THE LACK OF CARE I RECEIVED FROM THAT SNARKY LITTLE "MANAGER" FOR WHAT HAPPENED.   I get McDonald's is not where you should expect great customer service, but this was unacceptable for *any* business. The lack of concern or care is the worst!
Worst mcdonald I've ever been to, didnt even put ranch in my salad and got my drinks wrong. Never going to this mcdonald again

I just had a hard ass time at this location with the employees AND the manager. I went to the drive thru, had 2 separate orders - one paid with cash and one was card. My first order was 6 cheeseburgers, 2 mcchickens, 20pc nuggets, a snack wrap, one large fries and a drink. I got my order in 2 bags and I realized I was missing 2 mcchickens that I paid for! I told the chick at the window I was missing my two sandwiches from the order, first she said it wasn't even on the receipt which I presented to her afterwards. Then she closed the window and another employee came with the MOST attitude saying she packed the bags herself and put the sandwiches in there. Let me remind you, I have my 2 baby girls in the backseat just trying to get some damn food. The female at the window THREW the bag of food back into my car and shut the window. We paid for our food just like everybody else so we just wanted wtf we paid for! The manager came and was not tryna hear anybody out she simply said, "well the employee said she put it in there so you guys can either leave or we can refund you." So we pulled to the front to get our refund, the manager asked if we wanted it all back on my card and we said no we paid 2 ways and want it back the same way. She came back with our receipts and said she put it all back on the card and that she will not help us any further. Management is horrible, employees have no customer service skills, and nobody even gave the chance to hear what the hell we had to say. I didn't want to be the one to throw a scene over 2 damn mcchickens but I wasn't gonna have them accuse me or act like I lied about 2 sandwiches THAT I PAID FOR and did not get. The whole situation escalated when we got inside but all could've been avoided with better customer service skills. Especially that manager, I would've expected more from somebody at a higher rank! My cousin made a call to customer care to put this in the books. Something needs to get done about this location because this was not the first time I've seen or had issues at this location.

Over 30 mins in the drive thru, workers are always consistently rude. Ghetto location, with ghetto workers. I wish the drive up windows were large enough to fit 2 cars side by side because I would have taken off numerous times, never a wait that is shorter than 15 minutes even with just a few cars up front. Absolutely ridiculous.
Where is the ZERO stars option!? It shouldn't take 45 mins to get out meal at McDonalds, especially Drive thru!

This a good place to order food for cheap. I've only been through the drive thru so I have no idea how it looks in the inside. I've never have to wait one in the drive thru and haven't had a problem with my food. The location is kind of bad and there's almost always a homeless person by the drive thru looking at you. I feel bad sometimes but most of the time they look really scary and walk up to your window expecting you to give them something. I'm sorry but I work for my money and I need to help myself before I can help others. And I hate feeling guilty for ignoring them.

this store does not deserve one star but this site makes you choose at least one, rude, disrespectful even all the way up to the manager, always gets orders wrong, talks crazy to customers, i don't even want to eat my food because they are so rude and disrespectful, and act so ignorant that I would not put it past them to spit in my food. thanks but no thanks, got my entire order wrong, then wanted me to prove what I ordered????? like I said previously the manager is the ring leader. I called corporate  while I was there but I honestly don't expect much, judging by these other posts and my experience with this same McDonald's their "corperate" must not care or it would not still be going on in such a horrendous manner.

Slowest drive thru EVER!! On occasion, ill come to this one because its closer to my house but I usually go to the other one on Florin near 99 Ranch because they much faster even if the lines are longer.

Worst location. The 6 months I've been working near here I've been to this location maybe 4 times and every time I come, it's a 30+ minute wait. It doesn't matter how many cars 2 or 10 it's always literally 30 min. I have 30 min for lunch and every time I go here it takes up my whole lunch sometimes longer. The customer service is horrible. I found a new location pretty same distance just the opposite way on florin and they are so much better and faster. Going there from now on and I'll never go to this place again. One star is actually giving them undeserved credit
Im order 2 double cheeseburgers,10 pcs chicken nuggets w buffalo sauce,and after that I'm otw home,no sauce,no ketchup,wth is that?

I came here A few days ago I got something changed on my burger then I came here again tonight and they told me that they have a charge and he went last time they didn't charge me. McDonald's really needs to make up their mind on what they are going to try to be a lot of what they are and I need to be consistent. Also the lady who took my order in the drive-through her name was Cindy was very rude when I was talking to her about it and simply said "oh well yeah there's nothing I can do so yea". Please be professional McDonald's I know you guys are necessary the classiest place but you guys need to be a business.

This is a rather new and modern looking McDonalds compared to others. Food is pretty consistent to what you expect from Mickey D's !! I mainly just came here to get a mango smoothy this time which was pretty great.   Everything is new and the service was on the spot.
Food is ok. The drive trew moves really slow. They usually forget to either give me condiments napkins or eating utensils. By when I notice is to late since my lunch would be over
The Asian guy is super nice. I loved him. But the ready didn't seem to care sadly.
Very unsanitary, shirts aren't tucked in. Didn't even put my large drink in my order. Need corporate call right away

have me fucked up omm i swear yall need to open ur shit past 2 pm i swear like y u acting like u relevant enough to close & lock the doors. like crack the gates for my 10 pc mcnuggets i swear oh my god i am so hot right now fuck janice at mickey ds u aint shit i swear i want a mcdouble make my bigmac worthless hoe.

Came here for breakfast because I was hungry and order two sausage mcMiffin s and a hash brown and a water well come to find out my sausage McMiffin was burnt and the sausage party's was cold I was piss well I never come here again

I give this place 0 stars , i was in the drive way I had 2 separated  order first order was with card which was 6 cheeseburgers and 2 mcchickens 1 snack wrap fries and a Powerade. The second order I paid with cash I had 2 mcdoubles quarter pounder with cheese fries sweet tea and a large hi c orange also with a mcchickens I've been coming here for years Then today I finally get the worst customer service ever ! After the employees took all my bags back at the window they continued to argue and throw my bags back into my car which I felt was really disrespectful . Manager I repeat manager the person in a different shirt than the employees she absolutely was not professional ! Poor everything argued over because the worker forgot our order just 2 mcchickens that we paid for what was for my kids they specifically wanted . the worker continued to tell me she put them in the bag I got fed up and asked for the manager the manager came to the window and just poorly handled it I got so fed up so I went inside remind you I was in the drive thru . So manager met me at the door i had drinks in my hand she threw them away as we're at the door manager said employee said she put mcchickens into my bag manager asked me if I wanted to leave or my refund so I asked for my refund she asked me repeatedly if I wanted both reciepts on one card after I told her I paid with one recipet cash and the other card so after it was done she still put everything back on the card after I told her that the one with cash is the one I want cash back for . After I told her I wanted my cash back she refused to do it and told me to take my problem elsewhere she also told me she didn't wanna deal with me . At that moment I was very upset why would I lie about mcchickens my kids specifically wanted ! Then which made the service more poorly the Manager wanted to fight me she wanted to come across the counter her employee had to tell her it's not worth it it's not worth it when she repeatedly told her employee it is worth it !! I contacted customer complaint line which of course I got to a voicemail so I left my name employee store and advise them I would really appreciated if they gave me a call back I really felt that was poor customer service if they don't like there jobs they shouldn't work in a fast food place and dealing with customer service I just want mcdonalds to understand that this is not okay for a manager to want to fight a customer !!!
They have the slowest & worst customer service I've ever seen. Come here if your wasn't your food screwed up & cold!

Homeless people are coming in and out asking for your half eaten food and drinks so don't leave your food unattended. Homeless people hanging outside as well as other people drinking alcohol in a black garbage bag asking for money. The big mac meal was $7. The cashier was sick and was coughing into her hand. She shouldn't be working that day. There's no small size, so she automatically upgraded everyone meal to a large size. Several hours later, I felt queasy about the big mac meal. I don't think I will ever come back here again.
I ordered a large meal and he only put a large drink when I asked where my page fires were the manager said he had to charge me more for the mistake his employee made of only making the drink Lange.

1) Pineapple smoothies should not have chocolate at the bottom of the cup.  2) Fries should not be given to customers burnt and cold.  3)  When you ask for hot fries the manager shouldn't have an attitude or accuse you of trying to get an extra order.  I had my receipt from not even 5 minutes ago and I gave the old fries back.  After driving a couple blocks nobody wants to drive back to McDonald's and get back in line to ask you to do something that should have been done right the first time. Rude!

This MCD is by far the worst on Florin, they had 3 register and at least two of them should be open. I ordered regular fries and they didn't even salt my fries. The employees here looks like they in deep hell, disrespectful and they look like they need extra extra help !
I have never been so rude to at a fast food place!!!!! The manager Hope was so disrespectful I will never come here agian! I feel so sorry for her employees!!!!!!!!!!

When your in a hurry, and hungry  nice SALTY hot fresh french fries taste delicious especially with a hot hamburger and ice cold DRINK.  Stopped here on the way home from WALMART and never disapointed with Mcdonalds

A typical mcdonalds but has really stupid and rude staff. I ordered a white hot chocolate. Whwn she gave me my order, i told her that it was a hot chocolate latte (i could smell the coffee.) Im allergic to coffee btw.  She still argued with me telling me i was wrong. We argued for about 2 minutes and she assured me it was the right one because she made it herself. Spoke to me like im this crazy lady complaining. I left n Came back after 30 seconds and they admitted that they were wrong and replaced my drink. I ended up going to the emergency room after am hour. It could have been easly avoided if she just replaced it n not argued w me. Soo stupid!

I have one word to describe this place...FILTHY!!! Everything from the old soda around the soda fountain to the dirty greasy floor is disgusting. They even forgot my order! I had to ask them cus they were serving ppl after me. It's a sloppy place will never go back here.

If I could give 0 stars I would. Rarely come here but it's convenient when in a hurry. As I write this review I have been suck in their drive through for 25 min and haven't even made it to the order station. Ridiculous. Not like ANYTHING is made to order. No idea what could possibly make them take so long.

First off, the customer service was terrible. Not nice, playing on the job & lazy. One of the workers even said right in front of our faces, "I'm too lazy to get the strawberry smoothie mix so I'm not going to get it unless you do" (to the cashier). Wtf my food is on the line so how as an employee, are you going to say that you're not willing to serve me yourself unless the cashier does? We also asked for fresh food. It was not fresh at all. My wrap was wrapped wrong, ranch & lettuce all over the place. Disappointed & upset about this experience. Their oven was also not working which was also disappointing, even though it may not be their fault. The owner or corporate should really check up on this place. & there wasn't even any sweet tea in the lobby. Speaking of, it was dirty as hell. I don't expect much from McDonald's, but this experience was just way too much. 2 stars only bc at least my food wasn't cold.

worst mcdonalds ever I wish I did have to go there as much as I do but it's the closest one to me and I don't go unless I have to they get my order wrong EVERY single time. avoid this McDonald's if you can if not check your order every time

Some customers are so annoying. They are stupid to expect hot and fresh food in under a minute.  No good food can come from under a minute. And I feel really sorry for the employees who have to always deal with ratchet and ghetto people. Like all the hobos who be coming in giving attitude and stinking up the place or those people who come in to steal drinks. Then we get those ghetto ppl dancing in line or broke ppl paying in pennies. The employees go through a lot of bullshit bc of rude customers so of course they're not going to be all smiles.

Mmmm... Cold burgers and fries....Delish. In all seriousness, the cold burgers actually helped me kick my fast food addiction and drop 25 lbs! Thanks, West Sacramento McDonalds.  Customer service is always fine, I must admit. The staff is always friendly.

Unfortunately the reviews are true about their long wait time at the drive thru. I'm really not sure what's going on, but the last couple of times I've been in the drive thru, I have waited way longer than expected.   The food is okay though.
Who gives napkins that are drenched in who knows what?! One star only because a star is required. Step it up McD.

You've been screwing up my orders and making me wait half an hour in the drive-thru for years, literally, and I've put up with it. But how am I not going to give you a negative review after you give me raw hash browns, and when I tell you, you say "oh my god," throw them away, and then ignore me and my family after that?

‍ I guess I haven't learned my lesson! Check the order before you leave drive thru...I call this a sad meal, not a happy meal and it was to late to turn back around for the toy. Will not be coming to this McDonald's at all! It's the second time we get no toy! Thank god my husband caught it the first time. Shame on me for going again.
Amazing customer service. Wasn't expecting a manager of the place to be this good. Even offered every kid in this place a book and colored pencils. Very fast and polite. Deserves all 5 stars.

This place is a joke! Ordered 4 fries and 4 sundaes, 10 minutes later they started making the sundaes, all hot fudge because they didn't have any caramel. While making the sundaes the girl tells another worker that they are out of hot fudge. They certainly weren't going to do anything about that as my sundaes had a pathetic little blob of fudge in each one, when I picked one up and looked at her and said "so this is it?" She turned and said " yeah sorry" as she walked away. The only thing this place seems to do well is take your money. I will be happy to drive to one of the other two locations in town instead of going here. I probably would have got home quicker. Convenience does not make up for crappy service. Never again!

The last five times I have tried to go here in the past year they have even been closed early or they are open but the drive-through line never moves and I back up and drive away after waiting 5 to 10 minutes. That is all.

WORST DRIVE THROUGH EVER!  Not only that don't know about the products they offer, they will also charge you extra dollars if you are not careful! Just got off the drive through, there was a half-hour wait because there was no body at the drive through station taking orders. Plea plea were honking and getting frustrated. I finally got to place my order "egg and cheese muffin- no meat" but the person taking my order charged me $2 extra for cheese, when I asked why she responded that "I wanted cheese hence"....it already comes with cheese and I don't ask for any extra, in fact I asked to not add meat. Finally another employee stepped in and fixed the order but the process took 5 minutes for an order that would have taken just 1/2 minute.

This is the worst McDonald's ever.  They always forget something, get the wrong order, and they run out of ice, runout of every drink, they dining room is filthy and the kiosks is not user friendly. I wish this was a corporate instead of franchise. Shut this place down!

Wish I could rate this place with ZERO stars!!!   So sick of this place....but I keep going because it's the closest one to me. Went this location around 9:30 on Friday after the football game. I made my order WHICH INCLUDED two chocolate chip cookies and two apple pies. When I got home and realized it wasn't there I searched for the number (wasn't on the receipt). I called seven times, my son called another five. All we got was the fax number. I went back today to get my order. The manager had the nerve to one tell me that wasn't her receipt and for two tell me we should've called. I pulled out my phone showing her I tried calling and that all I kept getting was a fax number. She had attitude I gave it back. Then she had the nerve to say "I'll do it this time", I told her never mind and to give me my ice cream! So pissed. Worse customer service ever!! There's always so many negative things said on our West Sac discussion page on this particular McDonalds. Next time I'll make the drive to one of our other locations.  Sincerely dissatisfied!!

I agree, this place deserves zero stars. The managers are incompetent and lack professionalism. Drive-thru wait time is at least 10-15 minutes. Why does it take so long?? The car in front of me just ordered sundaes.   I see new kids working drive thru each time I visit this place. Does that tell you something? Employees are quitting at a high rate and the managers just don't know what they are doing. Who own's this Mcdonald's franchise restaurant?? Do they realize their restaurant serves cold food, drive thru wait times are ridiculous, and they pay for incompetent managers??  This place is a joke.
Slowest drive-thru EVER!  No excuse for not fixing this issue at some point.  It has been this slow for months and it's getting worse.  Someone needs to get it together!

Now I just go inside knowing on an average day I will wait just as long as I would in the drive thru and get a a free bonus: the chance to see at least one customer on the brink of violence caused directly by the staff and the amazing way they handle conflict. The manager gave one guy the silent treatment, looking like she was throwing her own temper tantrum, and I really thought I was about to see McNugget-based manslaughter.
Really really long wait at the drive through. Screwed up my order. Buns were stale. Makes me wish McDonald's would just go out of business and make room for something better. Just bad.

Holy hell this place is again an unmitigated disaster no Double Quarter Pounders Patty's as posted on the drive-thru window. What the hell else do these people sell its complete Insanity. All the while no shakes as of  11:34 a.m. this is all happening on a Friday On a Friday. U nbelievable. this place is a freaking disaster

If I could give this place 0 stars I would.  Where to begin... the incompetence of the staff is bewildering.  How difficult is it to remember to add French fries to a child's happy meal?!  I mean, seriously it doesn't take a rocket scientist to remember French fries.  The wait for the drive thru is like watching paint dry, it takes FOREVER!  20-30 minute wait for 6-7 cars in front of me is beyond excessive!  The staff has no idea of the new deals happening at McDonald's.  If you have a Facebook, like I'm sure most of their staff has, how do you miss the massive amounts of AD's that McDonald's advertises about their daily deals.  At least management should be educating their employees about them at the very least.  Seriously if you really have a craving for McDonald's, avoid this one at all costs. In fact try a local eatery, better food at probably a better price.

Waited a while in the drive thru for my food which okay I understand most employees seemed pretty young and probably new. I offered to wait in their parking lot for my food. When I got home I noticed something was weird about my egg mc muffin and it looked as if someone had already taken a bite of my food. Definitely wasn't going to take any chances and eat it.

Terrible service, just horrible wait times, received food cold numerous times definitely not recommending to anyone, or coming back, employees care less, dress code not enforced. The mcd on west cap has better reviews thats sad

You can't expect a lot about McDonald's, but you should expect a certain level of competence/service.  This location is pretty new, so everything inside looks nice and is usually fairly clean. There's lots of parking spots outside, which is also a plus. The menu screens are nice and easy to read. Unfortunately, that's the end of the positives.  The staff either gets little to no training, or turns over so quickly, that they are all "unqualified to work at a fast food restaurant". Wow, good help IS hard to find. Trying to use a coupon/discount at the registers is extremely challenging, and almost always requires a manager to help. But at least they spend the time to get it right.  The drive-thru, however, is a wasteland of terror and despair. You have better odds in Vegas, than you do of getting your order right. I say from experience (having about 50 check-ins so far) that 50-70% of the time- a) they will be out of something (no shakes, no espresso, tea machine being cleaned), b) they will ring the order up wrong, c) they will give you the wrong item, or d) no kidding, they give you the entirely wrong order.
This is the slowest McDonalds drive through...even if there's only 2 cars in front of you, expect to wait at least 30 minutes. Same experience every time! Long wait guaranteed!!!

The people here are nice enough and friendly. The issue is during lunch time they will put 10 people to do the drive thru and one person up who has to go back and forth between the front and the drive thru. One time I came here and it took 20 minutes and people were complaining! I really dont come inside because of this issue, I think they need more help or something.

Okay, really? So confused on how you could possibly be so slow!!! I am the only one at the counter and everyone was focused on the drive thru, 8 minutes passed with no acknowledgement. I'd be embarrassed if I owned this location and saw these reviews, get a clue and staff that care at least a little bit. Seriously, the food is sitting in drawers, just open it and put it on the bun

If I had the ability to give this s 0 star, I would because this place should be shut down. First of all, the service is the worst. The wait for food in the drive-thru is at least 20 min and over, and the employees were somehow dumbfounded by the sight of a soda machine because it took five minutes to get 2 sodas, and at the same time, me and my father were harassed by the other waiting people in the drive-thru. Second issue is the fact that half of the crap in there doesnt work most of the time. On several occasions, we were told that the soda maching, the smoothie machine, and the ice cream machine did not work. Honestly, the only McDonald's you should go to is the one on West Cap
This is the McDonald's that will convince you those workers do not deserve $15/an hour.

Kind of had a bad experience there at this place you would expect it to be a really awesome restaurant cuz of what her location is but I'm sure that is different I waited about 15 minutes and I was trying to eat in I got frustrated because I got tired of waiting I really don't know what's up with the employees they always look like they have some kind of problem with serving people I never complain about McDonald's before in my life I've been in there since I was a kid but this one really f****** sucked I am not happy I'm not satisfied I waited there for a while the girls see me like standing there and I wanted to order something and she went to do something else and was rude instead of saying I'll be with you in a minute or something like that at least paying attention to me so I'm just going to say I'm not going to eat there anymore I want to say f*** this place excuse my language

There is truly nothing redeeming about this location. Orders in the dining room take 20 minutes on average. The drive through line is no better. They constantly get your orders wrong. Oh, and they don't accept any coupons at this location. Curse my child for craving a dang Happy Meal every now and then... Ugh!

The West Sac McDonalds has the worse customer service. The wait time is horrible, be ready to wait 10-15 minutes in the drive thru. I can see why people are not coming to this location. The Manager has the worse customer service skills. She refused to refund an incorrect order and ring up my order correctly. When asked why, she said she has to keep refunds to a minimum, and refused to help me so I left. There were two other people complaining about service to her too. When I asked for her Manager's name she said I had to call corporate and the complaint would come back to her.  Wow!!  Trying to find the owners name so I can contact him/her.  I hope this type of service is unacceptable to him/her but I see so many complaints online so starting to wonder.

This place is soooo slow it has two drive thrus they can't ever hear you there seems to be a lot of staff for so many mess ups have had to go in multiple times to get something corrected or owed to me but it's the closest one around guess I'll have to stick with it up but pick it up please

This has got to be THE SLOWEST McDonald's ever. Every time i come there is a long wait, despite the large  number of employees working, not many people in line or many cars in the drive thru. They need a lesson in efficiency for sure. As i write this, I've been in the drive thru line for over twenty minutes, and there weren't many cars in front of me, maybe four or so. What gives??
This location had gone down hill quickly recently! Slow service, stale bread, old, dried up beef patties. What is going on here? Do not go there until they get their act together!

Ashley Ashley Ashley!!! WOW! Incredibly, outstanding, Super duper customer service!! She is the ONLY reason why I go to this particular location. She is simply amazing...for example earlier this morning like 5:30am to be exact. Before I had to start work she just went out her way for me and was very patient and woke me up from her powerful positive attitude and prepared me for my day....for that I thank you and the 5 stars are for you and you only.  Mc Perfect
Incompetent drive-thru staff. I can't count the times they messed up my order or ran out of items.

It is not only the drive in.  Went into the counter area only to be ignored although the only customer was a crew member who had finished her order but wouldn't clear the counter.  Finally left without ever being acknowledged.
The drive through is getting slower and slower.  Very disappointing.  I don't know if they are under staffed or incompetent

This is the worst McDonalds I have ever been to in my entire life!  The service in the drive through is horrible, they get the orders mixed up, and the service inside is even worse.  It's slow, the food is cold when they get the order correct.  They are not even friendly!

This is the worst McDonald's we ever went to. We were at the drive thru, the worker told us hold on, and he ended up taking orders from 2 cars on the other side, that came after us. Not only that, they forgot to give us the following from our order: sauces and apple slices from two of our happy meal orders, we had to ask for 1 more milk because they only gave us 1, they forgot to give us straws for our drinks, and they didn't give us any napkins.

The food is consistent but the drive through is the worst. No one wants to be that car that is asked a go ahead and park and will bring your order out to you. But at times your order or the kitchen maybe so delayed that doing so is expedient. This location doesn't seem to grasp that. Regardless of how complicated the order is or how long it'll take to get it out, they refuse to park the car.
This McDonald has the slowest drive thru i have ever been to. I guess I deserve it for eating crappy food lol

Nice people but extremely slow.  They don't have enough people working.  One same guy rind both 1st and 2nd Windows.  Sometimes you see some employees just standing and look around.  They need to work on their time and speed.

We are paying customers who don't drink soda. Family of 4. We asked for 4 waters and the store manager said she could only give us 2 because of the 2-water cups per car policy that they have (or she made up). I think it's irrational and highly unfounded. Legally restaurants are obliged to provide water when asked. Even Starbucks gives water EVEN when you do not buy a cup of coffee. They need to change their policy for the sake of human decency and for the non-soda drinkers.

Received RAW quarter pounder at the drive thru. Attempted to call the location to inform them they were serving RAW burgers. Listed number went to a fax machine. Contacted corporate to inform them of the RAW food and the inability to contact. They apologized, blah blah. A week later received a form letter from the store manager, apologizing. Under the circumstances, the least you could have done was to call and apologize for risking the health of my family. Not acceptable.

It's McDonald's, don't expect too much! Food comes out quick, service is okay, but I think that the people who work here are way more polite and friendly than what I've come to expect from Mcdonald's! I haven't had any issues with messed up orders but I also only go once in awhile for a soft serve cone. But they've never screwed that up so we're good for now!  The line to go to this one is too long though - wait time is insane, so just prepare for that!
How can you beat these deals from the dollar menu? Mc chicken add tomato, or mc double add onions. Definitely my go-to when you looking for a quick bite and affordable options

I went through to get a chocolate shake and what I got was literally chocolate milk with whipped cream on it. I thought it looked runny when I grabbed it from the drive through window and then once I drove away and took a sip - omg.  They should have either told me the machine wasn't working good or not serve them at all. Very disappointed.

I have no reason to give any less than 5 stars as my food was Mc Perfect and my service although brief (drive thru) was Mc Pleasant.   I had a sausage burrito, a sausage, egg, and cheese Mcgriddle, hash brown, and a caramel mocha frappe. All was hot, fresh tasting and not thrown at me. Except the frappe because it is a frozen drink and was cold as intended it was also not thrown at me nor almost spilled due to pushy clumsy hands like has happened before at other places, which is always a plus. I dealt with a young lady at window #1 and another one at window #2. They were polite, professional, and clean in appearance.   The parking lot, drive thru lanes( they have 2 order takers and then merge into one lane) were clean, the building was pleasant looking to the eye and I was content with my choice over the Taco Bell next door. :-)  I recommend this Mc Donald's to anyone in the Southport area who has an eurge to Dah Dah Dah Dah Dah Dah.  That looks a lot better in my head. (The jingle) SmH

Love this Mc D's. We have been going here for a long time. It's a very busy store but the manager Ashley is awesome and her crew is awesome!! They always get my order right and as fast as they can, because you know there's a lot of picky eaters in this world!! Thanks Ashley & crew!!

They always, and yes I mean always, hand me drinks completely dripping with soda. Not just a drop or two but soda dripping on all sides of the cups. I ask for a napkin and wipe the cups off before I put them in my cupholder. I contacted corporate but this practice continues. I have yet to see an employee wipe off the cup before they hand it to me. Very frustrating.

If i could give this place 0 Stars I would. First of all the drive-thru takes forever this is a fast food place they need to speed up a bit more. Also some of the employees are very rude i work in a food place and even if im having a bad day I am still respectful to the customers this girl at McDonald's is very rude i always have a smile she does not ask how you're doing she just hand you your food and doesn't say anything at all i say thank you and she says nothing . Learn customer service better us customers are paying to put money in your pocket you can at least be a little nice even if you have to fake being nice.

I just waited for 30 minutes to get a Mcflurry, will never go back, also the employee was rude when I told him I had changed my mind because of the half hour wait, will make sure that neither I nor my friend give them any business
How is it possible to have a 30 minute wait at 12:16 in the morning.... there's internally no one here and they're taking so dang long for 2 large fries and a drink..
Always missing items you order and for being such a new restaurant the tables and floors are always dirty and sticky.
It was a pretty quick experience. The staff was very cheerful during my experience. McNuggets were on point and the fries were fresh. I recommend this fast food joint to anybody.

Worst Mcdonald EVER.....don't go here....let me explain my story and you will all agree these people are cruel. I work as a paramedic on an 911 ambulance so eating is always a challenge on the job. I ordered and paid for food at the McDonald's on Reed. We received a 911 call and I had to leave before getting my food. After completing our call we ended up in the southport area covering that half of the city (posting is strict with no freedom to move as we please in the city) so I go to this McDonald's on Lake Washington hoping to get some food since by now I am starving! They tell me they are not affiliated with the other McDonald's and will not honor my order. they said I would have to pay for food all over again. I understand they have a policy to follow but still come on....can you believe the lack of customer service?? Needless to say if this is how they treat their 911 providers who wants to go here....??

This place is always dirty. I have been here so many times with nobody in the dining room and all the workers are just standing around talking.   If it's always dirty in the dining room, it makes you think how dirty it is behind the counter.   Clean the dining room!!!
Long line, loud angry staff arguing in the kitchen, needs maintenance, the soda machine made Coca Cola go all over my hands.

Just had some fries again today. I gave it another shot and was totally disappointed. They are soggy and taste like old oil. I am completely done giving this place a chance. I will no longer give this location any of my money. I will let everyone I know how low quality this location is.  You need to hire some management that can whip those Teenagers into shape and teach them how to properly prepare the food .  Also the drive thru takes forever. Every time. Not just every now and then but every time.  I live in Southport and this location is so convenient as its so close to home, but I would rather visit any other of the 3 locations in west sac than ever go back to this location again.

Our family is in and out of this location. I tend to let little things go like having to constantly remind them that I asked for sauce for my son's Happy Meal. Or the inconsistent way they charge prices....sometimes chocolate milk in a Happy Meal is an up-charge, sometimes it's not. Orange juice is always an up-charge with your meal at breakfast, but sometimes it's a small and sometimes it's a medium. It depends on who's working that day. I generally refuse to eat inside as the soda fountain area always seems to be sticky and dirty. And there's something wrong and not quite right about ketchup that foams when you dispense it. And the female employees with the long, fake, manicured nails bother me...I work in an establishment that handles food and I know long nails of that nature are against Serve Safe requirements. And even look the other way as one of the managers openly grazes on pickles with bare hands off of the line...it's clearly visible to customers. My issue comes from yesterday when I bought a Sausage Egg McMuffin for breakfast. I get it home and sit down to rearrange the egg and top muffin that were slightly off. And what do I find? A hard piece in the egg. So I picked it out. Turns out to be a large piece of egg shell. While I appreciate they use real eggs (I mean who hasn't wondered once or twice?) I was shocked to find such a rather large piece of shell in my food. I understand small pieces every now and again and I admit I've found small pieces in my sandwiches before from here, but this was rather unappetizing. My dog had a nice breakfast though.

Probably one of the worst McDonalds I've ever been to.  A model of how to get very little done and take an extremely long time to do it even with way too many staff.  My son and I are eating lunch here right now.  Took 12 minutes for one happy meal and two cheese burgers.  Crazy!  I can see five employees just in the front alone and there are more in the back.  No one in line to order food.  Drive through only has a couple cars so it's not like it's a rush.  They are running around like it's the biggest sales rush ever! Did I mention dirty?  I'm constantly swatting flies just trying to survive sitting here while my son eats slowly.  Tables are filthy.  Soda machines have stuff spilled everywhere and not cleaned up.  Soda lids are empty for the drink size I ordered so I had to dig around.  If they aren't cleaning, and aren't taking orders, and aren't producing food in under 10 minutes, then what exactly are they doing?
They are always screwing up our orders. Never go through the drive through. It seems like the coke machine is ALWAYS broken.

Shame on the management at this location. I live nearby and the service is horrible (rude employees), always out of amenities in the dining area and the drive through almost always screws up the order. I've had to pull over and go in 9 out of 10 times. The wait is extremely long and the dining room is pretty much dirty all the time. I haven't been back for a while so I hope they get whatever problem they have straightened out.

Avoid this location. Im not a complainer as you will see from my Yelp reviews. But this location is the most inconsistent, unorganized, untrained McDonalds Ive ever been to. I had stopped after a long day to get 2 quarter pounder meals, simple enough. I was 3rd in the drive through, we had all waited about 7 minutes for the person in the front to get their order vs. having them pull to the front of the store to await their order. the person in front of me as well as my self had their food quickly meaning it has been sitting waiting for us for at least 5 minutes. The person at the drive through handed me the bag and stated, "heres your food" no thank you no review of the order. When I had gotten home we had realized the food was very cold, the burger was black from being over cooked and the bun was stale to the point of being hard and un edible. We both threw the food away knowing we weren't going to drive 10 minutes back to this location and put up with poor service again. I had taken the survey on line indicating they can keep their 2 for one deal I wanted a refund for the food I had to throw away, I had asked for a call back from the manager, this was 4 days ago. DO NOT waste your time or your money for rude service, no respect for your time or patronage. The food was so terrible I dont see how a location could be so inconsistent when they only have one menu to practice every day. I wish I could add an image of the blackened burgers and hard buns. Terrible experience with no follow up from the management as requested. Training and management is the worst Ive ever seen
Just got another meal from ya. It was bad taste was way off of other McD .the fries were almost raw. Come on you guys can do better than you have been doing.

This was probably the worst experience at a McDonalds I've had...which is saying a lot because it's McDonalds lol but my boyfriend just asked for a cheeseburger with no pickle and no mustard. Of course they messed it up so he very politely went up to the counter and asked for them to fix it. When the cashier brought the burger back, the person making the burgers said "Oh, is he being difficult?" He was being very polite and as far as I'm concerned, leaving stuff off a burger isn't difficult. On top of it, the managers yell at their employees in front of everyone. A good manager would pull you aside and tell you what to work on. They wouldn't shame you in front of everyone. They are very disrespectful to their employees and that alone is enough to make me never come back to this location again. I feel bad for these employees. This job is stressful enough.
Drive through took a little long, but my order was fresh and hot! There was a employee sweeping the lot as I drove off and told me to have a nice day! Thought that was sweet!

They do not take the coupons you get in the mail. The service here was very slow. We were standing at the counter to get something they forgot from our order, and the staff completely ignored us. The cashier was making food. they seem understaffed. The good was fine. Won't come back.
Fast food... They kinda have the food part down.  The fast... not so much. Slowest fast food in west sac by far.some sit down establishments are faster.22 min in drive thru. Ridiculous.

And fast food workers want increased wages?     I rarely go here and the reason is that every time they get my order wrong.   I order an egg mcmuffin, I get a sausage mcmuffin.  I order plain cheese burgers and they never get those right.  Really, is it that hard to get orders right?   They always forget my kids drink with their happy meals.  (You think that goes over well with twin 3 year olds?). There are two lanes for the drive through and it takes forever.   Seriously get your act together people!   The only thing good is the friendly service.

At 54 years old, I have dined at my fair share of McDonald's Restaurants. This particular McDonald s, being situated in an upper-middle class neighborhood, one would assume that both the quality of the food and service would be at the very least average,  This is by far is not the case! They often run out of apple pies, miss items ordered, and are rude on occasion.

Went through the drive thru to get two soft serve cones. When i ordered I said I wanted two kids cones. I pulled up and she gave me one that had almost nothing in it because it was melted. Then she came back with two mcflurrys with my other soft serve no where in sight. She got mad at me because she screwed up. She brought back another cone that was melted. I have had ordered kids cones here before and they were bigger but not to big. She got mad again and made them again. I said thank you can she said whatever. If she owned up to her mistake I would have been fine but that fact that she was overly rude is why I won't be going there

My vegetarian wife and I went thru the drive through.  she ordered an egg mcmuffin  with cheese. Employee says it's not on the menu, you have to order sausage mc muffin.  My wife said,ok give it to me without the meat.  Employee advise extra charge for cheese, making the sandwich cost more without the meat. We politely declined and left. .
Giving another star because it seems they have gotten a little better at getting the orders right, but still get it wrong more than other McDonalds. Keep on improving please:)

I go to this McDonald's on so often cause at near my boyfriends house. The service is pretty slow for a McDonald's. The staff here are pretty friendly for the most part. The food here to my surprise are fresh and unlike most McDonald's look like the picture.   The dinning area is a little dirty, the ketchup and soda fountains are usually a mess. They seem to cater to the drive thru more so if you want faster service perhaps you are better off waiting in the drive thru line. Oh, I forgot to mention that this McDonald's closes pretty early... They are not a 24hr so if you have late night munches this is not the place to go!

Usually I don't review Mc Donald's or of the like but this was hilarious.  They were out of ketsup in the dispenser so I asked for some at the counter, I was told they were out...even the packets!  Well when I cut the kids cheeseburger, ketsup came pouring out... there must have been 3/4 of a cup of ketsup.  The paper place mat had a coupon for the Harlem Globe Trotters, the event occurred a month prior.   Prime example of quantity not quality.... And it's a brand new location.  Very poor management.

Horrible customer service with very rude drive thru employees. My order is wrong 9 out of 10 times. When I tried to tell the manager he was very rude and angry. He tried to make it almost seem like it was my fault that his employees can't put together a order correctly. They also close down early for no reason at night way before closing time. I've driven up and seen employees sitting around while there business hours stated they were open. Is this what we are going to be paying $15 an hour for????

I was getting sick of the mediocre continental breakfast being offered at my hotel, so I ventured out to McD's as I was craving an egg mcmuffin.  This place is obviously new, as I went into the women's room to wash my hands and the stalls and walls inside was not scribbled with graffiti or names/initials. You know, I never got that, but I digress....  Anyways, there was a line in the drive thru, so stepping in resulting in getting my order in and meal quickly. Since I was surprise of the quick turnaround, I decided to eat my egg mcmuffin meal here. The mcmuffin was actually put together pefectly--it was perfectly stacked!! when the heck does that ever happen?!?!?! the hash brown was fresh off the fryer and the OJ I had with my meal rounded off the nice 15 minutes I had to eat my breakfast.  Their seats...are interesting, as nicely as I can put it. Not quite cushy, but it gets the job done. I picked a seat in front of their flatscreen TV.
The absolute slowest McDonalds ever.  I've been sitting in the drive thru line for 25 minutes and there were only 4 cars in front of me.  Still sitting here....

I don't think I can say enough bad stuff about McDonalds. Everytime I eat here I feel sick afterwards. I feel very lethargic and most of the time I get really bad heartburn. I don't even eat McDonald's anymore unless it's an emergency and I'm traveling and can't find anything else.

Probably the best service I have had at a McDonalds or any other fast food chain for that matter. Rosio took my order, complimented my daughter's eyes and gave her a cookie. Im really glad this is my local McDonalds...this will keep me coming back.

I have gone to this McDonald's on several occasions as it is 2 minutes from my home.  Even though I have had prior bad experiences, I chalked it up to the person that was working that particular day and hoped future visits would be better.  Fail.  1.  On one visit, my Big Mac was thrown together.  All of the meat, cheese, lettuce, sauce, pickles were on the top half of the sandwich.  There was nothing between the bottom two peices of bread.  It was like a cheeseburger with an extra peice of bread.  I called the manager, who was not apologetic at all and informed me that he normally watches as the sandwiches are made.  Really?  So you stand there, your entire shift and watch them make sandwiches.  GTFOH.  2.  On another visit, I received two spoiled yogurt parfaits.  Needless to say, my husband and I ended up spending time with the porcelain god.  3.  On multiple occasions, there has been so much salt on the fries that the fries were sparkling.  Also, the grease is old.  You can tell by the taste and darkness of the fries.  4.  On another visit, I was asked to hold in drive through.  I watched as another car came through, ordered, received their food and drove off.  I was still waiting.  I drove up to the window, where the cashier apologized even though he wasn't the one that asked me to hold.  It was a woman.  When I get to the next window, I see the woman that asked me to hold, she didnt acknowledge it or apologize or anything.  I have come to the conclusion that this place is a complete disaster.  After multiple visits, and being disappointed everytime, I have decided not to return.  This place will be out of business soon.  I would rather drive 5-10 mins further to get my food made properly with better customer service.  Another reviewer stated that this particular McDonald's is privately owned.  That explains a lot.

Found a Hair about 6 inches long, dirty blonde hair in my breakfast burrito, never again ruined my whole breakfast and my appetite. That was so convenient for our family to go in the drive thru for breakfast twice a week but no more. That's why one star
Horrible service. Never ask for ketchup or even give napkins. I wish they did better, when you go make sure you ask for napkins !
