My God!   It takes some real talent to screw up a salad but this place managed to do it.   When one orders a BACON Ranch Salad and Crispy Buttermilk Chicken, one expects there might be BACON on the salad.   There was NONE...not even a small piece.  In addition, three of the four tomatoes were rotten and there was about a teaspoon of cheese.   $6 for this crap??   What made it even better is the workers are most likely related to a turtle (and they want $15 an hour?   I DON"T THINK SO.)   The visit before this, we waited for half an hour in the drive-through line at 10 pm at night.   REALLY??  We have numerous restaurants in this four block area.   I'll patronize them instead.

Worst Service at Mc Donald. They messed up my order and when I called to complain I was asked to either come back same day or a different day. Since I was head to work I told them I will stop by next day. When in next day I was told they never received a call from me.my name was not on there complain book. I call the cooperate office and they send me coupon and this particular location won't take it.
This is the best McDonald's I have ever been to the employees are also so nice & my food is always fresh , i would t go to any other McDonald's than this one ! Way to go you guys !!!!
Very bad service i would say... Staff are so rude... Nd half the time their soda machine is not working
Service was really bad for a brand new place. Needs improvement now! no napkins on a drive thru order....no straws.....lame...nuggets COLD!

We try to avoid this place if we can.  Unfortunately it is nearby so we do still come in once in awhile.  Tonight they were very under staffed and it took forever to order and to get our food.  There was one girl working the counter during dinner time.  The last time they screwed up our order and only filled the large smoothie I order 3/4 the way full.  When I questioned it 5he girl blamed it on the machine but did nothing about it.  Another time their drive through sign advertised a special.  They would not honor it and the manager said they forgot to take the special down.  Very poorly run place.  McDonald's corporate should be embarrased.

This is right by our house so it ends up getting a lot of our business after kids' activities and such, so I give it a lot of leeway because I'm too lazy to drive out of my way at 9 o'clock at night.  That said, tonight was RIDICULOUS and I won't be going back anytime soon.  Literally over 30 minutes from entering the drive through to when I pulled away from the food window.  Waited behind a bunch of cars which was why I figured things were slow, but no.  After 7 or 8 minutes I finally get to order.  They leave stuff off the order - easily fixable.  Pull up to the first window.  Wait.  Wait some more.  Wait.  Finally the car in front of me at the food window pulls away so I just pull all the way forward.  Drive through employee says: Were you the order with the frozen strawberry lemonade?  Nope, frozen regular lemonade.  I also say, Hey you might want to put a sign on the first window that nobody's going to be there and to pull forward.  He apologizes, but his name tag is handwritten - clearly he's new.  Five minutes later he comes back and says sorry the frozen lemonade machine is broken.  I say fine, give me a coke.  That takes a good 10 minutes because now the coke machine isn't working.  Someone comes to help him, but she clearly doesn't care much.  I considered just driving off since I had the food already, but I'm apparently a glutton for punishment so I stay.  So between the 8 minutes to order, the 18 minutes from order to payment, and the 10 minutes I waited at the food window, I was beyond livid by the time I left.  At least the order was right.
They don't accept manufacturers coupons. Are you kidding me? Get out of here with that bad attitude you rich bastard.

Don't come here. The wait alone makes you regret your decision.you can easily spend more than 10 minutes in the drive thru with only one car ahead of you and they only order a couple things. If you are trying to make it quick your better off going to another McDonald's

Do not eat here. My wife and I ordered two ice cream cones -- and the employee handed us two melted cones. We asked her to remake them and then we watched her dump the ice cream back in to the machine. Yes, they recycle their food. I can only imagine what they do with the meat or other products. I hope the health inspector sees this.

If I could give 0 or negative stars, I would. Never have I been so frustrated and upset that I have felt compelled to review a fast food establishment, but this is anything but fast. Granted, I didn't go into the store, I only went through the drive through, but this was the most inefficient place I've ever been too. With how long I waited, I could have entered a sit down restaurant, been seated, ordered, received my food, and paid before I even got to the drive through window! No sense of urgency at all, and the staff didn't even seem to care - they were chatting and hanging out. I'd rather drive across town to another McDonalds - it'd probably even be faster than waiting for this one!
Love the new location! The inside is clean & new. The drive thru has 2 ordering lines. Yay McD's! Quick tip: Tuesday 2/7, Buy one get one free Big Macs! Woo hoo!
Food was fine, employees were friendly, order was right as all this should be expected.  It took a ridiculous amount of time to get my food.  It's supposed to "fast" food. Keyword: FAST
Always looking for a good deal and love coupons! But this location doesn't take McDonalds coupons, it's privately owned??? Are they serious or just not in the mood?

I was looking for the hours it's open (not listed on the main McD website, or here - so annoying!) and I was surprized to see all the bad reviews. In my experience, this place is good - friends live nearby and I've been to this McD location about 10 times this summer. All 10 times there was nothing wrong with the food, my orders were correct, the fries and hash browns were super-fresh, like, just fried 45 seconds ago, the food was hot, the smoothies were cold, service was prompt, employees seemed nice / normal, napkins and straws were provided... Maybe the only people who bother to write a yelp review of a McDonalds drive thru are the people who are really angry, and that just leads to bad reviews? Because really, I've been there - it's a perfectly nice place. In fact, I think I'm going to hit it during the morning carpool today. My only problem with this place is that they don't post online to say what hours they are open!

Never again will I patron this "restaurant".  It is so close to home and convenient for my four active kids as we are constantly running to different activities five to six nights a week.  While I cook often, every once in a while it is nice to have a break and pick up food.  I have stopped here three times in the last two months (drive-thru) and each time either the wrong order was keyed in, items are missing, or the wrong items are placed in the bag.  Each time I learned to check the bag, but apparently that is not enough.  Tonight there was the right quantity in the bag, but one of the items was the wrong one (filet-o-fish for a burger???).  Usually it is my kids that get the raw deal so I am giving up my food so they can eat.  Really unfortunate that the most basic of customer service tasks cannot even be performed correctly.  As a customer service employee myself it is really, really disappointing and I will drive out of my way from now on to patron a different franchise.

This place sucks!  The people are more interested in talking to each other than serving customers.  I ordered a BLT chicken sandwich meal with no tomatoes. I got my order and it was just a piece of chicken, and a dab of mayo. I went to the counter and showed the cashier and told him I would like the lettuce and bacon please. He took the sandwich to the manager who then pointed him to the cook. The cashier then proceeded to open my sandwich WITH NO GLOVES ON and no washed hands and pick up the piece of chicken.   Some conversation was occurring which took a few minutes with my sandwich wide open getting cold.  What's so hard about slapping a piece of lettuce and bacon on it.  Soooo he finally just puts a piece of lettuce on it closes the box and puts it in the bin for pickup. I said no, it is not right, what about the bacon?? The manager then comes to me and says what did you order. I point to the #8 meal saying BLT crispy chicken with no tomatoes.  Sooo she goes to the cook and they have this lengthy conversation.  I got so mad standing there watching this go on I went and sat down.  A few minutes go by and then my sandwich is done. I got it COLD and with cheese on it which I didn't want!  What is so hard??? Then the soda machine was not working right, the mix was putting out mostly carbonated water. The manager was told this by other people as well and she just smiled at the guy and said ok.  WTF?  She never fixed it or offered to fill our drinks from the behind the counter dispenser.  REALLY, to the OWNER. Your business is going to FAIL if you don't get things fixed with your employees.  I won't be eating here again. Taco bell next door does a great job, they even smile and thank you for coming and get your order right on a regular basis!

I've never written a review before but felt compelled to do so as this is has had to be the worst experience,ever, I've experienced at a drive through anything! First, a female voice came through a speaker asking for our order but then would not respond only to let another car whom drove up after us in second lane,place their order and proceed ahead of us.She was not at the first window where we paid for our meal. At the second window, a female was there,asked what sauce our daughter wanted (was ketchup and ranch dsg),proceeded to hand us an overstuffed bag which burst all over the car sending our 2 orders of fries throughout the car.She says "do you need a new bag?",and I told her "yes and new fries".She takes her time,as cars back up, to then hand me a minature bag with 1 instead of 2 fries.Not even a sorry or even a quick kick in the butt.Just a smirk.We get home to discover that not only had she/they left out a McChicken (thus eliminating 1 persons "dinner"-if you want to call this food that), she had gotten the drink order incorrect also! Come on! This is not rocket science.Foolish me, I should have double checked the bags to ensure they had done their job correctly. My fault.I was annoyed and frustrated enough to call the phone number on my receipt,several times, where you can speak to the manager with complaints and or leave a message if your food order was incorrect. All my phone calls,amazingly enough,goes to a voice mail box that is too full to take any more messages. That was total validation for me that this place is a disgrace to the long standing name of McDonalds. No, it is not a health food restaraunt,but is a fun treat once in a blue moon for the kids for a job well done only to have service so utterly poor was a disgrace.I read a comment that all the West Sacramento McDonalds are privately owned and sounds like this behavior is acceptable if not tolerated. Well I'm sure "The Big Cheese" of McDonalds would be highly upset to see people treated this way and the food service industry be represented so awfully. There has to be a reportable way.

fair warning to everyone wanting breakfast...this location is will not open at 5:00am even though the signs on the door say 5:00am. today was the third time this year that i had to pull out of the drive thru at 5:25 or later. when you see the drive thru full of cars waiting and it is before 5:45am do not pull in or you will get trapped in a row of cars honking at the employees inside to take their orders....believe me; they do not care and they will just ignore you. if you don't leave they will shut off the drive thru lights and go hide in the back until they feel like opening. this time i was behind a man with his children and this man actually knocked on the drive thru window at two managers who were standing in the lobby drinking coffee. the man asked them when they would open and both of the managers shrugged their shoulders and walked away laughing. do not plan on getting anywhere with these people because they will proudly advise you that they run all of the west sacramento mcdonalds locations. you will get laughed at...i am done getting trapped in the drive thru between a dozen cars honking and knocking on the windows to get served. this is not worth the risk any longer..and just to update everyone; you cannot use mcdonalds coupons at any location in this whole city. the investor that owns these locations will not accept any coupons.

I come through here and a couple other locations nearby, I'd say this is probably the second worst McDonald's in West Sacramento. I don't make super complex orders. Cheeseburger, extra pickles. Everytime I check it's only two pickles and they're about room temp. Instead of making a fresh cheeseburger with more than the standard two pickles, they give me the premade leftover cheeseburgers and slap a special order sticker on it without even squeezing an extra pickle into it.   It's been proven to me that it's literally too complex to factor in between 1 and 0 modifications to a burger with, at most, 6 ingredients. This is either idiocy, laziness or apathy, and if any of those are the case, I'd also be concerned about the state of the sanitation and whether the people preparing food know they can't skip washing their hands by spitting on them and slapping a special order ticket on them.  If you're the type to do simple special orders, or expect fast food to be faster than browsing a grocery store, finding your preprepared foodstuff and waiting in line stay far far away. And stay away from the other one on westcap too. The amount of shirtless meth addicts fighting in their parking lot is shocking, and I think someone stole their golden arch.

30 minutes in the drive through. Asked about the wait and they said they have to take care of the people sitting inside first before they manage the drive through line.  I thought that made no sense at all but no wonder their drive through line was over 15 cars long. Efficiency is key and they don't have that here. Probably faster to go to a further McDonald's than wait here.  Just thought I'd share their process here in case you were in a rush and decided to stop by.
Worst McDonald's got my order wrong and I waited 30 minutes . When we pulled up to the window no one greeted us. The guy in front of us got tired of waiting and drove off.
This place is an absolute Shit Hole! Dirty as all get out. Slowest workers in the world. Tweakers galore! Yep won't be back to this dump!
Rude staff! Horrible service !!! Wait is so long . Gotta wait at the speaker for 5 minutes . Lady at the drive thru very unprofessional .

They suck they never have anything ever .they are always out of something and they can never take any coupons because they don't know how to use their machine and it's always a kid that doesn't know how to take an order or forgets to give you something they're out of everything they just told me they're out of pickles how are they out of pickles

Slowest McDonald's ever, even to get one fries I waited 7 minutes . I don't like coming but it's the closest one to my job. And when I got my fries they were cold. -_- I just looked at the lady and shook my head and drove off.
I spent 25 mins. in the drive thru...........................that says a lot about a business.

I've always been passing by this location for my morning cup of coffee.  And sometimes, for a sausage and egg mcmuffin when I need a morning breakfast.  And the staff are fast and efficient that I could be in and out of the place in five minutes...tops!  I won't say anything detrimental as the place is a fast food joint...it's as good as it gets...and it gets my commendation.  You want five-star service from a fast food place...you're barking up the wrong tree, buddy!  Be reasonable...  My only complaint is not in the store but outside.  Panhandlers greet you by the door every now and then...

McDonald's needs to send secret shoppers here regularly because it lacks quality and their standards. I've frequented the drive through and indoor dining several times. Each time was a long LONG wait. I recommend your orders be repeated and double checked before you leave. Frequently understaffed for their business needs or just poor overall management. The staff are friendly though and the dining area was clean. Pass this one by as there's another McDonald's down the street.

The worst! We watched our order fall off the screen. The manager filled it from our receipt then wadded it up and threw it away. There was one person in the dining area but no clean tables. The whole place looked sad and neglected. I won't go back and neither should you!

Took in a coupon that came in direct mail ... they would not honor it. Gave me the "have a nice day" after I questioned their refusal. Instead of trying to solve the issue they blamed their corporate office. Went to Subway ... they always support their advertising.  MM

This is probably the best McDonald's that I've ever gone to. The service was personal and friendly. They were a little on the slower side, but all of the food was fresh and great tasting. I would rather have fresh food than something a few minutes quicker and much worse. We even had someone bring us our food and make sure that we had enough sauces and napkins. Restaurant service at a fast food location. Good job.

I went into this McDonald's today about 4 PM and stood at the counter for 5 minutes waiting to order while two employees discussed football. One of them looked over at me and then continued on with the conversation ignoring me. I figured maybe they weren't the ones that were taking orders so I waited patiently. Another employee in a red shirt who I figured was a manager came up and put something under the counter and looked at me and walked away. When finally another customer got in line behind me one of the two employees who were discussing football which was way more important than helping customers finally came over to take my order. At that time I left without ordering and will never go back to this location again. Absolutely disrespectful staff.
Waited 30 min in line while cashier helping person in front of me kept leaving the customer to go screw around in the back while the other employees are working so slow in the back. I walked out...
Always slow no good customer service ..I went in and asked for cookies and said oven is broke but seen some on box but I need more sounds lime just didnt wanna cook them
Worst dam McDonalds  Literally 30min to get 4 ice coffees, they didn't apologize! Not a friendly or "fast" restaurant Never coming again & don't recommend this location to anyone!!

So I'm literally sitting here for ten minutes stuck between the first person and the last person. They haven't taken my order. Only told me to "hold on". It's bullshit. Especially when you back out and they're looking out the window laughing. Definitely won't be coming back.

This McDonald's has never messed up my order not once, unlike the one down the street on Westacre.  The crew working here seem to be an actual group and not dreading coming to work despite the slack they may get. If I'm in the mood for McDonald's or my son makes his demands for some then this is the one I drive my happy ass to. Now in the same parking lot as Raku sushi which means I instantly leave the drive way wishing my social life was more in tuned to my needs as a sushi lover and not a single father lol.
I hate this mcdonalds. Every single time I order in drive thru there is always a long wait before I even order and there is no one in line. Never had an easy smooth drive thru experience here.

Don't judge. On road trips, I always get the cheap gas at the Arco across the street, the Ikea is down the road, the gas station sells Powerball tickets, and if I need a clean bathroom stop and to score free wifi and to pump up my sugar with a $1 ice cream sundae, I'll be here in the corner being all nonjudgmental.  Having said that, I'm not so happy that there are pan handlers that parked themselves right by the front door and ask for money as I come in and out.

The order Intercom is ALWAYS broken. When I get to the window I almost ALWAYS repeat my order. I gave this particular Mc E D'z one more try and went inside and they told me in front of slough of people that my card doesn't work and was declined when I have a boat load of money. I never take the time out to review unless it's absolutely necessary. Please please review the workers and the TOTAl MANAGEMENT of this place. THUMBS DOWN

This is the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. You are basically abandoned at the register while a half dozen people scramble around doing anything but waiting on you. Complained about a fat Latino guy who ignored me to a woman who said she was the manager (Victoria) but he must have been a relative e because she never called me back even though she said she would. Slow, slow, slow and every order ill have something added or subtracted from what you ordered and if anyone actually says thank you or hello or goodbye, consider it a day to play the lottery. This is where they send the workers everyone complains about and lets them pretend to be managers or supervisors. AWFUL!!!!!!!!

Super slow.  Every time.  Slowest McDonald.   Not sure why they take so long for drive in.  You could be sitting in drive through for 10 minutes and no movement.   I see some employees roaming around inside but...

I go in to order a chocolate shake to go for my hubbie and the chocolate syrup  is way low so I give it back and the the server...it's barely even brown tone so he looks and sees the mix is all but gone so refill's it.  I guess to make a new one and refill the supply.  I ask him...may have the extra since he's just going to throw it out anyway and he says no.  I just wanted to give the extra milk shake to a homeless person outside.  He then tells me he needs to get the next person in line...I'm cool with that and patiently wait for him to fulfill their order and them ask again may have the shake that was going to be deposited into the trash anyway.  The whole time..no eye contact.  I ask him again and he says...yah if you want to pay for it..I said..well you're just going to throw it away...I'm all...well may I speak with the mgr then ?/??? and he says he's the mgr. Are you kidding me ????!!!!  Dude doesn't even have his little name tag on. Complete dick...hate's his job..probably isn't qualified for anything else but just blew me off.  Put the hometown, fast food that has been established and old as dirt in the pile of trash....that could have contributed the shake to me to give to one of the many homeless in West Sac but dude...just kept on with again no eye contact and a big NO, can't have any graciousness to the hot mess of cold, hungry homeless outside.So just another example of America  that hates to work, no customer service skills and ungrateful to even have a job.The turn over here at this location is over the top...this guy obviously has no people skills but he'll be there till he gets burned  out and continues in the meantime to invoke his crappy attitude on the public.  He's probably a complete dick to his teammates at work as well as the public that buy food here too..Do us all a favor the leave dick

Ok first off i have to say here in w.sac we have 4 mc donnalds and they are all lacking in one form or another. I dont expect 5star food from mcds. At this lication the service sucks and they cant ever get the order right. I always order the same thing. A mc double plain w xtra pickles only. Ive gotten all kinds of variations. And a large sweet tea with light ice. (today i got diet coke with hellA ice) Sometimes i come for ice cream (im lactose intolorant and i can eat their  without problems so its not real milk ) but the machine is usally broken.  PARKING;shared and not secure Customer service: SUCKS FOOD: poor quality Cleanliness: idk i dont usually go inside unless i have a problem.

Worst McDonald's. No customers inside and had to wait 20 mins in the drive thru after sitting at the intercom for at least 3 mins without any greeting or acknowledgement from the staff. No apologies for the wait. Terrible staff and the chicken tenders were old and dry. 0 stars.

This review is primarily based on the lack of food hygiene standards by one of the employees. The Waze app directed us past this McDonald's. It was a bit ghetto, but I've seen 'worser' (intentional typo to prove my street cred-or lack thereof)! We were tired from a long drive, and in dire need of some breakfast. After paying at the window, I saw one of the male employees dumping the hot coffee machine's filter into the trash. He then grabbed a new coffee pouch to refill the machine. Instead of tearing the pouch open like anyone else (knife, scissors, or bare hands), he bit down on the corner and ripped it open with his TEETH! This was probably an isolated training issue, but who really needs to be trained not to open food products with your teeth? Isn't that common sense?! He did this with no shame, no hesitation, and in clear view of the drive-thru customers. I was too tired and hungry to complain, especially since none of us ordered any coffee. I later reported this to the store manager. If you decide to get a meal here, you should probably get coffee elsewhere!

Worst McDoanld's ever. I'd give them zero stars if I could. The service sucked (20 minutes in the drive thru line). They had no ice cream which I was told when I ordered so I ordered a strawberry banana smoothie only to be told at the drive thru window that they are out of strawberry banana smoothies. So I got to wait 20 minutes for nothing. Total joke!

McDonald's is McDonald's, but this location is pretty bad. The only reason I go here is that my work is like 5 minutes away and I'm hopelessly addicted.   The Sweet Tea always tastes metallic.   The Drive Thru service is ridiculously slow. It takes 15 minutes to get an order out. Maybe they're training new people, but everytime I order something, they always ask me to wait for a few minutes before they figure out what I even ordered. I think going inside might be faster.
We stopped by the other day and we received pretty good service. This is a decent place to stop now as we have seen much improvement here with speed and quality.

To make a long story short...this was my second incident with this location....the first time i let it slide. This time I ordered a 20 pc nuggets. They were old and cold. I went back in to replace them for fresh ones...and the lady behind the counter dumped the old ones back into the pile...grabbed a new box and scooped the old ones back in! All this within plain view! After that... I demanded my money back. Avoid this place at all cost.
Literally in the drive thru for 8 minutes and it never moved.  I reversed,  left,  sat at the light in front of the building,  and when i finally passed it the line still hadn't moved. What a joke

Worst McDonald's ever a few weeks ago went for my grandkids and half the order was wrong then went on Saturday 12/31 there was two cars ahead of us we waited 10 minutes finally got to the window they handed us one coffe, 5 minutes later they came back and handed us an oj then 5 minutes later they asked us to pull up front and wait. We did not we got a refund and left this is the worst McDonald's in west Sacramento

I am never the one to leave a bad review or complain about someone, but this employee of yours really gave me a motive. Her name is ELIZABETH. I assume she is in a management position as she was wearing a slight different uniform as the other employees. It was a tan colored shirt with a scarf, maybe yellow, I am not sure. So after a longer than usual wait without being acknowledged she finally calls me, I did not make a fuss about the wait since I too have  worked in customer service industry, i understand. So I proceeded to make my order, I wanted a pick 2 for $5. A fish fillet and a Big Mac. Her response "we don't have Big Macs". I with a confused face asked "is this at this store only?" She said no we don't offer the Big Mac as the 2 for $5 , instead we have the quarter pounder. I proceeded to say "I have gotten it at other stores" her response "Go to another store" I cannot believe what she had said! It was the first time I had ever been felt offended at McDonald's. I would really hope you take this complaint into consideration, talk to her and let her no this is NOT the right way to speak to a costumer if you want them to return.
Always fast & friendly service. Stop here whenever I'm in west Sacramento. Having the Big Mac meal.

Very careless staff  I was just there and ordered large fries a coke and a apple pie pulled up at the first window which i found out wasn't the right one as this lady waved at me through the second but there were no signs i applogized the lady for that and paid for my order..i was waiting for my receipt but the lady didnt give me one and walked away i waited at the window until this guy finally noticed me and gave me my receipt..before i could even get a chance to ask for some ketchup he walked away and the receipt he gave me wasn't printed properly and waited again at the window for a little bit lost my patience and left....i have just noticed some other bad reviews for that particular McDonald's location but looks like the MANAGER or person watching over customer service of their employees does not give a DARN

None of the McDonald's in West Sacramento take the national McDonald's coupons that you get in the mail and none of these 3 locations honor the specials that you see on TV either. They just tell you, "sorry, we don't take any coupons or we don't have those specials." I've also noticed that their food prices are higher than at other McD's in Sac. Even the McDonald's in Davis take the coupons marked for Sac. and the greater Sac. region. Plus, with the exception of the McD's on Lake Washington Blvd. the other 2 are in very bad areas of town with a lot of scary folks hanging around outside. Absolutely not worth going to.

This is in specific reference to Breakfast All Day options.  I'm one of those people that have waited 30-some years for McDonald's to finally make breakfast available anytime -and it's disappointing to know that a sausage McMuffin is available for lunch at 1pm, but it isn't going to taste very good.   I've tried to give the benefit of the doubt by trying breakfast for lunch at least a half dozen times, now, since the Breakfast All Day campaign began; and it is not improving.  In the beginning, the staff was simply overwhelmed and couldn't keep up with the demand for breakfast items.  Now, the breakfast items taste as if they've been held in a warmer too long.  The McMuffin I ordered today -the edges were so burnt and tough that I ended up picking the edges off -ending up with nearly half the muffin.

Ordered two sundaes and they came out fine. I usually eat them until they start melting to a liquid then I don't eat it anymore because of the white milk taste. They had some flies flying around, and they were annoying as usual.

This is the one on West Capitol at the Harbor Blvd intersection across from the Goodwill shopping center. It's horrible.  I prefer the Reed exit McDonald's over this one, so it's been well over a year since my last, just as disappointing visit. This recent visit (February 2012) was the same signature disappointment; I don't know if the person ordering supplies just orders too many or if the crew cycling through supplies isn't doing it right or if this location for some franchising reason gets their supplies from a different vendor, but it's awful! The bun, every time I've come here, has been kind of gritty and stale. The meat's no prize either.  This is the grossest McDonald's I've ever been to in my entire life. No consistency with the rest of the chain - avoid this one.

If you want to get cussed out by the manager then this is the place to go. My husband went there a few days ago to buy dinner. He also had a coupon from the booklet they mail to try the new  Mc Bites. Well the cashier told him they don't accept coupons. So my husband asked to speak with the manager to see why. The manager looked over and said "We don't take those fu**ers!" So my husband paid and waited. While he was waiting he noticed the Manager talking smack about him to the other employees in Spanish and he was pointing at my husband too. (my husband knows Spanish ) So we will Never ever go to that one again!!
smells like hobo and does not take coupons. one of the worst i have been to.  makes the bakersfield mcdonalds look really classy.

McDONALD'S CHARGES $ 1.00 FOR A CUP OF CITY TAP WATER !  The counter person gave my wife a 6 ounce cup of water with her big mac and fries (I ordered a large smoothie).  I asked for a larger cup of water.  One dollar.  One dollar?  You must be kidding.  Nope.  Sorry.  Company policy.  The soda / pop dispenser didn't have water available, so no water refills.  Sorry.  Company policy.  This company policy is not only stupid (no more McDonald's for my wife and me), but it is also predatory, and in my opinion, immoral, if not unethical.  Congratulations to McDonald's for joining the big banks, airlines, and cell phone companies in The Great Let's Nickle And Dime Our Customers To Death Championships.  McDonald's deserves a minus ten stars.
tell the workers to wear hair nets when making salads...nothing worse than eating and finding a freak hair in your food...5/2815..at 11:20am

today is 3/15/2014 I was in a rush and against my better judgement I went to this location over the one on Reed Ave across from my job. I ordered  the sausage mcmuffin meal with a carmel frapp no whip extra carmel- and extra blended (meaning with no ice chips everytime i sip). I got to work the mcmuffin was burnt, black and extra cripsy- the hash brown was cold and taste like it was cooked in old fish grease. and to top it all off the carmel frapp was more than extra blended it was blended into a form of a soup- a clear soup that is. everytime i give them a try it fails- i end up spending $8 on breakfast that i took two bites out of. and lets talk about the horrible customer service at the drive- thru- the first time i went in january of this year i ordered a carmel frap extra blended with extra carmel - i got to the window to pay she handed me my frapp it had whip cream on it and ice chips the size of cushed ice- i handed it back to her and told her i wanted my money back after she didnt try to persuade me to get another one she gave my money back and as i was driving away she yell GOOD RIDDENS!!!

We'll haven't been the first to write a review in a long time, I feel honored even though it's just Micky D's.  Here goes nothing... This place is garbage.  Na just kidding, it's alright.  Basically went here (which is only every 4-6 months) because I had a coupon from a base ball game I watched in West Sac at a River Cats game.  I went here to use it, and I come to find out that the coupon is only good for Sacramento locations even though I received it in West Sac.  HOW RIDICULOUS!  I was like whatever I'll just pay for the thing I came for.  Then as I was eating my burger only came with one patty even though I ordered a double.  I explained the situation to the rep and she understood.  She then put her hand out for the burger and I said just make me another single and we'll call it good.  But instead she took the burger (not even eating) and through it away.  WHAT A WASTE.  Then they made me a new one with two patties.  I was like AH, WAY TO WASTE FOOD.  So that was my experience, can't wait until next time.  Yah!

I have never reviewed a fast food restaurant before, but we had a huge complicated order for breakfast. We went through the drive thru and they were easy to understand, quick, got the order correct and double checked it.  Both people we spoke to were very nice.

All too often this place seem to be in drama or chaos. We have been here when the entire crew walked out and there were only 2 people working total, the restaurant was cash only because the credit card reader had been down for some extended time, when only 2 people were scheduled. This is just the times we have been there which is not that often.   Each of these issues are more than we want to get involved in as we come here as a meeting place to grab a quick bite and a soda before we go to Tahoe for the day.  Slow service, bad service, good service, and correct or not so correct orders, you just never know. But as they say, location, location, location.

What a fiasco!  I don't think they could be any slower here. They aren't even that busy. Right now, there are no customers waiting to place an order but 7 people waiting for their food.   Of course, if they could get the orders right the first time things might move a bit faster. At least 2 people from the drive thru have had to come inside because of wrong orders. And at least 4 inside have also had their orders screwed up.   Several people told them the napkin dispenser is empty but, not only haven't they filled it yet, they are making people figure out they have no napkins and coming back to ask for them. I suggested they put a big stack on the counter to no avail.   People have also reported problems with the drink machine but nobody has checked on that yet. One man went to the counter to ask for them to get his drink since he couldn't do it himself. He was told he'd have to wait as there were other customers. He ended up standing there like 10 min waiting for them to pour a small beverage.   I waited 15 min for my food. And it wasn't even warm. No way was I going to try to get it remade. Not worth the wait and hassle.   I have had experiences like this at this location before. I would avoid this place if you possibly can.

How does McDonald's not have tomatoes?  Went to the one on steamboat.  Asked and charged for extra tomatoes.  Didn't get extra tomato and received burnt bread.  Won't refund money for the extra charge over the phone or burnt bread.  Ridiculous.

Just wanted to let you know that my quarter pounder with cheese was bright pink inside. I would've gone to the website provided on the receipt for this type of review but the receipt was illegible and I couldn't make out the website and the survey code number. I went ahead and ate it since I was really hungry and it was a to-go order but if a bunch of customers get sick or die from E-coli you will know why.

This McDonald's has gone downhill. Like way down. Half slice cheese in your sandwiches. No 20 piece chicken nuggets but you can get 10 piece for $5... It is nice visual update but I will no longer go here to pay for those visual updates...

I asked for a sausage biscuit with cheese NO EGG.  I said NO EGG, more than once because she did not seem to understand.  Guess what came on the biscuit...and I hate eggs!!   I would normally throw it away and wait for lunch, but I really wanted it, so I parked and went inside.  I repeated what I wanted VERY clearly-biscuit, sausage, cheese.    Doesn't seem that hard?  Opened it...no cheese.  Sigh.  Of course.  So I basically paid 4 bucks for disappointment and heartache (because the sandwich with egg costs so much more!! And no rebate on the mistake offered)  Bottom line-the lady working the drive through is not a genius, but neither is the manager or the other one working inside.

I don't know if these people are new or they're just incompetent! It only took us 15 mins to restate our order over 5 times!  Yet when we got to the window, again we had to restate 4 more times our order!  Please find new management!!!

The last few times I've gone here, I've been disgusted.  I used to go here regularly for breakfast (oatmeal and coffee) and everything was fine.  In approximately January of 2018, something changed.  There were new faces working, the service became terrible - such as forgetting to give the entire order, which when you order two things is pretty sad - the store smelled and looked disheveled with brooms left leaning against tables and garbage around the floor.  What really pissed me off was the staff joking about being late to work and generally looking sick and unhygienic.  It made me think: if you don't give two cents about your job, your appearance, or your health, do you care about the food I'm about to eat?  Yuck.

Writing this review because of the unfriendly staff. The lady who worked the register, who I presume is the manager, due to her different attire to the other workers, was very rude and unfriendly to my family and I. The food, of course, was nothing special. But that's the usual. Only gave a 2 star due to the rad drive through guy. He's really cool and friendly and definitely deserves a much better job. Kudos to him.

The manager staff here is very grouchy. She is unpleasant and yells at the customers and the work staff. She has been in a bad mood for about 4 years now. She makes feel like I'm bothering the place and I'm not welcome. Only good thing about this place is that it's on the way up to Lake Tahoe. But that's the only. Management must show the customer that they are valued.

This is the nearest McDonald's to Incline and I stop here often to use their bathroom, their wifi or get a quick snack.  A few months ago, my friend gave me $30 with the strict instructions to buy 30 burgers as I was heading down to help feed the homeless down at 4th & Record.  I popped in and asked how long it would take for them to get me 30 of their $1 burgers together - and they said give us 15 minutes.  The cashier asked why I needed 30 and I explained why.  I think that's why they slipped us a couple extra for free :-)  By the way, the McDonald's burgers were a hit with the diners - they were served steaming hot and fresh and everyone loved the surprise (well, the first 30 people in line did, anyway!)

Definitely my least favorite location. Regardless time of day or night, the line for drive thru goes out into the shopping center parking lot! The customer service sucks, to say the least. No longer do you hear yes or no from employees. You're lucky to get "Yeah" or "Nah". My favorite is..."Oh, my bad". Not sure if there was a change in ownership or what happened but this place needs to step it up!

We have been here a few times now.  Today was much like the past visits, aggravating.  Put our order in and misunderstanding on the order takers part would have given us the wrong thing, but we told them to just go with what they imputed to the register.  After we ordered three others ordered much larger orders.  My order came out.  Three other orders came out but not my sisters.  I got hot under the collar and went up to find out why she as usual did not get her order. It was not a hard order, but a simple cheeseburger... nothing else.   A cheeseburger was handed to me with no delay or explanation or a simple sorry.  This is the norm for this store, each time we have gone we have experienced a variation of the story.

Thought we would save time by coming here before going to Mt Rose but we waited FOREVER for our food. This place is so disorganized. They ran out of coffee during breakfast time! We will never come back here.
This place is good. The workers are very friendly and keep the place looking nice. For a McDonald's it's one of the best I've been to.

Honestly, ever since downloading the McDonald's app, I've thought about coming here more often. Which is not good (because fast food). But I decided to stop by for a quick lunch around 12pm on a Thursday. After looking through the app, I saw a BOGO deal on their new Chicken Tenders along with a BOGO deal on any size French Fries. So that's exactly what I went with! They had 2 types of chicken tenders, Buttermilk Chicken Tenders and Sweet N Spicy Honey BBQ Glazed Tenders, so I got one of each. I also got some Mac Sauce on the side which was a good move! Each one costs around a little less than $5. I also got a Small Fries (~$2) and a free one! In total, this meal cost me less than $7 which is great. The only caveat with using the app is you can only redeem one coupon at a time, so I had to do this as two separate transactions, according to the worker. The tenders were a good try and were pretty good, but I don't think I would get them again. The fries were solid, as usual! I can always count on McDonald's for that quick yet guilty-feeling meal!

Came here while on a road trip to Tahoe.  Upon parking and stepping out of my vehicle I noticed a porta potty smell throughout the parking lot.  The heat from the area intensified the smell.  The restaurant was clean inside and the food was good.  I tried the new Bacon Smokehouse burger.  Very tasty, I would order again.  I was distracted by how many employees have band aids on their nose.  I would have found it more appropriate to just see a nose piercing if that is what it covered up. A booger hanging out of their nose would be less distracting.

I ordered my little brother a hamburger happy meal. Opened the box for him and it came with the hamburger unwrapped and looks like it was biten multiple times. Yesterday, i got him a 6 piece chicken nugget and there was only 3 pieces in there. Looks like their staff has been eating the food prior to giving it to their customers.

Long line forming of orders, meh service, many people waiting... Ya took 13 minutes for 2 McChickens and people mad about the wait. Hire more minimum wage workers Should've made them walk out curbside

If I could give them -10 stars I would. I drove and picked up $20 worth of food, and came home to find that half my order was missing. Already very annoyed that I had to drive back to this McDonalds, I walked back inside, waiting for the rest of my food. The manager had the audacity to ask for the half order that was given to us,and threw it away in the trash. I asked how come he threw everything away and he just shot back a glare and snarly replied back with "you're going to wait for a new batch of fresh food," without any sign of apology for the missing food. This whole altercation ended up taking an hour  (accounting for waiting for the food the first time, driving back and finding that we didn't get every item we paid for, drove back here, talked to the manager, and waited all over again for our whole order when we just needed the other half). What a mess. Worst customer service.
Could this place any worse, slow slow slow. The manager has no clue what the staff is doing. Fast food should not take 15 min drive thru with one car in front.

I don't know what happened to this place but ever since they remodeled the service has been extremely slow!!!! I've had to sit and wait for a Happy meal and one meal! This is ridiculous. They used to be so fast. $15 an hour you say???

Just made a quick stop at the local McDonald's.  This review pertains to the service that I received while there.  Chris, the person who received and delivered my order to the table was personable, professional, and very service oriented.  Considering this is a fast food restaurant, this was a pleasant and appreciated surprise.  Chris would be an asset to any service-oriented business and McDonald's is fortunate to have him as a member of their team.

I like this location it's close by the house.. take a little longer during the day.. at night it's super fast. Food is good. The iced coffee wasn't that great the couple times I got it. But pretty good overall.

This is the slowest drive thru in the world. I'm sitting in line right now as I write this. It's been about 20 minutes, and four cars behind me gave up and left. Mobile order doesn't work because every item is unavailable. Completely unacceptable.  Went to try a mobile order a week later. No one brought the food out after 20 minutes. When I went in the store, no one knew about the order. Someone from corporate really has to put their foot down on this location.

If I could give them a 0 star I would, let's see, terrible service, super slow, they NEVER get your order correct, I don't even know why I'm writing a review for McDonald's, but just to WARN you, go to any other McDonald's. This one is bad. Their phone doesn't even work if you need to reach them.

I usually receive good service going through the drive thru, today I decided to rub in thinking it would be faster. Not only did I have to ask for someone to take my order Russell was not very friendly at all. Gave me a total for my order in the form of a question and looked at me and said "what?".  There are quite a few number of people waiting for their food. I do not recommend coming inside for service.

It's ok today, got fries and chicken McNuggets. Had to wait a while in the drive through, And the food wasn't as good as usual , maybe it was just really hot today I don't know I wasn't feeling  the vibe

With only two people in line still had to wait 15minutes for an order that ended up being incorrect. Cashier repeated my order correctly twice but still managed to get it wrong.  Less chatter and playing around and more customer service.

TERRIBLE At drive thru...... words cannot describe how awful this place is..... - "we stop breakfast at 11" (the menu display states breakfast all day) - "please park around the corner, we will bring it to you in 5 mins" (arrives 15 minutes later) - came home to find the wrong order in my bag. Stupid of me to not check the bag before leaving OR to have even returned here after my first awful experience last year.

This location has terrible service.   The drive thru is unacceptably slow each time I've ever gone.   The staff is rude and condescending as well.  I had a young lady roll her eyes at me when I asked for napkins that should've been in the bag to begin with.   I'll never come here again ...this is it.

I was very thirsty, so I thought I would get a "quick" ice tea but I was at the drive thru for 20 minutes just to take my order!!! I have never been at a McDonalds with a drive thru this slow!!!! Get it together Mickey D's!!!!!!
I've been here at different time and have to say it's slow service is the same each time . How can you have a drive service and be slower than in service ? This place is the opposite!

I wouldn't recommend this mcDonalds if you're in a hurry. The drive thru takes too long (20 minutes last time I was in it) they don't tell you anything about time or when your order is gonna be ready, they just look at you like your stupid for staring at them wondering where your order is.. anyway, I went in tonight, there's at least 7 of them talking and laughing and messing around and not paying attention to the orders. They messed up half the things in my order, when I tell them about it they get an attitude, and didn't even say a simple sorry about that when handing me my stuff. They just hand it off as if they're annoyed that i told them they messed up my order. This location either needs to close or get some better staff because this is too ridiculous for something that is supposed to be "Fast food". And clearly I'm not the only one who is saying this also.

They need to have someone from corporate come down and do a quality control check on this place. 2 out of the 3 times I've been here they got my order wrong. Wait times are longer than usual. It seems like this is the norm looking at all the other reviews.   How is this place going to have 7 employees working the floor with 6 customers all standing waiting for their food? The drive thru was completely empty. All the while this is happening 2 coworkers are standing idly socializing. The employees clearly aren't trained well and reflects the incompetence of the manager. I'm sure the sales to those 6 customers they just served with their 7 employees will make up for the cost of their labor. This place is going out of business. I'm calling it.   Also I'm sure there are many others out there who haven't complained about their order being wrong. No one wants to make a big deal over something as simple as fast food. I took the time to write this review to speak out on the behalf of those people.

I would give zero if I could, one star is too good. They consistently get my order wrong, ask me to wait in the parking lot after waiting through a long line, or the ice cream machine is broken. Once they had no carbonated drinks. But, the icing on the cake was being served raw hamburger. Yes, you heard right and I have the photos to prove it. Two raw quarter pounder meals. I drove back and the manager didn't bother to look, but did give me two cooked burgers and a free fry for my trouble. I called corporate and what did they do? Had the same manager call me to see if I wanted a replacement meal. Since I'm never eating there again, I declined.

Writing this as I sit in the drive thru and it has now been 14 minutes and still no food and no one has moved in line. This McDonald's needs new management or just SOMETHING! The drive thru takes about 30 mins with only 3 cars.. And I'm only writing this review based on multiple visits not just one visit to make things more fair. Every time i come here to grab some breakfast there is always something missing !!! I'd rather drive a few more minutes to the one by target next time so that I get everything I pay for.  Came home and of course something went wrong. As you can see I asked for Bbq sauce and sweet and sour. Well I didn't get EITHER !!! Instead they gave me ranch. How hard is it to read an order and get it right !? It's hard to understand these type of people when they want to get paid $15 an hour but can't seem to follow simple directions. I will now be coming back to this location even though it's only 2 minutes from my house.

This locations managerial and customer service is the worst in a fast food spot I have EVER experienced.....the drive thru stays busy especially on the weekends and is always slow.....I order my food to be made fresh each time I go and every single time I get home my food is not fresh...... Either something is missing or incorrect or the biscuit is hard as hell and re-heated in the microwave....and when you say something about it they want to look at you sideways like you did something wrong.... They also keep the phone off the hook at certain times so when you try to call and complain you can't get thru.....but their first question to you when you do finally get thru to someone is "Did you call"...???? MY THING IS....IF YOU DONT LIKE YOUR JOB....GO PUT IN THE WORK AND FIND ANOTHER ONE.....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
It is slow.  Slow on ordering and getting the food ready.  Seem like the staff here have focus issue.  It wasn't like that a year ago.  Mgmt needs to work on correcting the issue.

This is the worst McDonalds we have ever visited! The drive through got the order wrong and then we had to remind them of the price difference. Then he told us not to worry about it that "I got it". We asked to speak to the manager who condescendingly said he probably meant he had it right now. Either way, the customer service is terrible and the place is so poorly lit! Avoid it at all costs!!

3 Stars for the effort. I know that this place had been really slow, but I see that they have been hiring to fill up the position. But there is still no excuse imho, I blamed on the Manager, Supervisor leadership here. The floor leaders are terrible on leading and managing the floors. Oh well, I think they will get a little bit better. Food is the same.

Back at 1 star.... quality slipped into the basement... seems like food is prepared WAY in advance and reheated when ordered... Coffee is still hit or miss on if it's going to be hot... Final straw...pricing... post the price...live or die by that price.... I'm sorry (not sorry) someone was too lazy to go out and update the board.... not my fault... could I  have covered the price difference? 30 times over with the change in my cup holder. But if you're going to treat me like I'm stupid and slowly read my order back to me very slowly...TWICE.... then this place is lost forever... it's a shame that I can get the same order from a location across town ( E.G Blvd East or Bruceville  @Walmart) and still have higher quality and hotter coffee by the time I  get to the office which is less that 300 yards from the Harbour Pointe location.... do us all a favor... close this location down... it's obvious  no one here cares... let a business that actually gives a damn about quality  and customer service  move in....

The staff is a bit slow here.. I came in about 9 am because I thought it would be faster than the drive thru. I walked in to see 5 people with tickets waiting for their number to be called. The cashier seemed new. I normally wouldn't mind waiting whatsoever but this was before work and people go to McDonald's for something cheap and fast!
"Fast" food? 20+ minutes to get a single order of fries? Whom ever owns this franchise should get it taken back by McDonald's corporate.

I saw the manager yelling at a women in a wheel chair.    This female manager was so rude the fries are always cold and it take forever for you to get your food.     And the owner doesn't care.   I'm never going there.   Mcds should take its name back
The drive through area in this location is a little strange. And the customer service in the drive through area is slow. And it's nicely located close to the school and freeway.

Walked to our local McDonalds with my toddler and I was not happy with the cleanliness. The floors had garbage everywhere and tables not cleaned off which was hard for me to find a clean table for us.   The service was friendly and great which always are when I go through the drive thru. Should also focus on presentation. Hopefully on our next walk in visit it will look better.

This McDonalds is horrible never been to one that works so slow!!! No workers,and they don't even have ketchup or napkins or straws for you to get next to fountain drinks. Horrible service. Never again
Would give 0 stars but that wasn't an option. Only have 4 orders inside but they are so freaking SLOW!!!
The slowest McDonald's I've ever been to.  The drive thru was about 15 cars out and moved horribly slow.

Turns out the posted closing time is more of a suggestion. Tonight was the second time I've tried to get food and find out they closed more than 15 minutes early without offering any explanation. They just said, "we closed early, sorry".

I only come to this location because I can walk to it. This is my last time. Waited 10 minutes to have someone take my order and I was the first person in line. A man whose order had already been taken said he had been waiting 30 minutes. The floor, and drink counter were dirty and after 20 minutes, I still didn't have my order. I requested my money back and went elsewhere. The bad thing is that this happens often. Terrible. Get this manager some help!
Been sitting in the drive thru for almost 15 minutes.  If we didn't already order and paid I'd leave!

Warning! Do not come here if you expect to have get quick service. The drive thru wait was over 15 minutes long and dining ng is even worse! This place is always like this. Management needs to figure how how to run shifts!!!

Worst service ever.  This is one McDonalds I will never be stopping at again.  Went through the drive thru and paid with credit card.  The cashier apparently swiped our card twice before telling us that the card declined.  Provided a second card while proceeding to call the credit card company to find out why the card was declined.  The card never declined and in fact was charged and approved twice for the same meal that was then charged a third time to the secondary card provided.  Manager refused to talk to the credit card agent on the line and we are still sitting here waiting for our food and refund 30 minutes later.  Watch your credit card statements if you eat here and pay by credit.  I'm not about to pay $25 for 2 breakfast sandwiches which we still haven't received.

I've only gone through the Drive Thru here, but they always take extremely long. Longer than any McDonald's I've been to. I only go here because it's the closest one to my home. Hopefully they'll build another one near here because this one's service is just too slow.
Slowest McDonald's I've ever been too! Waited inside for 10mins for a hamburger and small fry and it's not even crowded.

This is McD of choice on my way home from work. Out of all the McDs off I-5S and I-99S, I pick this one because the other closer to home do not make their food items right. At least at this McD, they know how to salt their fries.  However, this has a busy drive thru almost every Friday night.  So far, I haven't had any issues with the staff or food at this McD until the other night.  They forget an item of mine when I ordered through the drive thru. I drove away and once I got home, they forgot it and I was furious. I called and called and no one answered. Eventually I got hold of someone and they definitely understood.  I still like this McD and hope they don't mess up orders usually. I think the employee was distracted because he told me my nuggets will be ready shortly so I thought they had my fries ready, but they didn't.

Stopped here for lunch with twenty-five kids on our way to Summer Camp. Our kids are pretty awesome and well-behaved but still, it's a ton of kids smearing ketchup all over their food and paying with more coins than cash lol. The manager ended up handling our orders and spoke to each kid like the paying customer they were. She was kind and even brought out extra water cups for the kids that needed them. The entire team was very kind to the kids and the orders came out super fast! It was an excellent experience and we are thankful for the awesome staff that made kids camp that much more fun :)

They need to shut this place down. The service was absolutely TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!! I worked at McDonald's years ago on Latina blvd and it was much more efficient. I took me almost 30 minutes to get my food.it gets better. I go inside for my food and this dude stares at me at sweeps instead of taking my order. RIDICULOUS. Never coming back. EVER.

This location has always been sooo slow in service. So I hadn't been here in awhile but today I thought I'd give it another go. Again, I was very disappointed! Several customers waiting with tickets in hand. Customer service lacking any friendliness and my burger looked like someone tossed it in the air before packaging it therefore it lacked appeal and taste. May be quite awhile before I go back. They need better training for their employees. I highly recommend Carl's Jr across the street. Very well trained staff and good food.

I figured, being on the better part of town, service would match its location. wrong.  Seeing these reviews makes me wonder if management needs to be changed.   Ordered from drive thru, picked up food, girl appeared to be in hurry and closed window.  I waived the girl down, she pretended not to see me until i honked. I asked for a cup of water, she said she couldn't because other drinks were already in line?  I asked if anyone else can get me a simple cup of water she said i would have to come in.  I'm at drive thru for a reason.  I drove off in utter shock at the lack of service. Ks#13 is on the receipt but not sure if that's the girl at window 2 who served me or the friendly cashier at window 1. She is a young Latina. I really hope she is talked to and customer service is strongly emphasized because she had none.  Not coming to this one anymore, esp since management hasn't contacted me regarding the issue.

The slowest McDonald's ever! I was second in line to order, so I thought it wouldn't be long to get my food. Wrong! The girl didn't know how to give change correctly, she had to call someone over because she didn't want to listen to me telling her what she owed me. Then my milkshake sat there, and sat there and sat there. When I asked for it, the guy said I had to wait for my whole order. Needless to say the shake wasn't thick any longer. I had to ask for a new one.  They had about 6 crew behind the counter and 3 on break. But that didn't stop them from chatting to each other across the counter. 20 minutes to get my food. smh

This is the shittiest McDonald's ever. Don't go here if you expect to get your order right. They always fuck it up in the drive thru. I'm never going here again. They have done things like not close the drink lid all the way and the whole thing fell on me while handing it over. Today was the last straw. First they were giving me someone else's order and when I told them it's not mine they gave me part of my order. I was like I order another mcchicken. So they looked on my receipt and they never put it in. So I offered to pay and get the other one. And the manager was like then you have to park your car and wait. What the hell!! You fucked it up so why should I waste my time. The right thing to do was just throw it in for me. The manager looked like she doesn't have any customer service skills at all. Never apologized. Seems like their hiring criteria is people who don't give a shit.

I just wanted to say thank you for great customer service today! My sons and I came in for breakfast and he barely touched his food. I cleaned up our mess and neatly packed our food. We went to use the bathroom but when we came out someone had thrown it away.  The lady who was cleaning the lobby said someone else may have thrown it out. She confirmed with her manager and gave me another of the big breakfast I ordered as a courtesy. Thank you team!

I've come here a few times before and waited in a 30+ minute line thinking it was just a fluke. Each time mind you I have come off peak lunch hours and still have had to endure the crazy wait. Today 230pm I have been waiting for 16 minutes and my wife decides to pass us coming home from work and drive to the next closest Mcdonalds and order. Not only did she make it to the other Mcdonalds, but she ordered and made it home before we even got our food which was another 18 minutes later. If you have the chance just keep driving by this one. They are by anything but fast food.
Over 3 years and dozens of visits I've come to avoid this place. The majority of orders are wrong. Food is sloppily prepared. Drive through wait is excessive. Walk in hours close too early.

Only one star because I couldn't review with no stars. This location must be the dumping ground for new and bad employees, including managers. The manager took my order, after I paid she walked away without giving me the receipt, which included the order number. I thought she stepped away for a second, but she never returned to the counter. A few minutes later, another employee came to take my order - told her I just needed my receipt. The manager also filled my order, which was wrong. Service is very slow, appears no one has any training in customer service or production.
The prices are marked up than other franchises.  Other than that, it's the same as any other McDonald's.   and as always, *Review will be updated based on future experiences.
Rude. They hardly have a drive thru menu and when deciding what we would like the person in the drive thru told us to complete our order, they close in 2 minutes. Which they did not.

I rarely write reviews but wanted to share my experience that I had today.  I'm standing in line and there's an employee taking orders.   The place is not busy.  The employee takes one order and then waits for the order to be completed before taking the next.    While we are waiting another customer leaves.   We have yet to be acknowledged.   Another employee who appears to be on break walks up to the register with her wallet in hand.  She then motions to another employee and proceeds to place an order of hash browns  in front on me.     I told all of them that we are in line and had yet to even be acknowledged.  All we got was a dumb look.   Never ever going back here

I been at this location for the three weekend because my grand daughter likes the hash browns a sausage biscuit. One cashier for drive thru and one on the window. The service is so slow. I live in this community and we spend our money here and can't quality service. I spoke to duty manager and her response was we don't have enough staff..Ten minutes to get my order. That a dam shame and the line is getting longer as I write this comment.

WORST McDONALD'S EVER. This place is the model of incompetency.  We live within walking distance of this place and occasionally pick up dinner on busy nights out of necessity.  You say "apples", your receipts says "apples", you open your bag and find...fries. Limp, undercooked fries. If you are lucky to get all of your order at all.  There's nothing like getting home to find out your kid's happy meal is still sitting on a counter somewhere. Don't ever order breakfast outside of breakfast hours, unless you like gray eggs and are okay with getting some dental work done after trying to bite through their English muffins. Be prepared to wait, wait, and wait some more. For being a place that counts pickles on burgers and hands out napkins by the sheet, they sure have lost sight of the purpose of their company. 1 star for their ice cream and because Yelp makes me.  Visit at your own risk.

This McDonalds has a nice interior and food always tastes the same at all McDonald's.   My review is on the cashier that just took my order. He was taking forever to give people their change. Finally it was my turn and realized he was 12 cents short...not that 12 cents means much to me...but what bothered me was he was doing it to everyone!   I told the manager and the cashier said he ran out of change to give to customers. So his plan was to keep giving everyone the wrong change because we he was out???
Ordered a crispy snack wrap with no cheese and got a sloppy grilled snack wrap with cheese that looks like it was taken off and tons of ranch...gross

This has got to be one of the worst McDonalds ever.  The owners should seriously consider hiring someone with at least some competence to manage this place.  The staff are ill trained and ridiculously slow.  Each visit, you can expect some sort of a wait.  Waiting on the fries to be ready, or coffee to be made...etc    If your meal has fries and you're one of those weird ones who likes to have it with ketchup, make sure you ask.  Because they will NEVER include them.    This is the first time where a McDonalds is this poorly operated.  I can't blame the staff as they are generally nice.  They are simply ill trained or whoever manages the places doesn't know what he/she is doing.

Ok, I have to remember this is a fast food place. When I first walk in there is a line & I observe there are at least 3 customers waiting but no one to take orders. There were at least 4 employees who were packing orders & 1 of them was standing around gabbing with one of them. I was able to make eye contact with the one & I asked politely, is anyone taking orders. She looks at me & nods her heads & walks off to the back. I was a but confused at that point & didn't know what just happened.  Was she going to hide so no one else would complain or was she truly going to the back to find someone.  After standing around fora other 5 minutes finally someone came out. At this point there were now 3 additional customers behind me & 3 in front of me.  One customer came & left after noticing no one was being helped.   I was in kind of a rush wanting to come in & get my & get out.  I wanted to order a Cheeseburger Happy Meal.  No idea what was taking so long.  There appeared to be plenty of employees but no one taking orders.  There were even 2 of them sitting down at a table eating.  So beware when you go to this location that you will have to wait. No quick service at all.    Oh yes, I should add check your orders. Previous occasions (which I has not yelped) orders were messed up.  Even missing a patty from my Big Mac.   Will try to avoid this location if possible or just try going at an off time. Maybe that will help.
Spent $9 on a disappointing quarter pounder and two sausage burritos. You'd think for the poor quality it would at least be cheap.

Order a kids meal and it's over 20 mins to get it. Service is extremely slow!!!  Maybe drive through is much faster.  Do not go in the restaurant. I'm not the only one experiencing the slowness. See other review also. Worse McDonald's ever. Never been to a slower McDonald before.
Terrible terrible service!!!! If you go inside expect to be ignored. They only serve the drive-through. They might as will just close the door and do drive-through only! Never coming back!!!

I only gave one star because I had to. They have signs on. It's their drive thru windows that day additional sauces .25. I asked at the first window for additional with my money and she acted like I was asking for diamonds and told me I need to give it to the people at the second window. The poor young man giving me my food told me sorry no additional sauces. I told him let me talk to the manager and the manager proceeded to tell me no sauces. So I'm suppose to know at the time I order how many or what kinds of sauces I may need. Ridiculous. So I told her either the sauces or refund me back all my money. Stupid all that just for two additional sauces that I was willing to pay for. Never again will this establish get any of my money.

I typically don't write reviews for chains like McDonald's but the poor service at this particular location warrants it.  Had two recent visits.  First visit was a few weeks ago, we took the drive thru.  The hot cakes in the big breakfast with hot cakes were not hot but cold and hard, probably an old batch.  Also we were not provided utensils.  Luckily I checked after pulling out of the drive thru and had to run over to the counter to get a set.  Second visit was today.  Again we took the drive thru.  I ordered a big breakfast with hot cakes.  They asked me to pull up and park and they would bring out the food.  Ok, that happens, no problem.  Waited 5 minutes.  Waited 10 minutes.  Walked into the place, showed them my receipt.  The girl at the counter then casually gathered my order as if I had just ordered and paid, not knowing that I had been waiting in their 'reserved' parking space for the past 10 minutes.  This McDonald's is conveniently located next to the I-5 freeway, but I will go out of my way to drive to another McDonald's from now on!

This McDonalds is one of the newer ones in Elk Grove. Right off of I-5 so it's convenient if you are on a road trip and passing by. Parking near the entrance has some spots but there are more farther away. Drive thru entrance is around the building and there isn't a concrete barrier to guide you so you have plenty of room to navigate.  Inside McDonalds is more modern looking than others. They actually have different furniture at some locations. You do have your standard tables and chairs but there is one area in which it's more of a lounge. Came in to order 2 happy meals and the cashier was super nice to us. Knowing we are adults and just want the minion toy, she made a conversation with us saying she would have done the same thing with a smile on her face.  Food was the usual tasted the same as others. Nothing special just fast food. So far I have no issues with the drive thru and I hope it continues that way.
Going through the drve through the guy that  took my order had a bad attitude his name was Nick
Waiting 25 minutes at this point. They won't give me my money back so I can leave. Toilets are overflowing with 2 inches of standing water. How is this possible?

The worst! I have actually been in the drive thru and had a car drive by yelling how bad the service is. I hardly ever go to fast food and this place reminds me why. Nearly every time I go here there is something wrong with my order or I have to pull ahead and wait. Just today I ordered 4 hot fudge sundaes and a large fry. All 4 sundaes had the fudge all over the outside of the cup and lid, there was more chocolate on the outside than in. Not to mention my fries were half filled and what was there was cold a soggy. I doubt I'll ever go back.

Stopped by McDonald's for lunch. Ordered a sausage egg and cheese mc griddle meal with a orange juice and breakfast sausage burrito. 10 minutes later my order came out. Ask them where's my orange juice? I tried to call the store to get the name of the assistant manager I was talking to and their number on yelp doesn't even work!!! The assistant manager, which is a Mexican lady, told me they charge me for a Diet Coke for the drink when I told the person that took the order I wanted orange juice. And if I want an orange juice they have to refund my money and charge me extra for the orange juice. It's not my fault one of your employee put in the wrong order!!! I don't have much time left on my lunch so I told them they can just keep the drink. I rather die of thirst...this is not the first time this McDonald's mess up my order...no wonder this place have 2 star rating on yelp...worst McDonald's customer service ever!!!!! I would rate them 0 star if I can!!!

This mcdonalds is awful. NEVER GO THROUGH THE DRIVE THRU. Avoid this mcdonalds in general if you can. Awful staff , awful service. Took 15 min to place an order inside cause cashier seemed to have no idea what she was doing . Staff was in no hurry at all. Avoid this location if possible.

Soooo, JUST KIDDING at McDonalds serving breakfast all day. Only corporate stores "may" serve it, but after waiting 30 minutes in the drive through line, they informed me they serve a VERY limited menu during non-breakfast hours! Rat bastards!! WTH??

Been here multiple times, live nearby. Swing by in an emergency. Never never never get anything right. Huge line at drive through, Space people were pulling out and leaving. Some were driving  some were driving to the front to go inside. I did the same. Employees were just meandering around not really doing anything. No one was helping anyone at the counter. Waited for five minutes a whole bunch of people were just leaving in disgust. I ended up leaving without having anybody even greet me.
Waited 24 minutes for 10 piece chicken mcnuggets.  24 whole freaking minutes. Thought this was fast food? Go to the mcdonalds down the street.

Dreadful. .   I've had consistent unpleasant experiences at this location, however, an incident today was far too much.  I came in earlier today for breakfast with a friend, I knew what my order would be and couldn't have imagined it to be such a hassle for the cashier.   The cashier was Alexander (Alex) who asked what I want to order in a stern voice, I simply replied in my most courteous and general manner, "An order of the hotcakes without sausage and one sausage mcmuffin, I would also like to request a fresh order please."  He looked at me dead center and chuckled a bit, then proceeded by saying, "Well, it is fresh. What? Do you think it just comes out of a box?" *chuckling continues*   I didn't say anything and just brushed it off, I couldn't even believe how disrespect this individual was. Honestly, customer service aside for a second, have you any decency? I was far more courteous than I usually am just because of the frequent discrepancies at this location.
